Ni ine hanina pososoc anu tifainggema manubeso anec.
Ngic yoackpekpe angandae nga ngic Anutu ngadehema mangana mebeso ayemmeande, yenemba yeni naric kecma wiac monggac mi obohogec, imohai keracmangang anai.
Yeni kpendzengngina kpac eng kecma sebingina kuhagoc anu kucmamea kpac kecgecde.
Ngicngac goa yeni ebicgoc kecandae nga ngic imoc yeneng ine ifi isoc mi kecgecde, kpac. Ngicngac goa yeni kpendzeng kpema kecandae nga ngic imoc yeneng kpendzenga kpac kecgecde.
Imocac amma yeni yenanggac negenggec wiac engena angkecde, faka imoc kubu isoc ubahema godzufaka ngakpingina isoc heigecde.
Yeni herenginau negen negeng sicsauc hania hania dzacgoc fema ereu kichabungina ngopic amma yadiande.
Yeni deendema ayemmema yoac mangac manganea dema ngicngac ebicfu faiyunugecdeac ngabasiricfu yoac degecde.
Yeni enacbibicnginango kurumeng demanganema nedzarangnginaunac yoacngo bangec ferecgema kenude.
Imocac ngicngac yeni yeneac hoannu kemma yoacngina imoc doku neandae, ifi isoc efea kpac negebec amma
yofi deandae, “Autungo wiac imoc naric mi negenude. Anutu Engenatoa ye wiac ifia naric mi negenude.”
Negenggec, ngic mangana yeni ifia. Yeni nasosoc wiac monggac negengyohoha kpac kecma hiedzongina meyadigecde.
Foracngoc, herena garenggeba kongaha feec, fakana imoc uaya kpac yombong anec. Ni kopocsicna kpac kecma marina dzuacba wononga kpac anec, fakana imoc uaya kpac yombong.
Kebungo numengere anengkefu ni asoacnac kemma marai kpendzeng kpekecma asoacsoc kopocsicac amma numengere anenggec.
“Ni yoac ifia dekecbade.” Ni ine ifi debai dede nambaracfocgaac areng tobangyunuma ikoc ayemmema wayunubai.
Nga manganango kuhagoc fekecde, ni wiac imocac hania negentegecbadeac uaya mema negemba osiec.
Amma ni ngade Anutuac womonnu emma noc wiacngo wisic wisickeau fingecyemmeude, ni imohainoc negentegerai.
Foracngoc, ge ngic ifia bangec gbafiringau faiyunuma kpetotieyununa kpac andacgecde.
Yeni bic yombong manganema kpac anggecde. Yeni kengectoa amma kpidohogec wiac imocngo meicyunudarude.
O Kebu, ngicngac gau hemma yacma imoc nigecyunuande, yeni ifi isoc. Geng yacma yeni gauac siric andae dema wayununade.
Ubaonganango negenghodungaiba imocngo herena biring isoc nendanggeu
ni ubafong amma negen negenna kpac kecma yang yeneng memanganeyunuandae, ni ifi isoc geac kicfu ubakpekpe anggenai, fora.
Amma ni sifu gegoc kecba geng marifoinau menunade.
Ge dederecgeyoac nemma garennukecna wisic wisickeau goiheihei anemma heitainuma hoannunade.
Kurumennu geng neac areng angkecnec, mongngo kpac. Ni bangecfu ge meficgubadeac anende, wiac monggac mi anende.
Sebina nga woubocna yeri kucngira kpac ambeso angandapeu dede Anutu geng neac woubocnaac kuc amma ge nasoya nasoya neac Anutu kecnec.
Foracngoc, geac hereau kecandae, yeni kpac anggecde nga ngicngac geac kicfu faka forau mi kecandae, ge yeneac kekec herecgena kpac anude.
Nga ni Anutuac wegenac kecba ngereede. Ni KEBU Israeac Anutuac hoannu kemba yeng neac sufu sufuamana amma onggonnuma kecde. Ni geng wiac sasawa annec, imoc desahebade.
O Anutu, ge nocac wanunuma ukunudacnec? Rama habufocga geac bangecfu kecdimbe, ge nocac herebugango nunuma hosuc isoc kporacnununec?
Ge kpebung habufocga warac yombong menununec, imoc negenna febeso. Neni geangga maridzoming ngicngac areng annideac geng bummenunuma ebicfunac mesinununec. Geng Siong tikiu tacannec, imoc negenna febeso.
Ngabafocnina yeneng kpetiac womongga kpetotiedacgec amabangec sesuhasac amma ifi feengkefude, ge hama imoc hembesena.
Ngabafocga yeni amabangecga kpetiacfu hama kunengngoc arohoma yenang onga hania hania ihai faigec tacde.
Yeni nagu wi tacde, imocacsing hama wiac icngo memea imoc nakango heima hembarackedacma
onga marikibi gombunga icngo memea, imoc naka nga hamango hedzamedacgec.
Yeni womongga faigec dzema bangecfu maec amma geac kpac kunenggac amagerec, yeni imoc heidzadzu kpema kpedzamegec bangecfu mau
negemma degec, “Memayunuyombonggenide.” yeni ifi negemma bangecninau Anutuac kpekpeturangama fekendae, imoc sasawa faigec dzedarec.
Anu geac faka bibiagoc hengandimbe, imoc monggoc mi hengandimbe nga profete mongngo mi kecde. Ebic imoc noc nasoac kpac anude, imoc nenearunac mongngo mi negende.
O Anutu, ngabafocnina yeneng naso dafiguc detenic anggenggecde? Ngabangic yeni nasoya nasoya geac kpac kuneng ngadeheandae, imoc mi ngereede.
Ge onggongyunuma marigango mi meyununec amma marifoiga segerekecnec, imoc mi ngereede. Ge mariga monggoc mi mesufuma mariga sinema memanganeyununa kpac ambisia.
O Anutu ngictauna, gennoc waracngoc kecma kecnecngoc amma ge bangecfu yagucngoc memengerec ua mekecnec.
Anutu ge kucgango kondung kperecgena yohockang anec nga ge doku dzohonggac wasaiyang orucngina kpedzameyununec.
Rewiatang ye wasaiyang oruha homac nga gennoc yeac oruha sasawa kpedzamedacma sebia imoc bangeckisiac yang yeni gumecyununec.
Geng doku kiwa nga doku tunggbaung singngina kpendzicna yeni fingecma hakecdae. Ge doku fefeseri hakecgec yeni singngina hedzickena gbanggedacgec.
Hadzing nga toforec yeri geac. Geng kperagia amma wenac tatacngirau warac faiyuruna seria nandape.
Ge bangecac ma faima meseriyununec. Geng wenac nga kia naso meficyurunec.
O KEBU, ngabafocga yeni ngadeguma deendema anggenggec ngic negen negengngina kpac, yeni geac kpac kuneng demanganeandae, imoc negenna febeso.
Ni geac kebesac neng isoc anduae, ge kebesacgaac ubaonga onggonggena wasai yang yeneng mi menubisia. Ge ngicngacfocga makpekpea kecdae, yeneac kekec nasoya nasoya mi nigecgubeso.
Bangec noboc noboc kundung kundung imoc godzufakango mewakeu homac fede. Ge dzadzahac menec, imocac negensikecbesena.
Ngicngac yeni ngicngac ogofocngina meenti memati ayemmema game kpekpeu faiyunubauac kpae heiyemmena ngicngac makpekpea nga iwaiac obohoma kecandae, yeneng geac kpac kuneng heiwayong memibisia.
O KEBU, ge yacma geangga yoac nanggebesena. Ngic mangana yeneng asoacnac kemma marai geac dedzomoc angandae, imoc negenna febeso.
Ngabafocga yeneng kunengngoc arohogec, imoc mi nigecguu yeneng nasosoc yoackpekpe kunengngoc kpekecdae, ge imoc mi nigecgubeso.

Anutu, geac kpac kuneng wegenac fedecac amma ge ohec megendimbe. Ngicngac yeni kucfakaga negenggec wiac engena angkecdeac imocac yoacsiduc deandae.
Ge yofi denec, “Ni monde mondena kpac nga kecma naso mong faiba hau faka angammemengina isinggema desibade.
Bangec nga bangecfu ngicngac kecdae, yeni imohai goroc goroc amma kockpac anggecde. Ni neannaoc bangecac wotungtoa meseriyunuma nanggeyunuma kecduae.” Selac
Ngic yeni yenanggac negenggec wiac engena anu yoac homac osoandae, yeneac yofi debade, “Ngeni ngenanggac negenggec wiac engena angkecde, yoacngina imoc wadacbisia.” Nga ngicngac Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, yeni yoac yofi edeyunubade, “Ngeni kucngina mi miacbisia.
Ngeni kucngina wi kurumennugeng miacma ubangina meemma yoackpekpe kpeandae, faka imoc wadacbisia.”
Imoc yofiac, ngic mong ye wenac ere ereaunac me wenac keme kemeaunac bangec kisiunac haude, ye ngic ogea miarudeacsoc mi ande, kpac.
Anutungo desi desi ua mekecma ngic mong memama ngic ogea miarude.
KEBUNGO mariau kpakenec mong menande, imocac manau Anutuac ngabaac waing faifaia, imoc wiac homunagoc yerec yerecgea kporoc tima wake wakea fede. Ye imoc bangecfu kpakedaru ngic Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, yeneng doku mangana imoc hafoangoc nedacgecde.
Ni nasosoc sogac sogaigoc kecma Yakoboac Anutu yegec heimima dengerebade.
Ngic Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, minginango yeneac kucngina meickeu kpac anu ngic dindingac yeneac kucngina monggoc meenude.

Yuda bangecfu Anutu negengkecdae nga Israe bangecfu yeac kpac kuneng heiwayong memigecde.
Yeac bedzo tatahau faigec Sareng bangecfu tacde nga amagereha Sionnu faigec
ye imohai kecma tebemedaha piratac isoc hagec, imoc kpetackema dzikacac kaso nga beang nga noc, imoc sasawa kpetackedarec. Selac
Anutu, geac kuc nga kibikperagi, imoc wiac engena. Tiki yeni wiac engena amma herea herec yeneng nasoya nasoya fekecdae, ge ngictau kucgagoc engena yombong, imocngo yeni feracyunuude.
Ngic ubaherengina kuhagoc kecandae, yeni serima kecma iwai dzikacfu megec goa yeneng firang amma yenang wiacngina wangecyunugec. Ngic kucnginagoc yeni todinggema mama homema fegec nga wasaingic yeni maringina miacgecdeacsoc mi anggec.
O Yakoboac Anutu, ge yoac seria ngabasiricfu edeyununa becosi nga ngic witiau tacma kisangyunuandae, yeni mayunuu homema fegec.
Geac kengectoa negembesonga. Ge herebu negemmana ngic mongngo geac kicfu nanudeacsoc mi ande, imoc kpac yombong.
Anutu, ge kurumenga kurumenga fekendae, imohai tacma imohacnac desi desiyoacga dena bangecngo kengec amma waickeec.
Ge foraya dede nasoya fainadeac yacnec, imohai ifi fingerec. Ngic yeni ngic ogofocngina ebic meficgeyemmegec yeneng ubaebicgoc kecgec geng ebicfunac mesiyunudacnadeac hanec. Selac
Bangecngic yeneac herebu, imocngo ge dengereguude. Ge herebuac tosea kebanggau dzegena dzikacac wiacga ande.
Ngeni KEBU Anutunginaac kicfu yoacngina deserima imoc modacbisia. Bangec monnunac ngicngac yerecgema kecdae, ngeni Anutuac kengec amma ubangerec wiac mehama mibisia.
Nocac yeng ngictau medacfocngina yeneac onganginaac kuc meickema bangecac ngictau kengectoa meficgeyemmeude.

Ni Anutuaru kunengngoc kpacduae, Anutungo negennudeac seriangoc kpacba.
Ni ebicnasou Kebu meficgebadeac uatoa mekecma tofocnac kucmamea kpac kecma marina Kebuaru miackecba ubaonganango memeseriac memefic naric mi meude.
Ni Anutu negensiba asoringa anenu ye hennegeng amma negensikecba ongana ebiriude. Selac
Geng kicna tapea miacna gauya kpac kecba herenango ebic meficgedeac enacnaunac yoac mong naric mi ereude.
Ni naso bicngoc feec, imoc negensima kecba kifa bic wisickeec, imoc negemba fede.
Ni yegecna negemba fede, imoc tofocnac negensiba asunango negengising anu herenango imoc hennegeng amma negensiude.
“Kebu ye nasoya nasoya wanuma gombunga monggoc mi anenude.” ni negengyohoc amma ifi negemma kecduae.
“Yeng yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecde, fakaya imoc yaguc kpac amma nasoya nasoya kpac andarude. Nga ye yoac deserima deec, imoc yaguc kpac anu nasoya nasoya kpac andarude.” ifi isoc ande.
“Anutungo wosoefac anemmeande, imocac nigeckpeec nga ubamangang anemmeande, fakaya imoc ngaba amma kpae heimiec, ifi isoc ande.” Selac
Ifi negemma yofi deai, “O Kebu Engenatoa, ge mariga warac angkefec, ifi isoc monggoc mi amma siriha merennecac ubahodunggoc kecduae.”
KEBUNGO faka warac meec, imoc negensibade. Oc, geng warac kucfaka bibiagoc menec, imoc negen negennau faiba fekefude.
Geng ua sasawa medacnec, imoc hennegeng amma negensikecba geac kucfakaga engena, imoc ubangerecgoc negensima kecbade.
O Anutu, geac sing imoc kpetiac. Nemu mongngo Anutunina mi feraheude, kpac.
Anutu ge mocgungo kucfaka bibiagoc mekecnec. Ge kucuaga ngicngac areng botucnginau mena yeneng imoc bic henggec.
Ge mariga kuhagocngo ngicngacfocga Yakobo nga Yosefeac gboricfora bummeyunuma ebicfunac yungecyununec. Selac
O Anutu, doku nga dzohong yeneng warac gemma kengec anggec. Bangec manau keme kemeango gemma dendeng kpeec.
Hoeng yeneng doku kpakegec sawango gbururung heiu tebemedahango piratac heima noboc noboc kpesaiec.
Firang kunengngo amabangec heimerenu imocac manau geac gbururunggac udumengtoa fingerec. Geac piratacngo bangeha bangeha mekperagiyunuu bangecngo kengec amma dendeng kpekecfec.
Geac sing imoc kondungtoa dzongiau kenu singbisicga imoc kondungtoa manau tima kengannec, fora. Nga haniga ongea sifu mi hening.
Ge ngicngacfocga Mose nga Arong yereac mariu faiyununa yereng rama isoc heitaiyunuma wangecyunuoc.
Ngicngacfocna, ngeni neac kpoukpouac kedzac faigec enacnaunac yoac mau kedzac faima negembisia.
Ni yoac heima deba, imoc enacnaunac maudeac ande nga wiac warac kundunnu sufu sufuya feec nga wiac ngade fingecbesande, imocac yoac debade.
Esangabofocnina yeni warac yoac degec, imoc kedzacngo negening nga imoc negen negenninau fede.
Neni nambaracfocninango imoc negenggecdeac wiac mong naric mi mesufunide nga fingecsahenina ngade feengkefude, yeni edeyununide. KEBUNGO kuc nga kibikperagiagoc kecma uatoa meec, imoc edeyununide. Nga yeng kucfaka bibiagoc mekefec, imocac siduc ayemmenide.
Kebungo Yakoboac areng dederecgeyoac yemmema edeyunuma kpouyemmeec nga Israe habu dedeseriyoac yemmema edeyunuma kpouyemmeec. Ye esangabocfocnina yeneng nambaracfocngina edekpou ayemmegecdeac edeyunuec.
Fingecsahe ngade feengkefude, yeneng imoc negenggecdeac negenec. Nga nambaracfocngina mi fingecgecngo ngade fingecgecde, yeni imoc negenggecdeac edeyunugecde.
Ifi anggec yeneng Anutu negensima fora fingerudeac tomai kecma yoacngina negemma Anutuac kucfaka bibiagoc mi nigecyunubeso. Yeni yeac nonoyoac tofohoma kecbisia.
Yeni mangesafocngina yeni isoc ambauac ifi anec. Mangesafocngina yeni serima kecma yoackpekpe areng amma herenginango ye seria mi modacgec nga asunginango Anutu wama kecgec.
Efarainggac areng tebe mema kecma dzikac nasou dzigenema woragec.
Yeni Anutungo dzadzahac meec nga yeac dedeseriyoac mi modacma wadacgec.
Yeng wiac bic meec nga kucfakaya bibiagoc edzacyunuu kicnginango imoc henggec, yeni wiac imoc nigecyunudarec.
Ye Aigita bangecac Dzoang yeneac bangec nobohau esangabo yeneac kicfu kucfakaya bibiagoc meec.
Ye kondung kperecgeu doku tegecma yohockang amma noboc noboc emma serima nanu yeng sing faiyemmeu yeni botuhau ferecgema kenggec.
Yeni wenacfu hoengngo waraiyemmema hesicyunuec nga tofocnac gerecac kperagingo mekperagiyunudarec.
Ye bangec kisiu hoc kpendziru keme kemeunac doku efea kpac ereu imoc gumecyunuu nekecgec.
Ye doku hocfunac kpeu dokungo doku dzuamagoc maande, ifi isoc mama feec.
Ngicngac yeneng imoc henggec, fora. Nga yeni ine yeac uba kpema kopocsic monggoc meficgema bangec kisiu Kebu Engenatoaac yoac kpekecgec.
Yeni songongina yaka siriha monggac ayemmeu imocac serima dekecma Anutu igockema
yoara kpema degec, “Anutungo bangec gbangge gbanggea yomohai yaka meficgenemmeudeacsoc mi ande, kpac.
Foracngoc, ye hoc kpendziru dokutoa nga doku tunggbaung endzirango mama feec. Nga yaka ine naric mi nemmeude, kpac. Ye ngicngacfora yang naric mi meficgenemmeude.”
Imocac amma KEBUNGO yoacngina negemma herebu kuneng yombong negemma Yakoboac areng yenereudeac gerec mong fiu dzeu ngabayango Israe yenearu fingecma feec.
Yeni Anutu mi negensinggema ye ebicfunac mesiyunuudeac kuctoa femide, imoc mi negenserigec, fora.
Nga ye sifu hoeng wi sawau edeyunuma kurumenggac nagu witiu
uaya meu manna yakango kia isoc witinginau mau ngicngac yeneng negecdeac yemmeec. Ye kurumenggac yaka yemmeu nekecgec
yaka efea kpac faiu mau nema kecgec. Bangecngicngo angero yeneac yaka nekecgec.
Nga yeng kurumenga kurumenga imohai wenac ere ereaunac firang mong sing meficgemima sueu haec. Ye kuhagocngo saot bigeng imocac firang mong ameaunac hesickema hau ngadeau haec.
Hau sendung homac angande, ye ifi isoc yang homac ukuu kia isoc maec. Neng kpegangnginagoc yeni kpetengina kondunggac sangi isoc anec, yeni kia isoc magec.
Yeng negemmanu neng yeni ngicngac bedzongina mema nandacgec, imohai mama tacgec.
Ngicngac yeni songonginango noc wiacac anu derecgegec, imoc yemmeecac ngicngac yeneng neng imoc nema negebec anggec.
Songongina imoc mi wisickemanu yaka enacnginau femanungoc
Anutungo ine ngaba ayemmema ngicfocngina kucnginagoc kecgec, yeni kpebucyunuec. Israeac arengfora yeneng semeng sabayagoc isoc kecgec, yenemma memayunuma kekecngina herecgeu kpac anec.
Ye wiac sasawa ifi anu yeneng ine kopocsic meficgemangoc kecgec. Yeng kucfakaya bibiagoc mekefec, imoc fora. Nga yeneng ine imoc wama mi negensinggegec.
Ifi anu ye kekecac wenacnaso faiyemmeec. Imoc naso mocgu asu taigec kpac angande, naso ifi faiyemmeu kpac anec. Yeni kengectoa amma kpidohoma ubaebicgoc kecmagec kifangina kpac anec.
Nga Anutungo yunukpebuc anec, yeni naso imohaingoc ubamereng amma herenginango hofocma ye modacgec.
Anutu ye yeneac hoc peperandzi seria nga Anutu Engenatoango bummeyunuma ebicfunac mesiyunuec, yeni imoc negenggec feec.
Nga yeni enacnginango ine kerecyoac ammima nedzarangnginango ikocyoac ammigec.
Yeni herengina yearu seria mi feu yeac dzadzahac imoc faka forau mi modacgec.
Yeni kopocsicnginagoc kecgec, forangoc, nga yeng sifu yeneac ubea manganeu manganangina wama mi kpetotieyunuec. Ye naso homac ngabaya dzegema herebuya erebacac imoc kpetarimiec.
Yeni bangecngicngacsac, ye imoc negenu feec. Yeni ngicngo asu taiu erema kemma monggoc mi dzigeneande, yeni ifiasac.
Yeni bangec kisiu kecma naso homac yombong yeac yoac kpema bangec gbangge gbanggeau ubaebic fingecmiudeac ammigec.
Ifi ammima Anutu monggoc nga monggoc faitobannu faima Israeac Kpetiac Ngic heremiac miac ammikecgec.
Ye kuc mingina, imoc mi negensigec nga yeng ngaba yeneac mariunac bummeyunuma mesiyunuec, wenac imocac mong mi negensigec.
Ye Aigita bangecfu ngic yeneng negensinggegecdeac kucfaka mi hengena meficgema Soang manennu kucfakaya bibiagoc hania hania mekefec, yeni naso imoc mong mi negensima kecgec.
Yeng dokutoangina merenu sac andacgec yeni doku imohai negecdeac osigec.
Mogoc enaragoc areng kuneng yombong sueyunuu botucnginau hama neyunudacgec nga sepeng homac sueyunuu kpetotieyunugec.
Ye semengngina kpembong gumecyunuu nedacgec uanginaac semeng imoc ipua gumecyunuu nedacgec.
Ye nomanggbomea kia isoc faiu waing uanginau mama imoc kpetotieu kpac andaru nomang sueu nomangngo figi icnginaac gbomea dzedarec.
Yeng negemmanu nomanggbomea kia isoc burumakanginaac witiu mama memanganeyunudaru gbumparandang kiafirangagocngo rama nga noning memanganeyunudarec.
Yeac ngaba imoc gerec dzeande, ifi isoc dzeu ye witiha mesiu yenereec. Ye herea buu mangananginaac amma ubea hodungaiu ubaebic kuneng mema kpetotie uaac angero habunginagoc sueyunuu hagec.
Ye herea buu imocac singa meficgema homefunac mi onggongyunuec. Ye kekecngina homeac kpae mi faima hafei manganaac enarau faiyunudarec.
Ye Aigita yeneac warac nambaracfocngina kpebucyunudarec. Ye Hanggac esangabo kporucamanginau kecgec, yeneac kucnginaac waracmedacfocngina sasawa kpebucyunudarec.
Imoc wisickeu Anutungo ngicngacfora meyunuma rama wangecyunuma waraiyemmeandae, ifi isoc waraiyemmema kenec. Ngic yeneng bangec kisi dokuya kpacfu ramahabu hesicyunuandae, ifi isoc wangecyunuu kenggec.
Ye yenenggareng ayemmema onggongyunuma hesicyunuu yeni kengeha kpac kecmagec kondungngo ngabafocngina semeyunuec.
Ye meyunuma yengena bangec kpetiacfu kenec. Ye firang amma ngabafora feracyunuma yengena marifoiaac kuhango tiki imoc warac firang amma meecac ngicngacfora imohai meyunuu kenggec.
Yeng yeni hagecdeac amma bangec monnunac ngicngac Anutu mi negemmidae, yeni kporacyunuu kenggec bangec imoc Israe habu medereyemmeu yeni amagerecngina ihai feudeac kporucbedzocnginau faiyunuu tacgec.
Ye ifi anec, fora. Nga yeneng ine Anutu Engenatoa tobanggekecma yeac yoac kpekecma dederecgeyoac mi modacma eng kecgec.
Yeni mangesafocngina warac angkecgec, ifi isoc Anutu wama ye mi negensinggegec. Ngic yeni tebe gbaring gbaring kpesaigec dindingac mi kengande, yeni ifi isoc ihai nga ihai kenggec.
Yeni nemu yeneac arata hania hania tiki bumau meyunuma Anutu woseau mema ngaba meficgemima nemunginagoc kecma yeac keracmangang meficgemigec.
Anutungo imoc negemma herebu kuneng fingecmiu Israe habu wayunudarec.
Ye amagereha Siro fekefec, imoc wama kporucbedzoya ngicngac yeneac botucfu tarec, imoc ifingoc wama
kuhaac katapa wama ngaba yeneac mariu faiu yeneac witicamau feec. Yeng kuc nga kibikperagia wama ngaba yeneac mariu faiu feec.
Ye maridzomingfora herebu negengyemmema ngicngacfora wayunuu ngic yeneng dzikacac beangngo kpebucyunugec.
Gerecngo sebigbori medacfocngina yonohou homegec naroangfocngina ngiha kpac kecma memeturanggac yegecngina mong mi heigec.
Ngic yeneng womong garengfocngina dzikacac beangngo yunuma kpebucyunuu enengfocngina yeni kiac ubamangang anggecdeacsoc mi anggec.
Anu ngicngo gauunac yacandae, Kebungo ifi isoc amma yarec. Ngic seria mongngo waing dokuac kucfu arohoande, ye ifi isoc arohoec.
Ye ngabafora yunuma firang amma game kpekpeu faiyunuu nasoya nasoya ifi kecgecde.
Ye Yosefeac kporucbedzo ngadehema Efarainggac areng mi meisinggema
Yuda areng meisinggeec. Ye Siong tikiac songo negendeac imoc meisinggema
womong kpetiac meec imoc kurumenga kurumenga wi fekendae, yeni isoc anec. Ye bangec meficgema faiu feengkefude, womonga kpetia ifi isoc meec.
Ye kingang ngiha Dawidi meisinggema rama odaunac meu haec.
Ye Yakoboac areng garengyunuma yeng waraiyemmeudeac faima Israe habu garengyunuudeac ye faiec. Meisinggeu yeng rama nonggo medac yenenggareng ayemmekefec, ua imoc wama Anutuac maridzomingfora garengyunuec.
Dawidiac hereu ikoc nga hamangec mong mi feu yenenggareng ayemmema negen negenggoc uaya mema mariango garengyunuma wangecyunuu kecgec.
O Anutu, bangec monnunac ngicngac mi negenggudae, yeneng maridzoming bangecgau eredau. Yeni eweheihei faka mi amma womongga kpetiacfu eregec imoc gotengagoc anu Yerusareng ama kpedzamedacgec amabangec sesuhasac ande.
Yeni geac kingang ngicngacfocga kpebucyunuma farengngina koec koec nga huntoc yemmegec imocngo yeneac yaka anu neyunugec. Yeni geac ngicngac kpetiac kpebucyunuma sebingina imoc bangecfu yang kecdae, imoc yemmegec negec.
Yeni sacngina hetinggegec imocngo Yerusareng fekendeu doku isoc nedzima feu farengngina tonggoudeac areng mong mi kefec.
Ngicngac nenigoc wegenac kecandae nga oronnunuma kecdae, yeneng deendema anemmema dzomorenemmedae.
O KEBU, faka imoc wisickeudeac tomai kecdimbe. Ge herebu negennemmena imocngo wisic wisickea kpac fekefude, ifi isoc ande. Nga ge keracmangang anemmena imocngo gerec isoc dzeu mi wisickede, ifi isoc ande.
Bangec monnunac ngicngac yeneac witinginau herebuga hetinggena mau nga bangec areng goa yeni geac kpac kuneng mi kpacandae, ge herebuga yenearu kpakena mau.
Yeni Yakoboac areng yaka isoc gbokoyunuma amabangecnina kpetotiegec kisi fede.
Mang esafocninango kopocsic meficgegec, geng imocac mi negenna feu nga ge imocac turunga mi kpounemmena. Yeni memanunugec wiac sasawa obohoyombonggedimbeac neneac ubaga manganeu bic yombong hama sinnu meficnununa.
O Anutu memengerecnina, kpacga imoc kuc nga kibikperagiagoc, imocac meficnununa. Ge kpac kunenggaac amma ebicfunac mesinunuma kopocsicnina wana.
Bangec monnunac ngicngac Anutu mi negemmidae, yeneng yofi debau, “Ngeni Anutungina mong mi hendimbe, kpac.” yeni ifi degec negemba naric mi ande. Ngic yeneng kingang ngicngacfocga sacngina kpakegec, imocac turunga bangec monnunac ngicngac yenearu kpouyemmena neni kicninango hemma nambisina.
Witicngic asoringa ayemmede, yeneac ebicnginango gearu hasikeu imoc negembesena. Ngic yeneng ngic ogofocngina homegecdeac bic desiyunugec geng hama kuctoagango onggongyununa.
O Kebu, ngicngac nenigoc wegenac kecdae, yeni ge deendema anggenggecac kopocsicnginaac turunga naso seweng kekecnginau kpouyemmena.
Ifi anna neneng ngicngacfocga nga rama habufocga anni geng garennunukecna, neni nasoya nasoya ge eriendzong megennide. Nga fingecsahenina ngade feengkefude, yeneng fingecma nenigoc torokpema ge ifingoc dedengerec anggenggecde.

O Israeac rama gareng, ge kedzac faima yoacnina negenna. Geng Yosefeac areng rama habu isoc wangecyununade. Kerobing yeneng miacguma ngictautatacga anggec geng yeneac witiu tacannec, gennoc hama kperagigango nerarannunubesena.
Ge Efaraing areng nga Bengyaming amma Manasse areng, yeneac kicfu kucga hafoangoc heina kemedaru hama ebicfunac mesinununa.
O Anutu, geng monggoc mengerenununa komoc kpenideac kicmesugango mekperaginununa.
O KEBU Anutu, kurumenggac wasaiareng kunengngina, ge ngicngacfocga neneac nunumuac ngaba negengkecnec, imoc wisickeudeac tomai kecdimbe.
Geng kickumanina gumecnununa imocngo yaka nga dokunina ande.
Geng sing meficgena ngicngac wegenac kecdae, yeneng desofoc anemmeandae nga ngabangic yeneng detenic anemmeandae.
O Anutu, kurumenggac wasaiareng kunengngina, ge monggoc mengerenunuma kicmesugango nerarannununa komoc kpebisina.
Gennoc neni waingkomoha isoc Aigita bangecfunac menunuma hanec. Ge bangec monnunac ngicngac mi negenggudae, yeni kporacyununa woragec neni bangec imohai waing isoc homecnununa kecdimbe.
Ge waing ic imocac bangec memengere amma homecna ye bangec imohai godea mema kemema fingesahe amma bangec sokodarec.
Sokodaru fawango tiki fekendae, imoc semeyunuma nokumuc meficgeyemmema yomondzoc ic fawatoanginagoc ifingoc kperacyunuu yeni imocac bageau nanggec.
Ye fawa sinema imocngo kemma kondungtoanina meficgeu sera sinema Eufarata dokutoa kpeseregec.
Anu ge odaya hembarackenec, imoc negenni naric mi ande. Ge ifi anna titinga fingeru ngicngac yeneng imohai ferecgedacma ic imocac fora sicsauc mesinec anggecde.
Nga kateberec ngiwa yeneng godea suruhegec manennu yang yeneng seraac kiwa kirecgenec angandae.
O Anutu, kurumenggac wasaiareng kunengngina, ge monggoc nenearu dzigenema nenenna. Ge kurumennunac kicga fina mau nenemma waing ic yomocnec henggareng ambesena.
Gennoc ic komoha imoc marifoigango homecnec. Gennoc medacga imoc gegoc kefudeac garenggena yadiseri anec.
Ngic yeneng waing icga imoc kperecgema gerecfu faigec dzeu geng fingecyemmema yoac ngabasiricfu edeyununa yeni manganema kpac ambisia.
Gennoc ngicga meisinggena kuhagoc anudeac amminec, yeng marifoigau tacmanu marigango nanggebesena.
Ge ifi anna neneng monggoc mi ngadegunide, kpac. Geng megborinununa geac kpac kuneng kpacma afegunide.
O Anutu, kurumenggac wasaiareng kunengngina, ge monggoc mengerenunuma kicmesugango nerarannununa komoc kpebisina.

Anutu ye kucnina. Ngeni dendzerenggema yegec heimima Yakoboac Anutu sogac sogaigoc arohoma oheha memibisia.
Ngeni tambaring nga gita amma kurere kpema udumeng gombunga meficgema yegec heibisia.
Afo gboria mau nga nasotoanina afo dzongiau trampet fifigec arohobeso.
Anutungo Israeac singyoac ngemmeec. Yakoboac Anutungo yoac ifi deseringemmeec.
Anutu yengenaoc Aigita bangecfu kemma dzikac kpema firang anec, imohai dederecgeyoac imoc Yosefeac areng yemmeec. Ni ubaudumeng nga yoac warac mi negengkefai, imoc naso imohai negenai.
Negemba yofi deec, “Ni fuanginaunac ebic mesima maringinaunac uaac sakac ebira meickeba
ngeni ebicnginagoc kecma kpacnugec ebicfunac mesingunuai. Ni hoennu gbururunggac manau sufuma yoacnginaac turunga merengngemmema Meriba doku imohai faitobannu faingunuyai.” Selac
“O ngicngacfocna, ngeni kedzac faigec goroyoac edengunuba. O Israe habu, ngeni neac yoac negembisia.
Ngeni anutu furia mong mi mekecbisia nga bangecareng goa yeneac anutu fafoc mi heimibisia.
Ni ngeneac KEBU nga Anutungina. Nennoc Aigita bangecfunac mengunuma hayai. Ngeni enacngina anggegec mewakengunubade.”
“Ngicngacfocna ngeneng ine ubaudumennaac kedzac mong mi kpegec, kpac yombong. Israe areng ngeni wanuma neac yoac mi tofohogec.
Imocac wangunuba ngeni ubaseringinagoc kecma ngenang negen negeng modacgec.
O ngicngacfocna, ngeni neac yoac modacma kedzac kpebau, imocac yombong anende. Nga Israe ngeneng neac sing modacbau, imocac homac anende.
Ngeni ifi ambau neng ngabafocngina bic memayunuma marinango singngina hedzickebai.”
“Ifi amba ngicngac KEBU ubango ukudae, yeneng yeac kicfu hama fafoc heimibau. Yeni kopocsicnginaac turunga ebicgoc kecdae, imoc nasoya nasoya feengkecbac.
Ifi kefu Israe areng, ni wit yaka gombunga ngemmeba nebau nga ni hoc peperandziac kukundzau meficgema ngemmeba nebau.”
Anutungo anutu hania hania yeneac adzoc adzorotoau enara amma tatahau anutu hania hania botucnginau tacma isingyunuma yaocngina desima
yofi dede, “Fakangina yomoc mi ngereede, ngeni sing dindingac wama ngic yoacngina desiandae. Ngeni monde monde angandae nga ngic Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeude, ngeni yeni meficyunukecdae nga fakangina imoc mi wisickede, kpac.” Selac
“Ngeni ngic kucmama nga beging kecdae, yeneac yoac sing dindingac modacma desibisia. Ngicngac ogofocngina ebic witiau kecma wiac sasawa obohokecdae, ngeni yenenggareng ayemmema yeneac yoac sing dindingacfu desibisia.
Ngic Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, yeneng ngicngac kucmama nga iwaiac obohoma kecandae, yeni meyunugec ngeneng meficyunuma yeneac mariunac mesiyunubisia.
Yeni ine wiac mong mi negemma wiac naric mi negentegecma kundung manau kengkecdae. Ifi anu bangecac titiseri sasawango goroc goroc andae.”
Ni yofi deai, “Ngeni sasawango anutuareng nga Anutu Engenatoa neac medacfocna.”
“Foracngoc, ngeni bangecngic homeandae, ifi isoc homegecde. Ngictauac medacfoc, ngeni ngictau yeneac nambaracfocngina sasawa mayunuande, ngeni ifi isoc mangunuude.”
O Anutu, bangeha bangeha ngicngac areng sasawa yeni geac. Imocac ge yacma bangecfu desi desi uaga mebesena.

O Anutu, ge mi waickena amma kedzacga mi kpefonggena, o Anutu, ge eng mi tacna.
Henna, ngabafocga yeni kpeborongtoa kpedae nga ngic ubango ukugudae, yeni orucngina miacma nandae.
Yeni geac ngicngacfocga tobangyunugecdeac negemma areng faima yoac dedzege andae. Geng ngicngacfocga nenenggareng amma onggongnunuannec, yeni neninoc memanganenunubeso amma
dedae, “Hagec, nenang Israe bangec areng meicyununi kpac andacbisia nga ngicngac yeneng Israe kpacngina monggoc mi negenggec febeso.”
Yeni uba mocgu amma yoac dedzege amma Israe memanganegecdeac dzadzahac mekecdae.
Ngic imoc Edonggac areng kporucbedzonginau kecandae. Yeni Ismaeac areng nga Moabi areng amma Hagiri, yeac areng.
Yeni Gebare nga Among amma Amareke ngic. Yeni Firisti bangecac ngicngac areng nga Tiro taonnunac hagec
Asiria habu ifingoc yenigoc torokpeyunudau. Yeni kucnginagoc amma Rotiac gboricfora yeni nonggo tacyemmedae. Selac
Geng warac Midiangbangec kpemeting amminec, ifi isoc yeni ayemmema Kisong doku tegiau ngictau Sisera nga Yabing faka ayecmenec, ge ifi isoc kpemeting ayemmebesena.
Geng warac Eng Doro amau ngic kpetotieyununa farengnginango bangecfu kerac isoc hoaema kpac anggec.
Ge ngickunengngina meyununa Orebe nga Dzebe yeri manganeec, ifi isoc ayemmema ngictau yeneac medacfocngina kucnginagoc sasawa meyununa yeni Dzeba nga Dzarimuna ayecmenec, yeni ifi isoc ayemmebesena.
Nocac yeni degec, “Neni Anutuac manengbangec meni imocngo nenang ambeso.”
O Anutuna, geng ngic ifia meyununa sendungngo firannu yerecgeande, ifi isoc yerecgebisia. Ngic yeneng padi seuha firangngo mefiranggeande, ifi isoc mefirangyununa.
Nga gerecngo ickate dzeande nga gerecborangngo tikiu fekengkecma bangec faiu dzeande, ge ifi isoc amma
kiafiranggango kisangyunuma firangngo kuneng kpeu kengectoa meficgeyemmebesena.
O KEBU, geng kicmesungina game kpekpeu faiyunudacna yeneng geac kpac kuneng hofocbisia.
Yeni geng negemmana gameyunuu nasoya nasoya negeng manganggoc kecma imocngo nasosoc mebucyunuu ngicngac yeneng wayunugec kpac ambisia.
Geac kpac kuneng imoc KEBU. Ge mocgungo bangectoa bangec fekendacde, imocac Engenatoa kecnec, yeni imoc negembisia.

O KEBU, kurumenggac wasaiareng kunengngina, geac ama womong imoc songogoc nga sogac sogaigoc wakema fede.
KEBU, ni ongaasunango geac womong sobenggaac ammiu imohai kebadeac homema kecde. Ni heresebinango Anutu kekehagoc, yeac sogac sogai yegec heide.
Dzinuc nengbisic ye ifingoc amea meficgeande nga dzibirarec ye medacfora fingecgecdeac negemma faeha geac aratagau heide. O KEBU, kurumenggac wasaiareng kunengngina, ge neac ngictau nga Anutu.
Ngicngac geac amau kecdae, yeni kenecnginagoc amma yeni nasoya nasoya dengereguma yegec heigenggecde. Selac
Ngicngac yeni kucngina gearu fede, yeni kenecnginagoc amma yeneac herenginau Sionggac singtoa modacma Sionnu kenggecdeac ayemmeude.
Yeni Bakaac kickuma kperemennu ferecgema kengkecmagec dokukiwa homac imohai fingecgecde. Nga semeng homec homecnasoac kia kpema doku dzohongngo bangec imoc mewakeude.
Yeni kuc meficgema kuc monggoc nga monggoc torokpema mema kengkecma anutu hania hania yeneac Anutu Sionnu henggecde.
O KEBU Anutu, kurumenggac wasaiareng kunengngina, ge nunumuna negenna. Yakoboac Anutu ge kedzac faina. Selac
O Anutu, ge kasonina henna. Ge ngic kerecngo nadzicminec, yeac kicmesuya henna.
Imoc yofiac, ni geac sobenggau uameme mocgu kecbade, imocngo ama goau uameme tausengngoc kecbai, imoc ferahade. Ni Anutunaac nagugareng nambeso anende nga ngic Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, yeneac kporuc amanginau naric mi kecbade.
Nocac KEBU Anutu ye wenac nga kaso. Ye wosoefac nga eweheihei anemmema ngicngac dindingac kecandae, yeni faka gombunga ayemmema wiac gombunga mong naric mi segereyemmeude.
O KEBU, kurumenggac wasaiareng kunengngina, ngic mongngo negenseriguma kecande, yennoc kenehagoc.

KEBU ge bangecga gombunga yombong ammima Yakoboac areng monggoc mengereyununa naric kecgec.
Ngicngacfocga yeneng ngicngac ogofocngina memanganeyunugec, fora. Nga geng imoc wama kopocsicngina sasawa wayemmenec. Selac
Ge herebuga wama ngaba gereagoc angkecnec, imoc wadacnec.
O Anutu memengerecnina, ge monggoc mengerenununa. Nga neni wosogau meing, imoc monggoc mi negensina.
Ge neni nasoya nasoya ngaba anemmekecma fingecsahenina fekefudesoc, ge yeneac herebu ifingoc negengkecnade, imoc henni mi ngereede.
Ngicngacfocga neneng desogai anggenni ngereede. Ge imocac sifu kekecnina monggoc heigborinemmebesena.
O KEBU, geng yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecnec, imoc edzacnunuma ebicfunac mesinununadeac deserinemmena.
KEBU Anutungo yoac deude, imoc negembeso anende. Ngicngac ubaherengina meremma yearu haandae, yeni yeac kpetiac ngicngacfora nga yeng ngicngacfora imoc ruaeyoac edeyunuude.
Foracngoc, yeac kuc kibikperagiagoc bangecninau fekefudeac amma yeng ngicngac yeac eweheiandae, yenemma ebicfunac mesiyunuude.
Anutungo yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecde, faka imoc nga yoac modac modacfaka yereng meficemeec dindingac kekec amma ruae kekec yereng titikokoc angemeecde.
Yoac modac modac faka, imocngo bangecfunac nemonggema ereu dindingac kekecngo kurumennunac fiu maude.
Fora, KEBUNGO wiac gombunga nemmeu bangecninaac semeng uango semeng monggoc meficgeude.
Dindingac kekecngo waraimima yeac haniaac sing mengeremiude.
O KEBU, ni ngic makpekpeango iwaiac obohoma kecduaeac kedzaga faima yoacnaac turunga merennenna.
Ni geac enac tofoc tofohoga nga ge neac Anutuna. Ge imocac kekecna onggonggena. Ni geac kingang ngicngo negenseriguma kecduaeac ebicfunac mesinuna.
O Kebu, ni asoacnac kemma marai gearu kiackecduaeac ge neac ubaga manganeu.
O Kebu, ubaongana memiacma gearu faiduaeac ubaonganaac ubangerec meficgenenna.
Ge gombunga anemmema kopocsic wanemmenade. O Kebu, geng yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecnec. Nga ngic yeneng hofocgugec geng faka imoc modacma wiac gombunga efea kpac ayemmenade.
O KEBU, ge kedzac faima nunumuna negenna. Ni kpesi kpesi amma kiacba ge kedzac kpema negenna.
Geng turunga merennennadeac ebicnasonau kpacgubade.
O Kebu, anutu hania hania kecdae, yeneac botucfu mongngo ge isoc mi kecde. Anu geng ua mekecnec, ua ifi isoc mongngo mi mekecde, kpac.
O Kebu, ge bangeha bangeha ngicngac areng meficyununec, yeneng gearu hadacma kicgau fafoc heigemma hama geac kpac kuneng heiwayong memigecde.
Ge mocgungo Engenatoa kecma faka bibiagoc mekecnec amma geng Anutu.
O KEBU, ni yoacga fora modackecbadeac singga kpounenna. Ge herenau ubayohoc meickena geac kpac kuneng eweheiheigoc hoanggebesare.
O Kebu Anutuna, ni heregoc ge ubangerec megemma geac kpac kuneng nasoya nasoya heiwayong memibade.
Geng yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecnec, ge imoc anenna wiac engena ande. Kekecnango emu homec amau feu gennoc kekecna imohacnac mesina ereec.
O Anutu, ubakpekpe ngic yeneng yacma nubeso anggec yarengic yeni habutoagoc hama kpebucnubeso andae.
O Kebu, ge Anutu ubamangang nga wosoefac mingina. Ge ngaba bic mi annade nga geng yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecnec, fakaga imoc wiac engena. Ge yoac modac modacac Kebu nga faka imocngo wake wakea fegende.
Ge nearu dzigenema neac ubaga manganeu. Ge kingang ngicga kuc nemma kingang ngacgaac medac, imoc ni, ebicfunac mesinuna.
KEBU, geng meficnuma meserinunade. Ge imocac ngic ubango ukunudau, yeneng geac fakaga hemma gameyunuudeac geng neac negenna ngereeande, imocac ma mong edzacnubesena.
KEBUNGO tiki kpetiacfu taong mong faiu fede.
KEBUNGO Sionggac nagutoaac songotoa negemma Yakoboac ama noboha yeneac songo ifi mi negenude.
O Anutuac taong, geac yoacsiduc imoc damuyagoc. Selac
“Bangec areng goa ni negennudae, imoc kpacyunubade, Aigita nga Babirong amma Firisti yeneac bangec nga Tiro amma Etiopia, yeneng deandae, ‘Ngic yomoc ye ihai fingerec.’”
Engenatoango ye tatahau Sionnu faiu seria tarudeac amma Siong manaungoc degecde, “Ngic yomoc amma ngic imoc, yeni imohai fingecgec.”
KEBUNGO bangec areng yeneac kpacngina kpedzucnema arengyunuma yofi ohoude, “Yomocngo ihai fingerec.” Selac
Yegec fede fedeac ngicngac sasawa yeneng yegec yofi dema heiandae, “Neac dokudzohong sasawa yeni Sionnu tacdae.”

O KEBU, Anutuna, ge neac ebicfu mesi mesingic. Ni hadzing tofocnac geac arohoma kiackecba
geng nunumunaac kedzac kpena nga kiacnango gearu hau negenna.
Ubaonganango ebic wakeyombonggeu kekecnango homec ama bic mewegenede.
Yeni neac yofi negendae, “Ye ngic bic homegec, yeni isoc ande.” Ni ngic kucngina kpac, yeni isoc anduae.
Ngic wayunuma homec yeneac botucfu faiyunuandae, yeni isoc feduae. Yeni ngic kpebucyunuma kicsereu faiyunugec fedae, ifi isoc anduae. Ge ninigec meficgema neac monggoc naric mi negenna fede, ni ifi isoc anduae. Ge ngic marigaunac meicyunuma monggoc mi garengyununa kpac angandae, ni ifi isoc anduae.
Ge teng mana keme kemeau kicsere menuma kundung dzic manau fainunec.
Geac herebungo neac witiu emma mepetannuma kondungsiri isoc semenuna kucna kpac anec. Selac
Geng ifi anenna ogofocna yeni imoc hemma ngadenuma neac ebic hemma kengectoa amma kpidohoma nandae. Ni witicfu ifi kecduaeac naric mi worabade.
Ni ubahodunggoc kecba kicna kundung kpebeso ande. O KEBU, ni wenacsoc kpacguma marina gearu sinekecduae.
Ni homebeso anduae nga ge ngic homemea yenearu kucfaka bibiagoc mi menade, kpac. Homegec yeneng onga amma naric mi yacgecde nga yeni eriendzong naric mi megenggecde. Selac
Geng yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecnec, ngic kicsereu yeneng yoac imoc mi dekperagiandae nga ge yoac modac modac Anutu, imoc homec amau naric mi deyadigecde.
Kundung manau geac kucfaka bibiagoc naric mi negenggecde. Nga geng meficyunuma ebicfunac mesiyunuannec, imocngo ninigec amau naric mi fingectegerude.
O KEBU, ni sifu asoac anu memeficac kiacgemma arohoma gearu nunumuna faiba haude.
O KEBU, ge ni wanuma kicmesuga nearu mesufunec, imocac hania mi negentegecduae.
Ni sebigborinaungoc kpendzenggoc kecma homecfu heima kefai. Ge kengec efea kpac meficgenenna kpidohoma ubaebicgoc amma memeficna kpac kecduae.
Geac herebungo semenuu kengec efea kpac gearunac meficgema kengecnuu manganema kpac anai.
Geac kengectoa imoc asoacnac kemma marai doku tunggbaung isoc yadima oronnuma noboc nobocnac hama semenukefu
geng negemmana songo ogona nga arengfocna yeni sasawango wanuma ngadenugec kundungngo tosoyombonna ande.

O KEBU, geng yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecnecac nasoya nasoya yegec heigembade. Ge yoac modac modac Kebu, imoc enacbibicnango dekperagiba fingecsahe fekefudesoc, yeneng imoc negendacgecde.
Ni yofi deba, “Geng yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecnec, fakaga imoc nasoya nasoya faina fekefude. Ge yoac modac modac Anutu. Kurumenga kurumenga nasosoc fefeseri fekecdae, ifi isoc geac fakaga ifingoc fekefude.”
Geng yofi denec, “Ni ngicna Dawidi meisinggema yegoc dzadzahac mema ye kingangngicna anu yofi deserima edeai,
‘Ni geac gborifocga tatacnginau faiyunuba yeneng nasoya nasoya seria tacgecde. Yeni fingecsahengina fekefudesoc ngictau tatacfu tacma ua imoc torokpeu torokpe medacgecde.’” Selac
O KEBU, ge kurumenga kurumenga sing faiyemmena yeni geac kucfaka bibiagoc oyang boyang mebisia. Ge yoac modac modac Kebu, fakaga imoc kpetiac areng yeneac adzoc adzorou dengerebesonga.
KEBU, wi sawakebangau ge isoc mong mi kecde. Nga anutu hania hania yeneac medacfocngina kecdae, botucnginau ge isoc mong mi kecde.
Kpetiac areng yeneac adzoc adzorou tacandae, yeneng yofi negengandae, Anutu ye damu damuyagoc. Ye engenatoa amma yeng kurumenggac areng ye yerecgema nandae, yeni feracyunuu yeneng yeac kengec homac angandae.
O Anutu, kurumenggac wasaiareng kunengngina, KEBU, mongngo ge isoc kuhagoc mi kecde. O KEBU, ge yoac modac modac Kebu nga fakaga imocngo orongguma fede.
Kondungngo kpeborong kuhagoc kpeu geng mingina amma kuha memana siri kuneng kpeu mengisiyununade.
Ngic yeneng ngic goa yunuma memanganeyunugec, geng Aigita bangec medzamena ifi isoc feec. Ge mariga kuhagocngo ngabafocga kisangyununa yeni singsararang kpegec.
Ge kurumenga kurumenga yeneac mingingngina nga bangec imoc ifingoc geac. Geng bangectoa bangec nga wiac sasawa ihai fedae faiyununa seria kecgecde.
Geng bangec noboc noboc not nga saut meficyununec. Taboro nga Herimong tiki yereng sogaima geac kpac kuneng oyang boyang memiecde.
Fuakpegangga imoc kuhagoc nga mariga imoc kuhagoc, ge marifoiga sawau miacnec.
Ge fakaga dindingac nga ge sing dindingac modacma yoac desiannec, wiac imocngo ngictau tatacgaac sering ande. Geng yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecnec amma ge yoac modac modac Kebu, fakaga imocngo waraigendape.
O KEBU, ngicngac geac kicmesugaac kperagiau kecandae, yeneng afegugecdeac sing negemma sogaima kpacma afeguandae, yenennoc kenecnginagoc.
Yeni geac kpac kunenggac amma asoacnac kemma marai sogaima kecma fakaga dindinga afehegecde.
Ge ngicngac imoc yeneac kibikperagi nga kucngina. Amma ge wosoefac anemmena kucninagoc amma firang annide.
Ngictau ye kasonina nga KEBU ye kasonina mingina. Ye Israeac kpetiac ngic amma yeng neneac ngictau, yeac mingina.
Ge warac onga nga kpefingyoacfu singyoacga dena ngicngacfocga geac yoac modac modac kecgec, yeni yofi edeyununec, “Ni ngic mong kuhagoc meficgema ye ngictauac ira heimiai. Ni ngicngac yeneac botucfunac sebigbori medac mong meisinggema gununggeai.
Ni kingang ngicna Dawidi meisinggema kerecna kpetiacngo nadzicmiai.
Ifi anu marinango ye nasoya nasoya nanggema marinaac kucngo meseribade.
Ngabangic mongngo ye tobanggema naric mi feraheude nga ngic Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmede, yeni ye mi memagecde.
Ni ngabafora yeac kicfu kpedzameyunubade nga ngic ye ubango ukudae, yeni kpefacyunuba mayunuude.
Ni yoacna modacma yoac dedzege amma imoc modacbade, fakana imocngo ye garenggekefude. Ni neannaac kpacfu nanggeba yeng kuhagoc amma firang anude.
Ni kondung yeac mariu faiba yeng imoc garenggema marifoiango doku haandae, yeni garengyunuude.
Yeng kpacnuma yofi deude, ‘Ge Manna nga Anutuna amma memengerecnaac hoc peperandzi seria.’
Ni ye meisinggeba yeng neac morocmedac anu bangecfu ngictau yeneac kunengngina anudeac faiba kefude.
Ni yoac yegoc dedzege amma imoc nasoya nasoya modacma dzadzahacna yegoc mebade, imocngo yegoc fefeseri feude.
Ni Dawidiac nambarac nga esamedac fingeckecgecdesoc tatacnginau faiyunuba nasoya nasoya seria tacgecde. Yeac ngictau tatac nanggeba nasoya nasoya fekefu kurumenga kurumenga yeneac wenac dafiguc fede, kpetea ifi isoc anude.”
“Esangaboforango neac dedeseri wama ngadehema dederecgeyoacna kpema imoc mi modacgecdeu
me yeni kpema nonoyoac edeyunuai, imoc mi modacgecdeu
ni yeneng singyoac kpegecac amma turunga kpouyemmema gbarucngo yunubade. Yeni ngicngac ogofocngina memanganeyunugecac dzikacngo yunuba kpendzeng kpegecde.
Ni Dawidigoc yoac dedzege amma imoc modacduae, fakana imoc naric mi wangecbade. Ni ikoc mi ambade nga yoac modac modac fakana naric mi wabade.
Ni dzadzahac meai, imoc mi kpebade nga enacnaunac yoac maec, imoc mengerema siriha mong mi debade.
Ni naso mocgu kpetiac kekecnau namma dedeseri seria deai, imoc nasosoc fora angkefude, ‘Ni Dawidi ikoc mi ammibade.’
Yeac bangecfora yeni kpac angana kpac torokpeu torokpe kecengkecgecde. Wenac kiwango nasoya nasoya neac kicfu fekecde, ngictau yeac ngictau tatacngo ifi isoc fekefude.
Sawakebanggac hepuc, imoc afo, ye tataha mi wama takecde. Nga ni ngictau tatahau faiba ye ifi isoc nasoya nasoya seria tackefude.” Selac
Geng kingang ngicga Dawidi kerecdokungo nadzicminec, fora. Nga geng ine yeac herebu negemma ye ngadehema wanec.
Ge kingang ngicgagoc dzadzahac menec, imoc wana wisickeu ngictau iraya bangecfu sendunnu ukuna gotengagoc andarec.
Ge yeac taonggac hocoda kpembarackedacma amea seria kpedzamedacna sesuhasac andae.
Nga ngicngac yeneng imohai ferecge kengha angandae, yeni iwaiya mema woraandae. Ngicngac yeac wegenac kecandae, yeneng desofoc ammidae.
Ge ngabafora marifoingina memiacna dzikacfu serigec ngabafora sasawa sogaigecdeac sing meficgeyemmenec.
Fora, ge ngictau dzikacfu mi nanggenec nga yeac dzikacac beang, imocac enara merenna ngadeaubigeng kenec.
Ge ngictau yasuya mariaunac wangecma ngictau tataha bangecfu ukuna maec.
Ye sebigbori kecmanu ge wenahaac kpete mewegenena homac mi anec. Ye game kpekpeu faina imocngo ye semeu kecde. Selac
O KEBU, ge mesufuemema monggoc kicninau fingecnadeac tomai kecduae. Ge nasoya nasoya ifi sufuma kecnade, ifi isoc ande. Geac herebu gerec isoc dzekecde, imoc wisickeudeac tomai kecduae.
O Kebu, kekecna imoc wegenacnecsac ande, imoc negenna febeso. Ge ngicac medacfora fainununa eng fingecma kpac annide.
Ngic mong ye keengkecma mi homeude, ifia mong mi kecde, kpac. Homec amau ngic kucgoc meyunugec ngic mongngo imohacnac naric mi mesiude. Selac
O Kebu, geng yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecnec nga yoacga modackecnec, imoc warac Dawidi deserima desiminec, imocac fora hofocduae.
O Kebu, yeni ni, kingang ngicga deendema anengandae, imoc negenna febeso. Ngicngac yeneng deendema anenggec ebic imoc herenau tofohokecduae.
O KEBU, ge ngictau meisinnuma kerec nadzicnennec nga ngabafocna yeneng ine deendema anengandae. Ni sing tikengkecba yeneng hanititina hemmodacma desusuic anemma yoac mangana denenggecde.
KEBU nasoya nasoya kenehebesonga. Imoc fora nga fora yombong.
O Kebu, neni fingecsahenina bic fekefec, geng yeneac sufu sufuamangina angkecnec.
Ge Anutu, tiki mi fingecmagec geng marigango bangec nga bangectoa bangec mi meficgemangoc imohai bic kecnec. Ge nasoya nasoya kecnec nga kecbesannec.
Geng yoac dena ngic yeni monggoc sendung anggecde. Ge yofi deannec, “Ngicac nambarac, ngeni monggoc bangecfu dzigenema sendung ambisia.”
Imoc yofiac, kifa tauseng imocngo geac kicfu uameme mocgu kemma bic kpac andac, ifi isoc ande. Imoc tofocnac monggac noboha isoc ande.
Ge ngic wanggenununa seuc isoc kengandimbe nga kekecnina imoc gau negengandimbe, ifi isoc ande. Kpindzingngo asoac gborima monggoc ereande, ifi isoc.
Imocngo asoac gboria nga sabayagoc anu marai anu sokuema ururueude.
Geac herebungo neni memanganenunuu kpac andimbe. Geac heregerecngo ebicfu fainunuu kecdimbe.
Neni ngicngac ogofocnina memanganeyununi geng wiac imoc kicgau arenggema hengkecnec. Nga kopocsic sufu sufuu meficgeing, ge imoc kicgaac kperagiu faina feu hengkecnec.
Anu kekecninaac uameme sasawa geac herebugaac bageau kecni nasonina kpac anude. Ngicngo asoringa ammiu kpac angande, neni kifanina ifi isoc kecni kpac andarude.
Kekecninaac kpete imoc kifa 70 me kucnina feudeu kifa 80 kecnide. Kifa imocac manau kekecnina gombunga yombong kecandimbe, imohai ine ebic nga ubahodunggoc ifingoc kecandimbe. Kifanina bic meickegec kpac andaru neni kpututukema kendacnide.
Ngic mongngo geac ngabagaac kuc mi negensiude, kpac. Kengecgoc geac eweheihei kuneng anggembesonga nga heregerecga kuneng imoc ifingoc imocacsoc ande.
Kekecnina uameme dafigucacsoc fede, imoc negensinideac wiac imoc kpounemmena. Ge ifi anna neni hereninango negen negentegecgoc anude.
O KEBU, ge monggoc dzigenena. Naso dafiguc monggoc geac tomai tacbesonga? Ge kingang ngicfocga neneac ubaga manganeu.
Neni uameme kecnidesoc sogac sogaigoc kecma ubangerec negennideac amma geng yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecnec, imoc asoacngoc mewakenunubesena.
Ge wenac homac ebicfu fainununec, uameme ifi isocngoc ubangerec nemmena. Neni kifa homac yarefaka hengkefing, imocacsoc ifingoc kifa ubangerecgoc meficgenemmena.
Geng ua mekecnec, imoc kingangngicfocga nenearu didiu edzacnunuma kucga damu damuyagoc imoc esamedacfocninango hembisia.
Kebu Anutuninaac ubangerecngo semennunubeso. Ge marininaac ua tataha meficgena seria febeso. Fora, ge marininango ua meandimbe, imoc tataha meficgena seria febeso.
Anutu Engenatoango ngic mong garenggema mesufuu yeng Kuctoa minginaac debannu kecnegeng kecande,
ye KEBU edeude, “Ge sufu sufuamana nga amana seria, ge Anutuna nga ni negenseriguma kecduae.”
Ye nengmeme ngic yeac botacfunac mesiguude nga homecac hafei manganango memanganegubaac yeng onggongguude.
Ye kpegang dzoeango kperacguu geng yeac kpeganga bageau sufuma kecnade. Ye yoac modac modac Kebu nga fakaya imocngo geac kasoga amma odaga seria ande.
Ge tofocnac wiac mong manganaac kengec mi annade nga wenacfu tebemedahaac kengectoa amma naric mi kpidohonade.
Hafeitoa kundung manau haande, imocac kengec naric mi amma homecac hafei mangana wenacfu fingecma yunuande, imocac kengec mi annade.
Ngic tauseng yeneng hoanggau namma homegec ten tauseng yeneng foigaugeng namma homegecdeu wiac mangana mongngo gearu naric mi fingerude.
Ge kicgango yenemmana ngic Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, yeni angammemenginaac amma turunga megecde.
Geng yofi denec, “Ni KEBUAC hoannu sufuma kecduae nga Kebu Engenatoa ye kecnegeng amana.”
Yarefakaac ebicngo gearu naric mi hau ebic mangana mongngo geac kporuc amagaac wegenac naric mi haude.
Ye angerofora uayoac yemmeu yeneng sing sasawa kengkecnec, imohai garenggugecde.
Ge haniga hocngo heibacac yeneng maringina witiau faiguma sesehegugecde.
Ge raiong yangtoa witiau nga kpate witingirau eng tikemma raiong sebigbori nga boidzocac witingirau tima tidzameyununade.
Kebungo yofi dede, “Ye neac songo negemma nigoc kpeketahema kecdeac ebicfunac mesibade. Ye neac kpac kuneng negendeac neng henggareng amma ongonggebade.
Ye kpacnuu ni turunga meremmibade. Ye ebic witiau kefu ni yegoc kecma ebicfunac mesima eweheihei ammibade.
Ni kekeha mehereeba kecma gebeckpeu memengerecna edzahabade.”

O KEBU, ge Engenatoa. Ni ubangerec negemma geac kpac kuneng heiwayong memima yegec heigemba, faka imocngo ngereede.
Geng yoac dedzege amma imoc modacnade, imoc asoac dekperagibade. Nga ge yoac modac modac Kebu, imoc tofocnac dekperagima
gita witiha tengngo kpema udumeng mema kurere hania hania kpema udumeng yumiango geac kpac kuneng heiwayong memibade, imocngo wiac ubangerehagoc ande.
O KEBU, geng ua mekecnec, imocngo ubangerec meficgenenu marigango ua menec, imoc hentegecma sogac sogaiac yegec heibade.
O KEBU, geng ua meannec, imoc bibiagoc nga geac negen negeng imoc engena nga keme kemea yombong.
Ngic kapayango imoc naric mi negenude nga ngic negen negenga kpac, ye wiac yomoc naric mi negentegerude.
Imoc ine yofi, ngic yeneng Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, yeni kpindzing isoc erema sabanginagoc anggecde nga yarengic yeni faka mangana angkecma yadiseri anggecde. Nga yeneng yoacngina bic desigec fede, yeni manganaac areng deyec deyecmea.
O KEBU, gennoc engenatoa nga ge nasoya nasoya ifi kechereema kecbesannec.
Foracngoc, KEBU, geac ngabafocga yeni homecac areng andae nga yarengic sasawa yeni singsararang kpegecde.
Kateburumakango kuhagoc kecande, ge sifu kuc ifia nemma nanggenuna kucgoc amma firang ambade. Ge kerec gombunga kpakema nadzicnennec.
Ni kic fima ngabafocna mayunuu yenenai. Nga yarengic yeneng wegenac hama nubeso anggec, yeni kopocsicnginaac turunga ebira megec, imoc kedzacnango negenai.
Ngic dindingac yeneng pam ic gombunga sabayagoc, ifi isoc andae. Yeni Rebanong bangecac yomondzoc ic herea yadiseri angande, ifi isoc yadiseri anggecde.
Yeni ic isoc KEBUAC amau homehomera, yeni Anutuac amasobennu sabanginagoc anggecde.
Yeni esea anggecde, fora. Nga yeni sifu fora meficgema maringina besaima fora homac gbarigoc angkecma
yofi degecde, “KEBU ye faka angammemea dindingac. Yeng neac hoc peperandzi seria yombong nga yearu faka mangana mong mi fede.”
KEBUNGO ngictauac kuc, imoc ngakpi isoc heiu kemeu ngicngac garengyunuude. Ye ngictauac kuc heiu ngakpia ande. Ye kuha bic heima kebangau dzegeec. O, yeng bangectoa bangec tatahau faiu seria tacdeac wiac mongngo meu goroc goroc naric mi anude.
O KEBU, geng ngictau tatacga bicngoc tatahau faina seria feu ge nasoya nasoya kecnec nga kecbesannec.
O KEBU, dokutoa yeneng ubaudumeng miacgec, dokutoa yeneng ubaudumengngina miacgec, dokutoa yeneng kucgoc arohoma ubaudumengngina miacgec.
KEBU wi kecde, ye damu damuyagoc. Ye doku dundung yeneac udumeng ferahama kondung siri yeneac kuc ifingoc ferahade.
O KEBU, geac singyoac imoc sasawa seria nga fora. Geac amau nasoya nasoya kpetiac feengkecbeso.
O KEBU, ge turung kpoukpou Anutu. Turung kpoukpouac Anutu, ge kperagigagoc fingectegecna.
O bangecac desi desi ngic, ge yacna. Ngic goa yenanggac negenggec engena angkecde, geng ngic imoc angammemenginaac turunga merengyemmebesena.
O KEBU, ngic Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, yeni nasoherec bic kecgecac nasongina kpac anudeac tomai kecduae. Yeni naso herea bic kecma ngicngac yeneac ebicac amma sogaima kecandaeac nasona herecgena kpac ambeso.
Yeni enacnginaunac ubakpekpe yoac makecde nga yarengic sasawa yeni sebingina meemma yoac homac osokecdae.
O KEBU yeni geac ngicngacfocga kpedzameyunuma maridzomingfocga kpendzennu faiyunuma
ngac hodzec nga kuricngic yunuma beging kpebucyunuma
yofi deandae, “KEBU ye naric mi nenenude nga Yakoboac Anutungo imoc naric mi negensiude.”
Ngicngac ubafong, ngeni kedzac faima yoacna negembisia. Oboc kpobocngic, ngeni negen negenggoc anggecdeac yoac edengunubade.
Anutungo kedzac ngicfu faiu fede amma ye wiac imoc naric negenude. Nga kic imoc Anutuac marikibi. Imocac ye wiac imoc henudengoc.
Yennoc bangeha bangeha ngicngac areng kpemeting ayemmema yunuude. Ye negen negeng minginango ngicngac kpouyemmeu yeneng negen negeng arenggegecde.
KEBUNGO ngicngac negen negennina negendacde. Ye ngicngac negen negengngina hennegeng amma negenu imoc uaya kpac. Nenang asu mocgu taiandimbe, ifi isoc.
O KEBU, ge ngic mong kopocsicac kpemeting amma dedeseriyoacga edekpou ammiannec, ngic imoc ye kenehagoc.
Geng ruae mina ebicnaso mong mi henude. Nga ngic goa Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, yeneng ine kecma kemegecdeac amma teng usuyemmegecde.
KEBUNGO ngicngacfora mi ngadeyunuma wayunuude. Ye maridzomingfora naric mi wayunuude.
Ngic mong ye sing dindingac modarude, imohai desi desingic yeneng yeac yoac sing dindingacfu desima monggoc degecde. Ngicngac herenginau ikoc nga hamangec mong mi fede, yeneng desi desi yoac dindingac imoc modacgecde.
Ngic goa yeni Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande. Nga merang ni meficnuude nga merang yacma kicnginau nanude? Ni imocac tomai kecduae. Ngic mongngo meficnuma yarengic yeneac kicfu nanudeac tomai kecduae.
KEBUNGO hama ni mi meficnubacfu ubaonganango bic kemema ngicac ubaudumenga kpacfu nga kicsereu febac.
Ni yofi deai, “Hanina pososoc anu manubeso ande.” O KEBU, ni ifi debareng fakaga modacma yoac dedzege amma imoc modacma nanggenunec, imohai mi manuec.
Herenau negengyohoc homac mekecba geng meserinuma ubaonganaac ubangerec meficgenennec.
Ngicenara goa yeni Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, yeneng geac ogofocga naric mi anggecde. Yeni singyoac hania hania ohoandae, imocngo ngicngac ogofocngina faitobang ayemmema memangnaneyunugecde.
Yeni ngic dindingac kpehomegecdeac yoac dedzege angkecma ngic kopocsiha kpac homecac arennnu desigecde.
Anu KEBU ye neac ama seria nga Anutuna. Ye neac hoc peperandzi seria amma sufu sufuamana.
Ngicngac yeneng ogofocngina memanganeyunugec yeng imocac turunga kpouyemmeude. Yeni Anutu wama faka mangana meandaeac yeng meicyunuu kpac anggecde. KEBU Anutuninango meicyunuude.
Hagec, KEBUAC yegec heima oeha memini. Ye hoc peperandzi serinina nga memengerecnina. Nenang sogaima yeac yegec dendzerenggema heima
yeac hoannu kemma ye ubangerec memibisina. Neni yeac afe afeheyegec sogaima dendzerenggema heibisina.
KEBU ye Anutu engena yombong, ye anutu sasawa yeneac ngictau engenatoa.
Yeng bangectoa bangec manau keme kemea fede, imoc mariau mema garenggeude. Bangec kperec kperemenga nga tiki sasawa imoc yeac.
Yennoc kondung meec, imocac amma kondung imoc yeacngoc. Amma yeng bangec kerenga meu imocngo yeac marikibi ande.
Hagec ngonducnema numumini. KEBUNGO meficnunuec, nenang yeac kicfu fafoc heimini.
Ye Anutunina nga nenang yeac ngicngacfora. Ye yengena odayau fainunuma nenenggareng angkefu ramafora anni yeng mariango menunuu kecdimbe. O, ngeni yaguc kedzac kpema yeac enacudumeng negembau, imocac yombong anende.
Mang esafocngina yeni Meriba dokuu ubaseri amma Massa bangecfu kecgec, naso imohai bangec kisiu faka anggec, ngeni ifi isoc mi ambisia.
Ni faka kuhagoc meba yeni imoc hengkecgec, imoc fora. Nga yeni sifu tobannuma faitobannu fainugec.
Ifi anggec ni kifa 40 ngicngac areng yeneac modzona tiu yofi deai, “Ngicngac imoc yeni ubaherenginau sing segema neac sing ngadehema kecdae.”
Imocac ni yeneac ngaba amma yofi deserima deai, “Yeni neac kecnegeng kekecfu naric mi enggecde.”
KEBUAC yegec gboria heimibesonga. Bangectoa bangec, ge KEBU yegec gboria heimibesena.
KEBU oeha mema yegec heimima yeac kpac kuneng kenehebesonga. Ngeni wenaha wenaha memengerec uayaac yoac edeyunukecbisia.
Kebu ye kuc nga kibikperagiagoc, imoc bangeha bangeha ngicngac areng botucnginau dekperagima edeyunugec yeng kucfaka bibiagoc meec, imoc ngiha ngiha botucnginau edeyunubisia.
KEBU ye engenatoa nga ye oyang boyang memibesonga. Ye tatahau wi yombong tacma anutu hania hania feracyunudacdeac ye kengec nga eweheiheigoc hoanggebesonga.
KEBUNGO kurumenga kurumenga meficyunuec. Nga bangec monnunac ngicngac, yeneac anutufocngina hania hania, yeni ine nemuongasac andacdae.
Eweheihei nga ngictauac kuctoa kibikperagiagoc imoc KEBUARU fede. Yeac kpetiac amau kuc nga kibikperagia fede.
Ngiha ngiha arengnginagoc kecdae, ngeni KEBU dengerema yeac kuc nga kibikperagia afehebisia.
KEBUAC kpac kuneng imoc kuhagoc nga kibikperagiagoc. Imoc eweheiheigoc hoanggebesonga. Ngeni sese mema yeac amawomongau hama meembisia.
Ngeni kpetiac kekec heigec kemeu siricngina gombunga anu KEBU numumibisia. Bangectoa bangecac ngicngac areng, ngeni yeac kicfu kengec amma dzonong fede fedegoc nambisia.
Ngeni bangec monnunac ngicngac Anutu mi negemmidae, yeneac botucfu yoac yofi dekperagiyemmebisia, “KEBU ye ngictau. Ye kuc imoc mekecma garengyununuma kecde. Foracngoc, ye bangectoa bangec tatahau faiec, imoc nasoya nasoya seria feu wiac mongngo meu goroc goroc naric mi anude. Ye monde mondea kpac kecma ngiha ngiha faka angammemengina yoacfu isinggema desiude.”
Kurumenga kurumenga ngeni ubangerec negenggec bangecngo sogaibeso. Kondung nga wiac sasawa imohai wakema fedacdae, ngeni udumeng kuneng meficgebisia.
Maneng nga semeng ua nga wiac sasawa imohai fedacdae, ngeni sogaibisia. Nga kateu ic sasawa, ngeni sogac sogaiac yegec heibisia.
KEBUNGO hadeac amma yeac kicfu sogaibisia. Ye bangecfu desi desi ua meudeac hama bangec sasawa faka dindingacfu isingyunuma ngiha ngiha faka forau yoacngina desiude.
KEBU ye ngictauac kuc minginango bangectoa bangec garenggema kecde. Imocac bangecngo sogaibeso nga kondung tegiau bangec fekendae, yeni ubangerecgoc kecbisia.
Hoeng nga kundung kunengngo ye oronggema fedape. Faka dindingac nga sing dindingac, imocngo yeac ngictautatahaac sering seria.
Gerecngo waraimiu ngabafora noboc noboc ye oronggeandae, yeni yonohodarude.
Yeac piratacngo bangectoa bangec mekperagiu bangec ye imoc hemma dendeng kpeude.
Bangec sasawaac KEBU hau tiki yeni KEBUAC kicfu pereckema kendo kereha sisingaiande, ifi isoc sisingaigecde.
Kurumenga kurumenga yeni yeac faka dindingac dekperagigec ngiha ngiha yeneng yeac kuc nga kibikperagia henggecde.
Ngic yeni nemuongaac kicfu ngonducnema numuyemmeandae nga imocac negenggec wiac engena yombong anu yoac homac osoandae. Nga nemuongangina yeni wiac fora mi meficgeyemmegecde, kpac. Yeni game kpekpeu faiyunugec eng nanggecde. Nga anutu hania hania yeni Kebuac kicfu ngonducnemigecde.
Ge anutu hania hania isingyunuma yoacngina desinadeac Siong ye imoc negemma ubangerec meficgeu Yudaac ngacnaroang yeni sogaigecde.
O KEBU, ge Anutu engenatoa yombong nga bangec sasawaac ngic kunenga. Ge anutu hania hania feracyunudacnecac afeguyombonggeni.
KEBUNGO kpetiac ngicngacfora kekecngina onggonggeude. Ngic yeni yarefaka henggec imocac modzongina tiande, KEBUNGO yeni songogoc hoangyunuude. Ngic goa Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, yeng ngicfora yeneac mariunac mesiyunuude.
Ngicngac dindingac kecandae, yenearu ama wereckenude. Nga ngicngac uba kongahagoc kecdae amma herenginau ikoc nga hamangec mong mi fede, yeni sogac sogai meficgegecde.
Ngicngac dindingac ngeni KEBUAC sogac sogaigoc kecma yeac kpara kpetiac yaiyo kpemibisia.
KEBUNGO faka kuhagoc nga bibiagoc meu yegec gboria heimibesonga. Ye marifoia nga fuaya kpetiac sinema ngabafora feracyunuma firang anec.
KEBUNGO firang bic anec, imoc dekperagiyemmeec. Ye faka dindingac modacma ngicngac yoacngina dema nanggeyunuec, imoc bangec monnunac ngicngac ye mi negemmidae, yeni imoc didiu edzacyunuu yeni imoc kicnginango henggec.
Ye Israe habu yenigoc yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecde, ye imoc negenu fekecde nga ye yoara modarudeac faka mong mi nigeckpeec. Anutuninango firang anec, imoc ngicngac bangec tegiau fekendae, yeneng henggec.
Bangecfu ngicngac sasawa, ngeni sogaima KEBU dendzerenggema yegec heimibisia. Ngeni dendzerenggema oeha memima yegec heimima kpara heiwayong memibisia.
Ngeni gita kpema KEBUAC yegec heibisia. Ngeni gita kpegec yegec udumenga gombunga fingecbeso.
Ngeni trampet nga tomengtoa fifigec musi udumeng gombunga fingecbeso. Ngeni KEBU ngictauninaac kicfu kecma yegec dendzerenggema sogac sogaigoc heimibisia.
Kondung, ge nga geac manau wiac sasawa fedae, ngeni udumengtoa meficgebisia. Bangectoa bangec nga imocac manau kecdae, ngeni ifingoc udumeng kuneng meficgebisia.
Doku ngeni mari kpegec tiki ngeni sogaima yegec ngenahafoc heibisia.
KEBUNGO desi desi ua meudeac bangecfu hade. Imocac yeac kicfu yegec heibisia. Ye faka dindingacfu bangectoa bangecac ngicngac areng isingyunuma yoacngina desima monde mondea kpac kecma ngiha ngiha faka angammemengina isinggema yoacfu desiude.
KEBU ye ngictau amma ye ngiha ngiha garengyunuu yeni dzonong fede fedegoc kecbisia. Ye kerobing botucnginau ngictau tatahau taru usocngo bangecfu mebeso.
KEBU ye Siong manau kunennina kecde. Ye engena amma ngiha ngiha sasawa feracyunuude.
Geac kpacga imoc damu damuyagoc. Yeneng imoc dengerebisia. Kebu ye kpetiac.
Ngictau ye kuctoayagoc. Ye faka dindingac fingerudeac ammide. Geng faka mongang mongangga kpac, imoc faina seria fede. Ge Yakoboac areng yeneac botucfu faka angammemengina isinggema yoacfu desima sing dindingac modacma yoacngina desinec.
KEBU Anutunina ye kpetiac. Ngeni afehema yeac haniaac tatacfu ngonducnema numumibisia.
Mose nga Arong yereng yeac womong gareng habugoc kefoc nga Samue ye yeac kpac kuneng kpacma nunumu ua mekefec. Yeni desambic ammigec yeng negengyemmema turunga merengyemmekefec.
KEBUNGO hoeng mong hereatoaac manau tacma yoac edeyunuu yeni yeac dedekperagiyoac nga singyoac tofohoma kecgec.
O KEBU Anutunina, geng ngicngac nunumunginaac turunga merengyemmenec. Ge kopocsic wawa Anutungina amma kopocsicnginaac turunga ifingoc merengyemmenec.
KEBU Anutunina ye kpetiac. Ngeni imocac amma afehema tiki kpetiacfu emma fafoc heimima numumibisia.
Bangec sasawa, ngeni KEBU dendzerenggema sogac sogai yegec heimibisia.
Ngeni KEBU ubangerecgoc kingang kpemima sogac sogaiac yegecgoc yeac kicfu habisia.
KEBU ye Anutu, ngeni imoc negembisia. Yennoc meficnunuma menunuu nenang yeac ngicngac areng andimbe. Nga yeac ngicngac areng amma yeac rama habufora amma yeac oda manau kecdimbe.
Ye ubangerec ammima yeac nagutoau embesonga amma ama sobengau dedengerecac yegec heibesonga. Yeac ubangerec dema yeac kpac kuneng kenehebesonga.
KEBU ye gombunga. Yeng yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecde, fakaya imoc nasoya nasoya feengkefude. Ye yoara modackecde, imocngo fingecsahengina fekefudesoc, yenearu feengkefude.
O KEBU, gearu yoac modac modac faka fede. Nga sing dindingac modacma yoacngina desinade, imocac yegec heigembade.
Ni kopocsiha kpac kecma sing imohai kengkecbadeac negensima kecduae. O, ge dafinenggac nearu hanade? Ni ngic ogofocna mong mi memanganeyunuma herenau dindingac nga kopocsicna kpac kecma amanau kecbade.
Wiac mongngo sinna gombunga memanganenuudeacsoc anu ni kic imohai naric mi fibade. Ngicngac sing segema negen negensingngina kpac kecandae, yeneac uaac modzona tiu wiac imocngo nigoc mi kpeketaheude.
Herenau sing gombunga modacma imoc naric mi wabade nga kekec mangana imoc nigoc kpac. Yare faka hania hania, imocac negen negeng nearu mi febeso.
Mong ye ogea wegenac kecma yeac ngadeyoac sufu sufuu deude, ni ngic ifia memanganeba kpac ambeso. Ngic mong ye yengenaac negenu wiac engena anu ngic ogofora yenemma yeneac negenu mamea angande nga hereau ubakpekpe faka meande, yeac modzona tiude.
Bangecnau yoac modac modac ngic nigoc kecgecdeac kicna yenearu fima negemba ngereeude. Mong ye kopocsiha kpac kecande, yeng neac kingang ngic amma uana mebeso.
Ngic mong ye faitobang amma ngicngac ikocfu faiyunuande, yeng neac amau mi kecbeso. Nga ngic mong ikocyoac deande, yeng neac hoannu naric mi kefude.
Ngic Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, yeni asoacsoc bangecfu memanganeyunudacba kpac anggecde. Ni yarengic sasawa meicyunuba kpac anggecde. Yeni KEBUAC taonnu mi kecbisia.

O KEBU, ge nunumuna negenna memeficac kiacba imocngo gearu habeso.
Ge neac ebicnasou kicga nearu mi sufuma kedzacga nearu faina. Ni kpacguba turunga bic merennenna.
Uamemena imoc hosuc ereande, ifi isoc erema kpac anggec sicnango gerea yombong amma gerec isoc dzekecde.
Kpindzing herecgegec dzanggema homeande, herenango ifi isoc dzanggede. Kucna kpac yombong anu yaka nenena nigecnude.
Ni kpendzeng kpema kunengngoc arohoduaeac amma sebi fusinango kemma sicnau kpeketahade.
Ni bangec gbangge gbanggeau kpendzo neng isoc anduae nga kpabekuruc mong amabangec sesuhau kecde, ifi isoc kecduae.
Ni gaugbori kecba neng mongngo ama witiau tembuha tacande, imoc isoc anduae.
Ngabafocna yeneng asoacnac kemma marai game kpekpeu fainuma deendema anemma kpacna soweckegecde.
Ni ic sogong nebadeac anenu hamango yakana angkecde nga kickumanango sokocfu kemema dokuna anu nekecduae.
Ge ubaga manganeu ngaba anennec, imocac menu emma ukununa mayai.
Uamemena sasawa maraiac onganinango hereeande, ifi isoc ande nga ni kpindzing isoc homema dzanggeduae.
O KEBU, ge nasoya nasoya ngictau tatacgau tacna geac kpac kuneng imoc ngicngac fingecsahenina fekefudesoc, nenearu feengkefude.
Ge monggoc yacma Sionggac ubaga manganeu. Yagucnoc ubamangang amminadeac naso memea hade.
Kingang ngicngacfocga yeneng Sionggac hoc songea negemma yeac sendunggac ubamangang negendae.
Bangeha bangeha ngicngac yeneng KEBUAC kpac kunenggac kengec amma eweheimigec bangecfu ngictau sasawa yeneng geac kuc nga kibikperagigaac ewea heibisia.
KEBUNGO Siong ama monggoc mema heigboriu kuc kibikperagiagoc fingectegeru henggecde.
Ye ngicngac makpekpea neneac nunumuac kedzac faiu wiacac desambic ammini imoc naric mi waude.
Ngicngac fingecsahe ngade anggecde, yeneac amma yoac yomoc kibiu ohogec ngicngac yeneng ngade fingecma KEBU eriendzong memibisia.
“Ye yengena kpetiac tikiau wi tacma kiwa fiu maec. KEBUNGO kurumennunac kiwa fima bangec henec.
Ngic witicamau kecdae, yeng kiacngina negemma kiwa bangecfu fima homecac areng yungecyunuudeac kiwa fiu maec.”
Ifi anu KEBUAC kpac kuneng Siong taonnu dekperagibesonga nga Yerusarennu eriendzong memibesonga.
Ngiha ngiha yeni ngictau areng yenigoc kpeturanggema KEBUAC kicfu ngonducnema numumigecde.
Ye kucna dzongiau memama uameme nasona mewegeneu
deai, “O Anutuna, ge kifaga nasoya nasoya ngicngac fingecsahengina fekefudesoc, imoc feracyunuma feengkefude. Ge uameme nasona dzongiau herecgema mi meicnuna.”
Ge hanac hanaheaunacngoc kecma bangecac titiseri fainec seria fede. Kurumenga kurumenga yeni geangga marikibinoc.
Wiac imoc sasawa yeni kpac anggec, fora. Nga ge sifu kecengkecnade. Yeni ngakpi isoc esea anggecde nga wamba hesikpe amma ukuandimbe, ge ifi isoc wayunuma gboria fainade.
Geng nasoya nasoya siric ifiangoc kecengkecnade nga geac kifaga imoc wisic wisickea kpac.
Geac kingang ngicfocga yeneac nambaracfocngina, yeneng geac hoannu kecgec geng esamedacfocngina hoanggau faiyununa yeneng gegoc serima kecgecde.
O ubaongana, ge KEBU kenehena. Wiac sasawa neac manau fede, imocngo yeac kpara kpetiac kenehebeso.
O ubaongana, ge KEBU kenehena. Yeng faka gombunga anggenec, imoc mi nigecgubeso.
Geng ngicngac ogofocga memanganeyununa yennoc kopocsicga imoc waude. Ye hafeidzoicga sasawa mengerema
kekecga bummema homecfunac mesiude. Yeng yoac dedzege amma imoc modacma wosoefac anggenu imocngo kekecgau iraga isoc anude.
Ge wiac monggac anggenu yeng wiac kereng kereng genu soha anu naric yombong kecnade. Huntoc neng ye dzoea heigboriu sebigbori isoc angande, imoc isoc sebiga monggoc gboriude.
KEBUNGO ngic garengyunuu goango ngic ogofocngina ebicfu faiyunugec ubaebicgoc kecgec yeng sing dindingac modacma yoacngina faka dindingacfu isinggema desiude.
Ye singa Mose edzahama uaya mema Israe habu imoc edzacyunuec.
KEBUNGO wosoefac anemmema neneac ubamangang negemma ngaba bic mi anude. Ye yoac dedzege amma imoc modackecde, faka imocngo yearu wiac engena.
Ye nasosoc mesuninau mi nunukefude nga ye ngaba nasoya nasoya mi mekefude.
Nenang kopocsic meficgeing, ye imocacsoc faka mi anemmeude nga fakanina manganaac siricfu turunga mi kpounemmeude.
Ngicngac yeneng eweheimigec yeng yoac yenigoc dedzege amma imoc modarude. Yeac faka siriha yofi, kurumenga kurumenga yeni bangec ferahama wi enggec fedae, ye ifi isoc ngicngacfora yeneac songo efea kpac negenude.
Wenac ere erea imocngo keme kemeagoc wegenac naric mi tacde, imoc herea yombong. Nenang singyoac kpema mangana meficgeing, ifi isoc imoc meickeu nenanggac hereau kenude.
Manggac mongngo nambaracfora yeneac ubea manganeu hoangyunuande, ye ifi isoc ngicngac KEBU eweheimiandae, yeneac ubamangang negemma hoangyunuude.
Nga dafiu fingering, imoc yeng negende. Nenang sendungsac, ye imoc negennu fede.
Kpindzingngo manennu kpafuya kpeande, imoc uameme nasoya wegenacsac ande. Nga bangecfu ngic ye uameme nasoya ifi isoc ande. Dzaring dzuria sabayagoc anu
firangngo mefiranggeu morongge mama kpac anu wiac imoc tacande, tatahango imoc monggoc mi negenude. Ngic ye kekeha bangecfu ifi isoc ande, fora.
Nga KEBUNGO sifu yoac dedzege amma imoc modarude. Ngicngac yeneng eweheihei ammigec yeng nasoya nasoya hoangyunuma kecengkefude, fakaya dindingac imocngo nambarac nga esamedacfocngina fingecgecdesoc, yenearu fekefude.
Nga ngicngac yeneng yeac dzadzahac seria modacgec yeng ifi ayemmeude. Nga ngicngac yeac nonoyoac negenggec fede, yeni ifingoc ifi ayemmeude.
KEBUNGO ngictau tataha kurumenga kurumenga fekendaeu tatahau faiu seria nande. Ye ngictau amma eucererenga wiac sasawa feracyunuma mingina ande.
O KEBUAC angero, ngeni ye kenehebisia. Yeac areng kucnginagocngo yeac yoac negengkecma yoara tofohoma ua mekecdae nga yeac ubaudumeng negenggecdeac kedzac kpeandae, ngeni ye kenehebisia.
Kurumenggac wasai arengfora nga kingang ngicngacfora yeac songo modacandae, ngeni KEBU kenehebisia.
KEBUAC marikibifora sasawa bangecfu yeac bageau kecdae, ngeni sasawango KEBU kenehebisia. O ubaongana, ge KEBU kenehena.
O ubaongana, ge KEBU kenehena. O KEBU, Anutuna, ge engenatoa yombong amma eweheihei nga ngictauac kuc kibikperagiagoc heima kecannec.
Ngicngac yeneng wamba heiandae, ge ifi isoc kperagiango kperacemema kecnec. Geng kurumenga kurumenga meficyunuma kporucbedzo isoc kpedziyununa fekendae.
Ge ama managaac kpete doku witiau mena hoeng imoc geac keretac anu geng firanggac kpegang mema witiau tacma kisanna firangngo meguma kenude.
Geng firang sueyununa yeneng yoacga mema kenggec gerecborang uayoac edeyununa yeneng kingang kpegenggecde.
Geng bangec mena imocngo goroc goroc amma kengha ambacac ge imoc titiseria tatahau fainecac wiac mongngo meu goroc goroc naric mi anude.
Geng dzohongtoa mema imocngo bangec kperahana kporuc isoc heiu kemeu dokungo tiki feracyunuma feu
geng doku yoac ngabasiric edeyununa yeni kengec amma woradacgec. Ge parandanggac mingina nga doku yeneng geac parandang udumeng negemma kengecyunuu woragec.
Ge tiki kperemeng tatacngina deseriyemmena tiki yeni yacgec kperemeng yeni kemema ihai fegecde.
Geng kpetengina faina feu bangec monggoc semebauac ferahegecdeac kpae heiyemmenec.
Ge bangec keme kemeau doku kiwa faina doku kucgoc hakecma tiki botucnginau mama feec.
Fema manennu yang sasawa doku gumecyunuu nekecgec kateu donggi yeneng dokuac homema doku imoc nekecgecde.
Kateu neng yeneng faecngina doku tegiau mema ihai fema ic fawau tacma arohogecde.
Ge wi amagau tacma tikiu doku kpema uaga mema kecna foragoc anu bangecngo fora negebec anude.
Geng kpindzing dena fingeru ramaburumakango imoc negecde. Geng dzaring nga semeng meficgena fingeru ngicngac neneng semeng ua meni bangecfu yaka fingerudeac edena neandimbe.
Ngichereu ubangerec fingerudeac waing meficgenec nga ngicngac kicsiricnina pirac pirac anudeac geng kerec meficgenec. Amma ngicngac herengina kucgoc anudeac yaka meficgema yemmenec.
KEBUNGO Rebanong bangecac yomondzoc ic homecyunuma doku efea kpac kpeyemmeu nekecgec
neng yeneng faecngina ihai megec kpendzo neng ye faeha yomondzoc icfu mema ihai fekecde.
Tiki kuneng herea yeneng kate noning yeneac amabangec nga mandzang yeneng hoc peperandzi singau sufuma kecgecde.
Geng afo faina imocngo kifasoc kecnideac kpete angkefu wenac yengenaocngoc keme keme nasoya negenude.
Geng kundung faina ama toforeu kateu yang yeneng kenghaanggecde.
Raiong yang sebigbori yeni Anutungo yakangina meficgeudeac negemma yang yunuma negecdeac kucgoc arohogecde.
Wenac ereu yeni monggoc meickema faecnginau kemma fegecde.
Imohai ngicngo ama uayau kemma ua mema kefu ama marai anude.
O KEBU, ge wiac hania hania medacnec, imocac kpetea engena yombong. Ge negen negentegecgango imoc sasawa mena wiac sasawa kekecnginagoc yeneng geac marikibiga amma bangec mewakedae.
Kondung ye kuneng kpererema edi feu kondungyang nga yang kuneng kapia hania hania homac yombong imocac manau fedae, yeneac kpete naric mi osodacnide.
Wage yeni imohai kengha angkecdae. Nga geng kondunggac kondungyang kuneng ifingoc meficyununa yeneng kondunnu yuengyuma anggecde.
Wiac imoc sasawa yeni kicngina gearu figec geng nasoya hau yaka yemmenadeac negeung kecgec
geng wiac yemmena imoc mekecgecde. Geng mariga mederena yeni wiac gombunga homac negebec angkecdae.
Ge kicga yenearu sufuna yeni kpidohoma kengecyunuude. Ge asungina wangecyununa yeni homema bangecnginau monggoc dzigenegecde.
Geng meficyunuma Asuga monggoc fifina yeneng monggoc gborigecde. Ge bangecac siriha heigborikecna monggoc gboria fingerude.
KEBUAC kuc nga kibikperagi imoc nasoya nasoya feengkecbeso. KEBUNGO marikibia hemma ubangerec negembeso.
Yeng kiwa bangecfu fiu bangecngo dendeng kpeu mariango tiki kpesereyunuu tikingo hosuc kpegecde.
Ni kekecna kecbadesoc KEBU yegec heimibade. Ni kekecna kecma Anutu dengerekecbadengoc.
Ni KEBUARU sogac sogai meficgekecma yeac wiac hennegeng angkecba yeng imocac negenu ngereebeso.
Ngic kopocsicgoc bangecfunac meicyunubesonga nga ngic Anutu ngadehema mangana megecdeac ayemmeande, yeni kpac ambisia. O ubaongana, ge KEBU kenehena. KEBU eriendzong memini, hallelu Yac.
O ngicngac, KEBU ubangerec memima yeac kpac kuneng hofocbesonga. Yeng ua sasawa meande, imoc ngiha ngiha dekperagiyemmema edeyunugec yeneng imoc negendacbisia.
Ngeni yeac yegec heimibisia. Ngeni dedengerec yegec heimima yeng ua bibiagoc meande, imoc ngicngac edeyunubisia.
Yeac kpara kpetiac. Ngeni imocac negenggec wiac engena ambeso. Ngicngac KEBU hofocandae, ngeni sogaibisia.
Ngeni KEBU hofocma yeac kuhaac kic fima yeac hoannu kemma kecgecdeac nasosoc angemmebeso.
Yeng ua bibiagoc amma kucfaka bibiagoc mekecma desi desiyoac enarango dekefec, ngeni imoc negenggec febeso.
O, yeng ngeni meisingngunuec. Ye kingang ngiha Abarahanggac gboricfora nga Yakoboac medacfora meisingngunuec.
Yennoc KEBU Anutunina nga yeng ngicngac yoacngina isinggema desiude, faka imoc bangecfu sokoma fede.
Ye dzadzahac meec, imoc nasosoc negensima dedeseriyoac edengunuec, imoc ngicngac fingecsahengina fekefude, imoc andenga tauseng feenude, imocacsoc negensima kefude.
Ye Abarahanggoc dzadzahac imoc mema Isakaac yoac deserimima edema
Yakoboaru dedeseriyoac imocnoc meserima Israegoc dzadzahac imoc fefeseri feudeac dema
yofi deec, “Ni maridzoming arennu Kanaang bangec ge gembade, imocnoc geac bangec noboha anude.”
Ngicngac imoc yeni kpetengina kuneng kpac. Yeni ngicngac efeanecsac amma bangec imohai kemma kuric kecgec.
Bangecareng yeneac bangecngina fekende, yeni imohai yerecgema ngictau monggac bangec yerecgema ngictau monggac bangecfu kengkecma ngicngacareng mong yenigoc kecma wayunuma monggaru kengkecgec.
Kebungo ngic kpae heiyemmeu mongngo mong ebicfu mi faiyunuec. Ye yeneac amma ngictau yoac ngabasiricfu ayemmema
yofi edeyunukefec, “Ni ngic meisinggema kerecdokungo nadzicyemmeai, ngeneng mi kpesereyunubisia nga profetefocna mangana mong mi ayemmebisia.”
Yeng bangec imohai boditoa fingerudeac edeec, imohai nenesemengngina sasawa kpetotieu kpac anudeac negemma
ngic mong bic sueu waraiyemmeec, imoc Yosefe. Yeneng ye wanac ngic anudeac dema suema dzo megec.
Yeni hania ic gigidangau faima ubiau becsac aiengngo memea dzegegec.
Yeng ifi kefu yeac kpefing yoac dedea, imoc erema heiu KEBUAC yoacngo Yosefeac hania tobanggeu seriec.
Seriu Aigita yeneac ngictaungo ngicfora sueyunuu kemma Yosefe yungecgec. Ngiha ngiha yeneac ngictaungo Yosefe witicfunac yungerec.
Ngictaungo ye amea manaac enara faiu yeng iwaiya sasawa garenggeudeac uayoac demiec.
Demiu Yosefengo songeaac arennu ngictauac medacfora dederecge ayemmema ngic enarafora negen negentegec edekpou ayemmekefec.
Ifi anu Israe yeneng Aigita bangecfu hagec. Yakobongo Hanggac bangecfu kuric kefu
KEBUNGO ngicngacfora meficyunuu fingecsahe kuneng nga kucgoc amma ngabafocngina yeneac kuc ferahagec.
Ferahegec yeng Aigita ngic yeneac negen negeng merenu yeneng ngicngacfora ubango ukuyunugec. Yeni yenahafoc yoac denegeng amma Kebuac kingang ngicfora faitobannu faiyunugec.
If anggec Kebungo kingang ngiha Mose suema Arong ifingoc meisinggeu
yereng yeneac botucfu faka kuhagoc meoc. Yeri Hanggac bangecfu kucfaka mi hehena mekefoc.
Anutungo kundung sueu bangec mekundungkpeu yeneng ine yeac yoac kpema wagec.
Ye dokungina sasawa heimerenu sac andaru kondungyang kpebucyunuu homedacgec.
Sepeng yeneng hama bangecngina sokodacma ngickunengfocngina yeneac fefeamanginaungoc engkecgec.
Yeng yoac deu dawec nga dokuac mogocbisic habutoanginagoc hama ama bangecngina sasawa sokodarec.
Yeni kia kpeudeac negenggec yeng nomanggbomea yemmeu piratacngo amabangecngina sokoma heidarec.
Yeng waing icngina kpezamema fig ic amma icngina goa bangecnginau kpetackedarec.
Ye ipua yoac edeyunuu yeneng hagec. Ipua gboria kucnginagoc hagec, yeneac kpetengina naric mi mebesonga.
Yeneng hama bangecfu wiac maria tengging tengging sasawa nedacma bangecnginaac semeng nedacgec kpac anec.
Yeng bangecnginau warac medacfocngina sasawa kpebucyunudacma kucnginaac fora warac fingecgec, yeni kpebucyunuu homedacgec.
Imoc sasawa fingeru wisickeu ye Israe habu meyunuu Aigita bangec wama kenggec. Yeni siriwa nga gol momoc mema kenggec yeac ngicngac arengfora yenearunac mongngo mi tifainggema makpeec.
Aigita ngicngac yeneng Israe ngicngac yeneac homac kengecyunuecac amma yeneng wayunuma kenggec, imocac ubangerec negenggec.
Anutungo hoeng tiameu imocngo kperacngina amma witinginau feu tofocnac gerec yemmeu imocngo mekperagiyunuec.
Yeni kpesimigec yeng neng negecdeac yemmema kurumenggac yaka efea kpac yemmeu negebec anggec.
Ye hoc kpendziru doku dundungngo mama bangec dokuya kpac, imohai dzuamagoc mekeng feec.
Nocac ye dedeseri kpetiac deserima bic deec. Nga ye kingang ngiha Abarahang, yeac ifingoc negenu feu
ngicngacfora sogac sogaigoc wangecyunuec. Ye meisingfora hesicyunuu yeni yegec heima arohoma sogaima kenggec.
Yeng bangec monnunac ngicngac yeneac bangec wangecyunuma meisingngicngacfora imoc yemmeu ngicngac yeneac semeng uaac mingina amma fora mema nekecgec.
Yeneng yeac singyoac mekecma dedeseri yoara seria modacgecdeac ifi anec. KEBU eriendzong memini, hallelu Yac.
KEBU eriendzong memini, hallelu Yac. KEBUNGO yoac dedzege amma imoc modarude nga wosoefaha imoc nasoya nasoya feengkefude amma ye gombunga, imocac ubangerec memibesonga.
KEBUNGO faka kuhagoc mekecde, ngic mongngo kucfaka ifia naric mi deude nga ye kucfaka imoc dengereudeacsoc kpac.
Ngicngac sing dindingac nasosoc modacbeso ayemmeande nga faka dindingac angandae, yeni kenecnginagoc.
O KEBU, ge ngicngacfocga gombunga ayemmema neac ifingoc negenna febeso. Ge ngicngac ebicfunac mesiyunuma ni ifingoc meficnubesena.
