Niniwe taonggac ngic yeni Yonaac dedekperagiyoac negemma ubamereng anggecac amma yeneng ising ising nasou ngicngac yomoc yenigoc yacma nammagec yeneac fakangina isinggema yeneac mangana deyemmegecde. Negenggec, yomocngo Yonaac faka ferahade.
Mongngo kifa kpedzereckema sufu sufuu me pake bageau naric mi faiude, ye kifa imoc tatahau faiu tacma kperagiu ngicngac yeni erema kperagia henggecde.
Kicga imoc sebigaac kifa amma kicga gombunga fema sebiga sasawa mekperagidarude. Nga ge kickerec me kicmangang mekecma kicgango manganeudeu ine sebiga sasawa kundung kpeude.
Imocac amma ge kperagia fegende, imoc kundung kpebacac amma garengemema kecbesena.
Ge sebiga sasawango kundunga kpac kperagigoc feudeu sebiga kperagiango sokoma feude. Imoc kifa mong kperagitoayagoc mekperagiguande, ifi isoc.”
Anu Yesungo yoac demanungoc farisaio mongngo yegoc yaka neudeac heitaiu yeac amau emma taroc.
Matacma maria mi dzuacma yaka eng neudeac anu farisaiongo imoc hemma kpidohou
Kebungo ine yofi edeec, “Farisaio ngeni teratasengina ngadeasac dzuacandae nga ngeni ubaherengina manau ine kickerec amma wiac manganango wake wakea fede.
Ngeni negen negengtegecngina kpac. Kebungo ngadeau wiac meec, yeng manaac ifingoc meec.
Ngeni imocac amma ngicngac makpekpea wiac heregoc yemmebisia. Ifi anggec wiacngina sasawa dzuac dzuara anude.
Farisaio, ngeni romboc nga gime amma mondzangngina sasawa imocac kpete mema 10 imohacnac mocgu hendzicma Anutu miandae. Nga faka dindingac nga heregoc Anutuac songo negembesonga, imoc ine ihoc bahoc amma waandae, imocac ngeni sowecnginagoc. Ngeni faka gombunga imoc modacbisia amma tosea mi wabisia.
Farisaio, ngeni kpekpeturang amau tatac warac warac imohai tacgecdeac angemmeande nga ngicngac yeneng kpedzaroc sobennu eweheihei faka angemmegecdeac songo negengandae, imocac ngeni sowecnginagoc.
Kicsere esea mong wiaha kpac ngic yeneng mi negemma eng witiau kengha andae, ngeni kicsere ifia isoc kecdae, imocac ngeni sowecnginagoc.”
Ifi deu dedeseriyoacac negen negengngic yenearunac mongngo edeec, “Kpoukpou, ge ifi dema neni ifingoc denggbarinnununec.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi merenec, “Dedeseriyoacac negen negengngic, ngeni ifingoc sowecnginagoc. Ngeni ngic yeneac ngadenginau finac ngicngo memeacsoc kpac, imoc faiandae nga ngenang ine ngicngac ebicngina efea anude, imoc meficyunugecdeac gbongngina mong mi sinegecde.
Bangecfocnginango profete esea yunuhomegec homegecmoc yeneac kicsereu simengngina miacandae, imocac ngeni sowecnginagoc.
Yeneng profete yunuhomegec nga ngeneng kicserengina simenggoc miackeandae, ngeni ifi amma yofi dekperagidae, ‘Neni fakaninau uba mocgu kecdimbe.’
Ngeneac amma Anutuac negen negentegecngo bicngoc yofi deec, ‘Ni profete nga aposoro yenearu sueyunuba yeneng goa yunuhomegecde nga goa yunukporac ayemmegecde.’
Imocac amma bangec hanac hanaheaunacngoc erekecma profete yunuhomegec sacngina maec, imocac turunga yagucac ngicngac kecdae, ngenearunacngo kpoudacgecde.
Turung imoc Abeac sacfunac hanahema erekecma Dzekariaac sacfu erede. Yeni Dzekaria arata nga kpetiac ama botucngirau kpehomegec. Oc, ngicngac areng yomoc ngeneng turunga imoc kpoudacbisia, imoc edengunuduae.
Dedeseriyoacac negen negengngic, ngeni Anutu negemmigecdeac ki, imoc ngicngac yenearunac meickegec. Amma ngenang imohai mi emma ngicngac yeneng embesonga ammagec ine kpae bic faiandae, imocac ngeni sowecnginagoc.”
Anu Yesungo wama ngadeau kemeu mitiac negen negengngic nga farisaio, yeneng yeac negemmangang amma kpesi kpesi hania hania kpesimigec.
Yeni, “Yoac goa segeu meni.” dema yeac gareng mema kecgec.
Ngicngac homac yombong, teng tauseng nga noc ifiacsoc yeni kpezucnema nanggecac yenaocngoc timbimbingemegec. Nga Yesungo medacfora, yeneac negemma yofi deec, “Ngeni farisaio yeneac ikoc fakangina imocac henghomema kecbisia, imoc yis isoc ic sogonnu sokoude.
Wiac mong sangoyagoc fede, imoc kecma nonongkac fingectegerude nga sufu sufuya fede, imoc negendacgecde.
Imocac ngeni kundunnu yoac sasawa deandae, imoc kperagiau negenggecde nga ama mana kapiau kedzacnginau sangic sangic deandae, yeni imoc ama witiau namma dekperagigecde.
Nga tosofocna, ngic goa yeni sebingina kpehomegecdeac kuc mekecma monggoc memanganengunugecdeac kuc hofocandae, ngeni yeneac mi kengecngunubeso, imoc edengunuduae.
Ngeni ine Kebu monggacsac damungunubeso. Yeng ngunuhomema gerechofeu ukungunuu kemegecdeac uayoac nga kuc mekecde. O, yofi deduae, ngeni yeac ine damungunubeso.
Ngicngac yeni nengbisic 5 faigec peni yohockang sacsacngo bummeandae nga Anutungo neng imoc yenearunac mong naric mi nigeckpeude.
Amma ngeneac orucdzongina kpete, imoc ifingoc oso osodara. Nga ngeneng sawaac nengarengtoa yeni feracyunudae, imocac ngeni mi kengecngunubeso.
Ngic mong ye ngic yeneac kicfu Ngicac Medac yeac deande, ‘Ni yeac areng anduae.’ ifi deu Ngicac Medacngo yeac ifingoc Anutuac angerofora yeneac kicfu yofi deude, ‘Ye neac ngic.’
Nga ngic mong ye ngic yeneac kicfu ine ni busicnuude, neng ye ifingoc Anutuac angerofora yeneac kicfu busic kpebade.
Ngic mong ye Ngicac Medac emmiude, yeac kopocsic wamigecde nga mongngo Tiri Asu denggbaringgema emmiude, imocac kopocsic wawaya ine mi fede.
Ngic yeneng mengunuma kpekpeturang amau nga yoacgarenggac enara nga ngickuneng, yeneac kicfu faingunugecde, ngeni naso imohai negengyohoc amma yofi mi debisia, ‘Neni turunga dafi merennide nga noc yoac denide?’
Naso imohaingoc Tiri Asungo yoac enacnginau faiu ngeni imoc debisia.”
Anu ngicngac habu yeneac botucfunac ngic mongngo Yesuac deec, “Kpoukpou, dacna ye mannaac maridzoming tembuha mekecde, imocac geng dena noboha ni mederema nenu.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ngic, ngereac iwai mederema gareng ambadeac mongngo mi fainuec.”
Ifi dema torokpema yeneac yofi deec, “Ngeni dzofinactoaac kichodung ambauac garengngina mebisia. Ngic monggac dzofinactoa, imocngo yengena kekehaac siriha mi heficgeude.”
Ifi dema yoac mong heima yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic dzofinactoagoc mongngo uayau semeng fora homac anu
semenga dahai faiudeac negengemema
yofi ambade negenec, ‘Ni semengama dafiguc mekecduae, yeni hembarackema monggoc meyadiyunuma mema semeng nga wiacna gombunga sasawa kpedzucnema ihai kpeturanggebade.
Kpeturanggeba wisickeu neanna ubaonganaac yofi debade, ni kifa homacacsoc wiac gombunga bic kpedzucnedua, imocngo kekecna meefaiu menec amma sogac sogaigoc kecbade.’
Ifi deu Anutungo yeac yofi deec, ‘Kapangic, tofocnac yomohaingoc kekecga wangecgugecde. Nga wiacga mekpedzuc amma wanade, imoc goa yeneng megecde.’”
Nga Yesungo monggoc torokpeec, “Ngic mong ye yengenaac amma bangecac dzofinactoa mekpedzuc amma Anutuac kicfu ine dzofinaha kpac kecde, yeac kekeha imocacsoc anude.”
Imocac amma Yesungo medacfora yofi edeyunuec, “Neni noc yaka nenide nga sebininau noc wamba heima kecni. Ngeni imocac kekecnginaac defagung mi ambisia.
Kekecngo yaka ferahaude nga sebingo ngakpikporuc ferahaude.
Ngeni wondong yenenggec. Yeni heikpenec nga netohong mong mi negenggec Anutungo sifu eng semeng yemmekecde. Nga Anutuac kicfu ngeneng neng yeneac engena andae.
Ngenearunac mongngo dewaidzoc amma kefu imocngo kekecnasoya kapianec monggoc naric mi mehereeude.
Ngeni wiac kapia ifiaac obohoma tosea goaac ifingoc negengyohoc mi ambisia.
Dzaring eng tohoandae, ngeni yenembisia. Yeni witic mi yumuandae amma uatoa mi mema sifu yadiandae. Ngictau Saromongo warac wamba kibia gombunga gombunga heikefu kibikperagitoayango ine dzaring yeneac kibi kereng kereng mi ferahaec.
Nga dzaring amasobennu eng tohoandae, yeni yagucac fingecdae nga ngic yeni wereckenu herecgema gerecfu ukuyunugecde. Nga Anutungo dzaringtehec ifia wamba heiyemmeudeu yeng ifingoc ngicngac negen negensingngina kapia mekecdae, ngeni ngakpikporucngina torokpeu torokpe imoc monggoc ngemmeude.
Imocac ngeni noc yaka nga doku dahacnac fima negecdeac negengyohoc nga demadzac imoc wabisia.
Nga bangeha bangeha ngicngac yeneng imoc megecdeac negen negengngina imohai faigec fekecde. Nga ngeni wiac imocac obohoandae, Mangnginango imoc bic negende.
Ngeni yeac eucerereng meficgegecdeac ua mebisia nga wiac imocnoc ifingoc torokpeu torokpe megecde.”
“Habubisic, ngeni mi ebiribisia. Mangngina ye eucererenga ngemmeudeac negenu ngereede.
Ngeni finacngina suegec ngicngac yeneng imoc bummedacgec ngeni dzo imoc mema ngicngac makpekpea kecdae, yeni ubangerecac wiac imoc yemmebisia. Ngeni dzobirang mi barackeudeac meficgebisia. Nga ngeni dzofinac kuha mi maude, imoc kurumennu kpedzucnebisia. Ihai hamangecngic yeni mi hagecde nga dzaukpadzadzangngo wiac mi memanganeude.
Imoc yofiac, ngeni dzofinacngina nofu faigec fede, imohaingoc ubasongongina ifingoc feude.”
“Ngeni kporucngina seria kpema kifangina kpedzereckema efaima kecbisia.
Ngic kuneng ye memeturang amaunac hama naguu heiu ua ngihango yeac tomai kecma nagu bic witimiude, ngeni ifi isoc tomai kecbisia.
Nga mingingnginango hama uamedacfora yeni gaugbori kecgec meficyunuude, yeni kenecnginagoc. Foracngoc, ye yengenaoc yeneac kingang kpeudeac kporuha mewegenema ‘Ngeni tacmagec.’ deu tacgec yaka meha yemmeu negecde, imoc edengunuduae.
Ye tofocnac dzongiau me ama werec wereckenggac gaugbori kecmagec hama yenenudeu uamedac imoc yeni kenecnginagoc.
Hamangecngic ye ama hetackema engande. Nga ama mingina mong ye hamangecngic noc nasou haude negendeu ye hamangecngic kpae heimiude.
Nga ngeni Ngicac Medacac aua mi negemmagec ye haude, imocac amma ngeni ifingoc efaima kecbisia.”
Anu Petorongo deec, “Kebu, ge yoac heima dedammoc, imoc neneac me ngicngac sasawa yeneac denec?”
Ifi deu Kebungo yofi merenec, “Amagareng gombunga mong negen negentegehagoc minginaac yoac dede modacande, minginango amagareng ifia uayoac miu ye uamedacfora yeneac enarangina amma yaka nasou hendzicma deecfu negecdeac yemmekefude.
Yemmekefu minginango dzigene hama henu uamedacngo ua imoc medarudeu uamedac ye kenehagoc.
Foracngoc, minginango wiara sasawa garenggeudeac demiude, imoc fora yombong.
Anu wanacngic mong ye yengenaocngoc ine yofi negensiudeu, ‘Minginnango bic mi haude.’ Ifi dema ua ngicngac goa yunuma minginaac wiac nedacma doku seria nema ubea sufuude.
Ifi anudeu wanacngic ye tomai mi kecma minginaac uamemenaso nga auaya mi negemmanu minginango haude. Hama uamedac imoc herecge meickeu kemema negen negensingngina kpac, yenigoc kefude.
Nga wanacngic mong ye minginaac yoac negemma mi efaima kecde, yeng dzikac ebiria kiude.
Nga wanacngic mong ye minginaac uayoac nga songo mi negemma dzikacac arennu faka goa angande, ye dzikac efeanecsac kiude. Ngicngac yeneng ngic mong wiac ebiria migec mekecde, yearu wiac ebiriangoc fingecmiudeac negenggecde. Nga yeni ngic mong wiac homac garenggeudeac uayoac migec mekecde, yeng wiac monggoc negen negengtegecgoc garenggeu imoc mi memanganeudeac negenggecde.
Ni bangecfu gerec habuya habuya fiba dzeudeac mayai. Amma gerec imoc bic dzebacfu ubana ngereebac.
Amma ni dokunadzic siriha mong nadzicbesare. Ni imoc negemma herenango ebiriu kecma uana imoc hafoangoc wisickeu herena ngereeude.
Ni bangecfu ruae meficgebadeac mayai, ngeni imoc mi negembisia, imoc kpac. Ni ine tohoemegecdeac mayai, imoc edengunuduae.
Nga yofinenggac nga namma enude, imohai ngicngac 5 ama mana monnu kecdae, yeni tohoma kecgecde. Harebec yeneng yohockang yerigoc nga yohockang yeri harebec yenigoc ngaba ngaba angemegecde.
Yeni tohoma manggacngo medac yegoc ngaba anude nga medac yeng mamagoc ngaba anecde. Nenggac ye naroangagoc ngaba anude nga naroangngo nonggeagoc ngaba angemeecde. Nga erangi yeri tohoemema ngaba angemeecde.”
Anu Yesungo ngicngac yeneac yofi deec, “Ngeni wenac keme kemeau hoeng mong hemma yofi bic deandae, ‘Kia kuneng kpeude.’ ifi degec kia kpeude.
Nga sautfunac firang kpeu negemma yofi deandae, ‘Bangec gerea anude.’ degec ifi angkecde.
Ikocngic, ngeni bangecfu nga sawau wiac fingecande, imoc hemma naric isinggegecde. Nga naso yofinenggac kecdimbe, imocac faka hemma isinggebau dede imocngo naric ambac.
Amma ngeni faka damocngo dindingac ande, imoc ngenaoc isinggebau dede imoc naric ambac.
Anu ngabaga mongngo yoacfu faiguudeac meguu ngerahafoc sinnu kengkecdape, ge imohai yoacngira dengereecdeac uatoa mebesena. Ifi mi annadeu ye desi desingic yearu faiguude. Nga desi desingicngo keracnatanggaru faiguu keracnatangngo witicamau faiguude.
Faiguu ge ihai takecma ngabagaac turung hafoangoc nga dzo wisic wisickea yombong kpoumaguc witicamaunac manade, imoc edeguduae.”
Naso imohaingoc ngic goa yeneng Yesu siduc yofi ammigec, “Gariraiangic goa yeni sesenginaac yang Anutuac hosuc heimagec Piratongo deu ngicfora yeneng kemma yunuhomema sacngina imoc sesenginaac yang sawagoc meturanggegec.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngic homegec, yeneac kopocsicngo gariraiangic sasawa yeneac kopocsic ferahaecac ifi fingecyemmeec, ngeni imoc negensidae me?
Nga imoc kpac yombong. Ngeni ubangina mi merenggecdeu ngeni sasawango yeni homegec, ifi isocngoc homedacgecde, imoc edengunuduae.
Nga Siroang amaherecngo barackema ngicngac 18 witinginau mama yunuhomeec. Imocac ngeni dafi negensidae, yeneac kopocsicngo Yerusarennu ngicngac sasawa kecdae, yeneac ferahade me?
Imoc kpac yombong. Nga ngeni ine ubangina mi merenggecdeu ngeni sasawango yeni homegec, ifi isocngoc homedacgecde, imoc edengunuduae.”
Anu Yesungo yoac mong heima yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mong ye fig ic mong waing uayau homeru nanec. Nanu ye kemma fora hofocma
waing uaac gareng edeec, ‘Ic yomocac fora hofocma kecbare kifa harebec bic ande nga ye nocac eng namma bangec kereha nedarude? Imocac ic imoc herecgema ukuna.’
Ifi deu waing uagarengngo deec, ‘Kunenna, ge imoc wana kifa yomohai ifingoc nammanu haniau usuma bangec goa kerehagoc heikecbesare.
Ifi amba ngadeguc fora gombunga anude gedang. Nga fora mi anudeu ge naric herecgema ukubesena.’”
Sabata naso monnu Yesungo kpekpeturang ama monnu emma kpoukpou ua meec.
Meu ngac mong imohai tarec, ye hafeiac hadehade mongngo ngadea mendanggeu ngadehokuc kefu kifaya 18 bic anu naric mi kpehengaibac.
Nga Yesungo ye hemma yearu haudeac kpacma edeec, “Ngac negenna, ni hafeiga meickeba kpac ande.”
ifi dema maria witiau faimanu ngac ye ngadea bic kpehengaima sorongaiu yacma namma Anutu dengereec.
Ifi anu kpekpeturang amaac gareng yeng ine Yesungo sabatau mengec mengere ua meecac herebu negemma ngicngac edeyunuec, “Uameme 6 fede, imohai ua mebesonga. Ifi anu ngeni naso imohai hagec mengerengunugecde nga sabata nasou ine kpac.”
Ifi deu Kebungo meremmiec, “Ikocngic, ngeni sasawa burumaka nga donggifocngina doku yemmegecdeac sabata nasou yungecyunugec, yeni amanginaunac magec meyunu kengandae, imocngo ngereede.
Nga ngac yomoc Abrahanggac naroannoc, ye ine Satangngo kifa 18 bic dzegeu kecmanu sabata nasou yungec yungera anude, imoc negenggec ifingoc ngereede.”
Yesungo ngabafora turunga ifi merengyemmeu yeni gameyunudarec. Nga ngicngac tosea yeni ine faka engena sasawa meu henggec, imocac sogac sogai andacgec.
Imocac Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni noc wiacfusing yoac heiba ngeni Anutuac eucererenggac siriha naric negentegecgecde?
Imoc mastet gbomea isoc, ngic mongngo mastet gbomea mema uayau homeru yadima ic wegena anu sawau neng yeneng hama fawau faec heigec.”
Ifi dema Yesungo monggoc deec, “Anutuac eucerereng, imoc noc wiacfusing yoac heiba negenggecde,
Imoc yis isoc, ngac mongngo farawa 20 kiroacsoc meu uuha yisgoc yerecgema meu hafoangoc yisagoc anude.”
Yesungo taong nga amabisicfu yerecgema ngicngac yenearu kpoukpou ua mema Yerusarennu kenudeac kenec.
Kemmanu ngicngac goa yeneng kpesimigec, “Kebu, ngicngac efeanec, yenengsac komoc kpegecde me?” ifi degec Yesungo yofi merenec,
“Ngeni nagu kapiau enggecdeac ua seserigoc mekecbisia. Ni edengunuba, ngicngac homac yeni Anutuac eucererennu enggecdeac uatoa mema obohogecde.
Nga ama minginango yacma nagu heiu ngeni ngadeau namma naguu heima degecde, ‘Kebu, nagu witinemmena ereni.’ Ngeni ifi degec yeng merengngemmema yofi deude, ‘Ngeni dahacnac? Ni mi negengngunuduae.’
Ifi deu ngeneng degecde, ‘Neni gegoc nenedoku neing nga geng neneac sinnu namma edekpou anemmenec.’
Ifi degec, yeng ine monggoc edengunuude, ‘Ngeni dahacnac? Ni mi negengngunuduae. Manganameme, ngeni neac kicfunac meickegec.’
Ngeni Abrahang nga Isaka amma Yakobo nga profete sasawa Anutuac eucererennu tacgec yenenggecde. Nga ngeni ine ngadeau ukungunugec kemegecde. Ihai ngeni kiacma enac kisaranggema kecgecde.
Nga ngicngac yeni wenac ere ereaunac nga keme kemeaunac amma nort amma sautnacngo hama Anutuac eucererennu tacma neneyaka negecde.
Amma goa ngadea kecandae, yeni warac warac anggecde nga warac warac kecandae, yeneng ngadea anggecde.”
Naso imohaingoc farisaio goa yeneng hama Yesuac degec, “Herodengo gubeso andeac bangec yomoc wama kenna.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Ngeni kemma katekasi imoc yofi edegec, ‘Negennec, ni yaguc nga wereckenu hadehade nga yafing kporacyunuma hafeigoc mengereyunuba uameme harebecfu uana wisickeude.
Ni yaguc nga wereckenu amma wereu kengkecbade. Profete yeni bangec goau naric mi yunuhomebesonga, kpac. Yeni Yerusarennusac yunuhomebesonga, faka ifi fede.’
Yerusareng Yerusareng, ge profete yunuhomeannec nga ngic gearu sueyunuyunuya, yeni hocngo yenereannec. Nga Kokorec nonggeango nambaracfora kpeganga bageau foforacyunuande, ni ifi isoc naso homac nambaracfocga kpedzucngunubadeac negembare ngeneng ine imocac songo mi negenggec.
Negendae, amangina kisi nanude nga ngeni monggoc mi nenggecde kecma yofi degecde, ‘Kebuac kpacfu ngic hade, ye kenehagoc.’ ifi degecde, imohai ngeneng monggoc nenggecde.”
Yesungo sabata naso monnu farisaio yeneac enarameme monggac amau yaka neudeac enu farisaio yeneng yeac haifaka hennegeng amma tacgec.
Imohai ngic mong sebia yadi yadia, yeng hama Yesuac kicfu nanu
Yesungo dedeseriyoacac negen negengngic nga farisaio yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Sabatau ngic mengec mengereyunuac sing mong fede me kpac?”
Ifi deu yeni turunga mong mi merenggec Yesungo ine ngic imoc maringo mema mengerema sueu kenu
yofi edeyunuec, “Ngenearunac monggac medac me burumaka mongngo dokuteng monnu kemeu sabata naso anu ye sifu bic kemma kpedziu ereude.”
Ifi deu yeneng yoac imocac turunga meremmigecdeac obohogec.
Anu imohai ngic heitaiyunuyunuya goa yeneng tatac warac warac isinggema ihai tacgec Yesungo yenensima yoac heima yofi dema edeyunuec,
“Ngic mongngo memeturanggac yakau heitaiguude, imohai ge yakaac tatac warac waracfu bic mi tacbesena. Ngic heitaiyunuyunuya, yenearunac mongngo gedang geac engena anu
ngic ye nga ge ngerahafoc heitainguruec, yeng hama yofi edeguude, ‘Ge meickemana ngic yomocngo taru.’ Ifi deu gameguu tatac wisic wisickeau yombong kemma tacnade.
Ngic mong heitaiguu ge ine kemma tatac wisic wisickeau tacbesena. Ifi anna ngic heitaiguec, yeng hama gemma yofi gedang deude, ‘Tosona, ge tatac warac waracfu ekemma tacna.’ Ifi deu ngicngac bic tacdae, yeneac kicfu eweheihei anggenude.
Ngic mong ye yengena sebi meengande, ye memagecde nga mong ye sebia memaemeande, ye meenggecde.”
Nga Yesungo ngic heitaiec, yeac ifingoc yoac mong yofi deec, “Ge wenacfu me marai yakaneneac areng goa heitaiyununade, imohai ogofocga me dacmunac me arengfocga me dzofinacnginagoc geac wegenacfu kecdae, yeni mi heitaiyunubesena. Yeneng turunga gedang monggoc kpougenggec sing imohai turungga bic menade, imoc mi ngereede.
Ge heitaiyununadeac yaka mengerenade, naso imohai ine ngic makpekpea nga sebimangang nga hanimangang amma kicpisic heitaiyunubesena.
Ge ifi amma kenecgagoc annade. Imoc yofiac, ngic imoc yeni turunga kpougenggecdeacsoc mi anggecde. Nga geng yaka imocac turunga imoc ngicngac dindingac gborima yacgecde, naso imohai menade.”
Ifi deu yeni yaka netacma yoara negenggec yenearunac ngic mongngo Yesu edeec, “Mong ye Anutuac eucererennu emma yaka netarude, ye kenehagoc.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Ngic mongngo nenesemeng kuneng mengereudeac negemma ngicngac homac yeneac yoac faima heitaiyunuec.
Heitaiyunuu yakaneneac naso hau ye wanacngiha sueu yeng ngic heitaiyunuec, yeni edeyunuudeac kemma deec, ‘Hagec, wiac sasawa bic mengereding tacde.’
Ifi deu ngic sasawango degbedic amma ngic warac warac yeng deec, ‘Ni bangec mong bummedua, imoc hembadeac kembeso negenduae, imocac negenna mi manganebeso.’
Nga mongngo deec ‘Ni burumaka ngiwa 10 uaac amma bummedua, imocac kemma uau tobangyunubeso negenduae, imocac negenna mi manganebeso.’
Ifi deu ogongira mongngo deec, ‘Ni ngac medua, imocac amma naric mi habade.’
Nga wanacngic ye kemma yoac imoc sasawa mingina edeu minginango herebu negemma wanacngic yofi edeec, ‘Ge taonggac sinnu nga singbisicfu bic kemma ngicngac makpekpea nga sebimangang amma kicpisic nga hanimangang, yeni hesicyununa hagec.’
Ifi deu wanacngicngo kemma deec, ifi isoc amma dzigenema yofi edeec, ‘Kunenna, ge dedang, imoc bic andacdua nga ama manau ine tatac fedengoc.’
Ifi deu minginango deec, ‘Ge singtoa nga singbisic fedacde, imohai kemma ngicngac yenemma hagecdeac serima dema hesicyunuma hana yeni amana mana yomoc mewakebisia.
Ngic heitaiyunuyunuya, yenearunac mongngo yakana ohoai, imoc naric mi nehembesande, imoc edengunuduae.’”
Yesungo kenu ngicngac habutoango ye modacma kenggec dzigenema yenemma deec,
“Ngic mong ye hama modacnubeso negenside, ye yengena nonggomama nga eneng nambaracfora amma dacmunac nga yengena kekeha ifingoc mi ngadeheudeu ua medacna naric mi anude.
Nga mong ye yengena mariponga mi tofohoma modacnuudeu ye medacna naric mi anude.
Ngenearunac ngic mongngo kicfifiac amaherec mebesonga negende, ye ama naric medarude me kpac, imocac waicke tacma hanahema iwaiac buma osoareng andarudeu ngereeude.
Nga ye hanahema ifi mi amma eng simenga yerecgema faima ama tosea mi medzickebac dede ngicngac yeneng imoc hemma deendema ammima
yofi degecde, ‘Ngic yomoc ye ama mebesonga amma kuha mong mi feecac ama ua mi mesiec.’
Anu ngictau mongngo ngicfora 10 tauseng eng meyunuma kemma ngictau mong ye ngicfora 20 tauseng, yenigoc ewegecde, imoc mi ngereeude. Ye matacma yofi isinggemaguc anude, neac ngicfocna 10 tauseng yeneng ngabafocna hagecde naric yunugecde me kpac.
Imoc naric mi anudeu yeni hereaungoc kecmagec yeng gubekisang ngic ruae dafi fingerudeac sueu kenude.
Imocac ngenearunac mongngo yengena wiac sasawa mi ngadehedarudeu ua medacna naric mi anude.
Kondung imoc wiac gombunga. Nga kondungngo kiacma songea kpac anudeu ine ye songea monggoc naric mi meficgeude.
Kondung ifiango yaka sereau ukuni memefic mi anude nga bangec kereha semeng uau faiandae, imocgoc kpeturanggenideac siric ifingoc mi ande. Imoc eng ukuandae. Kedzahagoc yeng yoac yomoc negembeso.”
Takesimeme ngic nga manganameme sasawa yeneng Yesuac yoac negembesonga yeac hoannu kendacgec.
Nga farisaio nga mitiac negen negengngic yeneng negenggec imoc naric mi anu nasosoc yofi dekecgec, “Ngic yomoc ye manganameme hoangyunuma yenigoc yaka neande.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yoac mong heima yofi edeyunuec,
“Ngenearunac ngic mong ye ramafora 100 femide. Ifi femiu yenearunac rama mong sufuudeu minginango dafi anude? Ye rama 99 wayunuu bangec kisiu nanggec kemma mocgu imoc hofockecma meficgeude.
Meficgema ubangerec negemma fuayau faima tofohoma mekenude.
Mekemma ameau kensikema ngic ogofora nga tosofora wegenac kecdae, yeni kpacyunuma yofi edeyunuude, ‘Ngeni hagec nenahafoc sogaini. Ni ramana sufuec, imoc meficgedua.’
Ifi isoc ngic kopocsihagoc mocgungosac ubamereng anu sogac sogai siriha imocngoc kurumennu fingerude, imoc edengunuduae. Nga ngicngac 99 yeni ubamerenggac sing mi obohoma kpetiac bic kecdae, yeneac amma sogac sogai ifia mi fingerude.
Me ngac mong ye siriwa dzoya 10 mekecma mong ukuu sufuudeu ye dafi anude? Ye kifaya kpedzereckema ama wanggema serima hofockengkecma meficgeude.
Meficgema ngac ogofora nga tosofora wegenac kecdae, yeni kpacyunuma yofi edeyunuude, ‘Ngeni hagec nenahafoc sogaini. Ni dzona ukuba sufuec, imoc meficgedua.’
Nga ngic kopocsihagoc mongngo ubea merenu Anutuac angero yeni yenahafoc ifingoc sogaigecde, imoc edengunuduae.”
Yesungo torokpema deec, “Ngic mong ye medahora yohockang kefoc.
Nga medaha kapiango mama edeec, ‘Manggac, ge dzofinac goa hendzicma neac nobohana nenna neannaoc mekecbade.’ Ifi deu mangngirango iwaiya hendzicma medahora yemerec.
Yemeru naso mi hereemanu medaha kapia ye dzofinaha kpedzucnedacma mema bangec hereau kenec. Kemma imohai bangecac sicsauckekecfu dzofinactoaya mekefec, imoc ukudarec.
Ukudaru kpac ammanu bangec imohai boditoa fingeru ye yaka nga wiac sasawaac obohoec.
Obohoma bangec imocac mingina mong yearu kemma ogo ammiu yeng bereha garenggeudeac berecodau sueu kenec.
Kenu berec yeneng yaka sebera negec, imoc neudeac ammiec nga mongngo ine yaka mong mi gumegec.
Ifi anu ye yengenaoc kekeha hentegecma deec, ‘Mannaac uamedacfora yaka negebec angandae. Nga neng ine yei yakaac homema homebeso anduae.
Imocac ni yacma mannaaru kembadeac negenduae. Kemma yofi edebade, “Manggac, ni kurumeng arenggac nga geac kicfu momoc kopocsic meficgeai,
imocac monggoc medacga kpacnugecde, imoc mi ngereeude. Ge sifu menuna yagurangicfocga yenearunac mong isoc amma kecbesare.” ’ ifi negemma kenec.
Amma medac ye hereaungoc kemmanu mamango bic hemma yeac ubea manganeu yearu nedzima kemma tofohoma titikokoc ammiu
medacngo deec, ‘Manggac, ni kurumeng arenggac nga geac kicfu momoc kopocsic meficgeai, imocac medacga monggoc kpacnugecde, imoc mi ngereeude.’
Nga manggacngo ine wanacngicfora yofi bic edeyunuec, ‘Ngeni bicbic kemma ngakpiherec gombunga yombong mehama heimigec kemeu gbonggac ring heimima hanitabe haniau heimigec kemeu.
Ngeni kemma burumakamedaha gbofoma, imoc mehagec kpema nenahafoc nesogai anni.
Medacna yomoc ye bic homeec, ifi negening ammanu ye kekec monggoc meficgedac. Ye sufuecfunac monggoc meficgeding.’ Ifi deu yeni nesogaitoa anggec.
Ifi ammagec medaha kunengngo semeng uau kecma ihacnac ama mewegenema hama ine musi nga yegec fede fedeac udumeng negemma
uamedac mong kparu hau kpesimiec, ‘Noc faka fingecde?’
Ifi deu uamedacngo turunga yofi merenec, ‘Munagango kpesipiriha kpac gombunga amau monggoc dzigenedacac amma manggango deu burumakamedaha gbofoma kpeding.’
Ifi deu dara ye herebu meficgema ngadeau namma amau enudeac mi ammiu mamango mama amau enudeac demekiri ammiu
darango mama edeec, ‘Negenna, ni kifa dafiguc geac wanac ua mema kecma yoacga mong mi kpeai. Ifi mekecba ogofocna yenigoc noningmedaha mong nenideac mong mi nennec, kpac.
Nga medacga imoc ye iwaiga singtoangacgoc kecma ukuma hau geng ine yeac amma burumakamedaha busia kuneng kpenec.’
Ifi deu mamango deec, ‘Medacna, ge nasosoc nigoc kecannec nga neac wiac sasawa imoc geacnoc.
Nga nenang yaguc ubangerec negemma nesogai ambisina. Munaga yomoc ye bic homeec, ifi negening ammanu ye kekec monggoc meficgedac. Ye sufuecfunac monggoc meficgedinggac ifi anni.’”
Yesungo medacfora yoac yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mong dzofinacgoc yeng dzogareng ngic mong meec. Meu yeng yegoc kecma yeac dzofinac garenggekefec. Garenggekefu goa yeneng yeac yofi dema edegec, ‘Dzogarengga imoc ye dzofinacga mi garenggema sicsauc faiande.’ Imocac amma yeng dzogarenga kparu hau
edeec, ‘Geac fakaga mangana degec negengkecduae. Dzogarenna monggoc naric mi kecnade. Ge imocac dzofinacac nga uagaac siduc hafoangoc ohoma nenna.’
Ifi deu dzogareng yengenaocngoc yofi negenec, ‘Ngickunennango dzogareng ua nearunac meickeude. Nga ni ama uamemeac osiduae amma kucna mi fede, derecgenecngic ambadeac gamenude, imocac dafi ambade?’
‘O, yaguc negenduae. Uaunac meicnugec kpac anu goa yeneng amanginau heitainugecdeac faka mong ambade.’
Ifi negemma ngic sasawa kunengaac turung mekecgec, yeni tembuc tembuc kpacyunuec. Kpacyunuu ngic warac enec, ye kpesimiec, ‘Ge kunenna yearunac turungga dafiguc annec?’
Ifi deu meremmiec, ‘Oriwa kereha kes 600.’ Ifi deu edeec, ‘Ge turungkibiga mema bic tacma kes 300sac ohona.’
Dema ngic mong kpesimiec, ‘Nga ge turung dafiguc annec?’ Kpesiu meremmiec, ‘Wit toru 800, imocacsoc.’ Ifi deu edeec, ‘Ge turungkibiga mema 640sac ohona.’
Anu dzogareng mangana ye negengising amma anecac dzofinac minginango dengereec. Nocac bangectoa bangec yomocac medacfora yeni kperagiaac medacfora ferahema ebiriangoc meficemeandae.
Neng ine yofi edengunuduae, dzofinac yengenaocngoc fakaya dindingac kpac, ngeni wiac imoc mema ogo gboria meficgebisia. Ifi anggec dzofinacac naso kpac anude, imohai ogofocnginango bangec feengkefude, ama imohai heitaingunugec enggecde.
Ngic mong ye yoac modacma wiac kapianec gombunga garenggeande, ye ifingoc yoac modacma wiac kuneng garenggema kefude. Nga mong ye yoac mi modacma ikoc amma wiac kapianec gombunga mi garenggeande, ye ifingoc yoac mi modacma ikoc amma wiac kuneng gombunga mi garenggeude.
Nga ngeni yoac mi modacma bangecac dzofinac mangac manganea gombunga mi garenggegecde isoc ngic mongngo dzofinac fora garenggegecdeac maringinau naric mi faiude.
Nga ngeni yoac mi modacma ngic monggac dzofinac gombunga mi garenggegec isoc, imohai wiac ngeneac desi desia imoc ngemmegecdeac osiude.
Uamedac mocgungo ngic kuneng yohockang yereac kingang naric mi kpeude. Ye monggac songo negemma mong ngadeheude me monggaru kpeketahema mong waude. Ngeni, Anutu nga dzofinac yereac kingang sofucngoc kpegecdeacsoc mi ande.”
Yesungo yoac imoc deu farisaio yeni hiedzoac songo kuneng feyemmeecac amma imoc negemma detenic ammigec.
Ammigec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic yeneng dindingac dengemmegecdeac ngeni imoc yeneac kicfu faka dindingac angkecdae. Nga Anutungo ine wiac ubaherenginau fede, imoc negendacde. Imoc yofiac, ngic yeneng wiac monggac negenggec engena angkecde, imoc Anutungo henu faka mangana yombong ande.
Moseac dedeseriyoac nga profete yeneac yoac dekperagigec erema Yohane fingeru naso imoc wisickede. Nga imohacnac erema ngicngac yeneng Anutuac eucerereng dekperagigecde. Dekperagigec ngicngac yeni serima ihai endae.
Bangec nga kurumeng meickeu kpac anude, imoc efea nga Anutuac dedeseriyoac imohacnac dzikangabisic meic meicke imoc ine naric mi fingerude.
Ngic mong ye enema wama ngac mong meude, ye serofaka anude nga mong ye ngac wawaya meude, yeng ifingoc serofaka anude.”
Anu Yesungo monggoc deec, “Ngic mong kefec, ye dzeingakpia gombunga linengngo memea amma ngakpia witiau sacsac siriha gombunga heima wenacsoc nenesemengtoagoc nga ondzonggboc amma songo witiau takefec.
Nga yeac amasinnu, oda ngadeau ine ngic mong makpekpea kpara Radzaro kefec. Ye sebiau kubecngo wake wakea nga ngic yeni ihai faigec fekefec.
Fema ngic dzofinacgoc yeac tebounac yaka tosea maande, imoc neudeac ammikefec. Nga kasi yeneng ine hama kubeha aberekecgec.
Kecma ngic makpekpeango homeu angero yeneng ye mekemma Abrahanggac hoannu faigec kefu ngic dzofinacgocngo ifingoc homeu tonggogec.
Tonggogec ye homecamau kecma ihai kpendzeng kuneng kpekefec. Ifi kpekecma kic fima henu Abrahangngo hereau yombong tarec nga Radzaro henu yeac hoannu tarec.
Ifi hemma kpacma deec, ‘Abrahang manna, ni yei gerec manau kpendzeng kuneng kpeduae, imocac amma ge ubaga neac manganeu Radzaro suena kemma gbonga susiango dokuu nemurucke hama nedzaranna menomaneu.’
Ifi deu Abrahangngo yofi deec, ‘Medacna, ge wiac mong negensibesena. Ge bangecfu kecmana ngicngac yeneng iwai gombunga gombunga genggec mekecna Radzaro ine manganasac migec. Yaguc Radzaro yei menomanedae nga geng ine kpendzeng kpekecnec.
Nga monggoc torokpema deduae, botucninau tufatoa faifaia fede. Ifi anu mongngo yeihacnac ferecgema gearu haude me ihacnacngo yei haha, imoc osiosia.’
Ifi deu dzofinacgocngo deec, ‘Ifi anu manggac derecgegemba, ge Radzaro suena mannaac amau kenu.
Dacmunafocna 5 ihai kecdae, yeneng kpendzengbangec yomohai habauac ye kemma gorongina kpema edeyunubeso.’
Ifi deu Abrahangngo ine yofi deec, ‘Yeni Mose nga profete yeneac yoac mekecma negengkecbisia.’
Ifi deu dzofinacgoc kefecngo deec, ‘Abrahang manna, imoc kpac. Ngic mongngo homecfunac gborima kemma edeyunuu ine ubamereng anggecde.’
Ifi deu Abrahangngo yofi deec, ‘Yeni Mose nga profete yeneac yoac mi negemma wagecdeu ngic mongngo homecfunac gborima deu ye ifingoc naric mi modacgecde.’”
Anu Yesungo medacfora yeneac yofi deec, “Ngicngac faka mangana anggecdeac faitobang, imocngo bangecfu fingerude. Nga ngic mongngo ngicngac ogofora faitobang ifia ayemmeude, ye ine sowehagoc.
Ye nambarac kapia yenearunac mong mangana mi kpoumiudeac ye yagucnoc dzamandzing ubeau ubahemima kondunnu ukugec kemeu, imoc yearu ngereebac.
Ngeni ngenaocngoc garengemema kecbisia. Tosoga mongngo kopocsic meficgeudeu ge goroyoac edena. Nga ye ubea merenudeu kopocsiha wabesena.
Nga ye uameme mocguac manau atac 7ngoc ge memanganeguu naso 7 ifingoc gearu dzigenema hama yofi deude, ‘Kopocsic yomoc anaiac ubahodung negenduae.’ Imoc deudeu kopocsiha wakecbesena.”
Anu aposoro yeneng Kebuac degec, “Ge negen negensinnina meyadinemmena.”
Ifi degec Kebungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Negen negensingngina kapia mastet gbomea isoc fengemmeudeu ngeni fig ic yomoc ye yengenaoc godeagoc fukema kondunnu kemema nanudeac edegec ye enacngina tofohoma naric kemema nanude.”
“Anu ngenearunac mongngo wanacngiha bangec mendzic mendzic kefude me ramaburumaka garenggekefude, yeng semeng uaunac hama amau ereu minginango matacma yaka neudeac mi deude.
Ye ine yofi edeude, ‘Ge ngakpikporucga mewegenema yakana mengerema henggareng anemma tomai nanna. Tomai nammana neba wisickeuguc ge yaka naric nenade.’
Minginango wanacngic uayoac ifi miu yeng yoara tofohoma ua medacdac, imocac ubangerecyoac mi edeude.
Ngeni ifingoc wiac anggecdeac dengecdengemmea, imoc mesidacma yofi debisia, ‘Neni wanacngic amma uaninasac meding.’”
Yesungo ifi dema Yerusarennu kenudeac sing modacma Samaria nga Gariraia botucngirau kenec.
Kemma guruama monnu emmanu ngic 10 kukuseringinagoc sinnu hamagec meficyunuec. Anu yeni hereaungoc namma
kpacma degec, “Yesu, kunennina, ge neneac ubaga manganeu.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yenemma edeyunuec, “Ngeni kemma womong gareng fingecyemmema sebingina edzacyunugec.” Ifi deu yeni sinnu kemmagecngoc sebingina ngereec.
Ngereegec yenearunac mongngo sebia ngereeu hemma dzigene hama seriangoc arohoma Anutu dengereec.
Dengerema Yesuac haniau kicmesuya hetutuckema makpe fema yeac ubangerec yoac deec. Amma ngic imoc ye Samariangic.
Ye ifi anu Yesungo kpesimiec, “Ni negemba ngic 10 yeneng ngerec ngeree meficgedau nga ngic 9 yeni damoc?
Ngic yomoc ye areng monnunacngo yeneac botucfunac yengsac Anutu afeheudeac dzigenema hade nga goa yeni ifingoc anggec naric ambac.”
Dema Yesungo yeac yofi deec, “Ge yacma kenna, negen negensinggango mengeregudac.”
Farisaio goa yeni Anutuac eucerereng noc nasoac haudeac Yesu kpesimigec yofi merengyemmeec, “Anutuac eucerereng hau ngeni imoc kicngo naric mi henggecde.
Amma yofi naric mi degecde, ‘Ngeni henggec, ye yoc me ngeni henggec, ye edimoc.’ Negenggec, Anutuac eucerereng imoc ubaherenginau fede.”
Ifi dema medacfora yeneac yofi deec, “Kecma naso mong hau ngeni Ngicac Medacac uameme mocgusac henggecdeac angemmeude amma naric mi henggecde.
Nga ngicngac yeni ngeneac yofi degecde, ‘Ngeni henggec, ye edi.’ me ‘Ngeni henggec, ye yei.’ Ifi degec ine mi modacyunubisia nga ihai bic mi kembisia.
Imoc yofiac, sawau piratac heiu kperagiango nobocnac ferecgema noboc kengande, Ngicac Medac ye ifi isocngoc hahanasoyau fingectegerude.
Hanahema ine naso yomocac kisic yeneng ye ngadehegec kpendzeng homac kpeude.
Noaac nasou faka fingerec, Ngicac Medacac haha nasou faka ifiangoc fingerude.
Ngicngac yeni nenedoku nema ngic ngacfu kenggec nga manggac yeneng degec, ‘Ni naroanna ngic mibade.’ Ifi angkecmagec Noango wageu enu doku yadima wiac sasawa semedaru manganema kpac andarec.
Nga Rotiac nasou faka ifiangoc fingerec. Ngicngac yeni nenedoku nema iwai bummema suema neneyaka mehomeckecma ama mekecgec.
Nga wenac mong ifi amma kecmagec Rotingo Sodong waec, wenac imohaingoc Anutungo negenu kurumennunac gerec nga sarafa hoc imoc ine kia isocngo mama wiac sasawa dzedaru kpac andarec.
Nga Ngicac Medac fingectegerudeac nasoyau faka ifia isoc fingerude.
Naso imohai ngic me ngac mong ye ama witiau tarude nga iwaiyango ama manau taru ye imoc meudeac ama manau mi embeso. Nga mong ye semeng uau nanude, ye ifingoc ameau dzigene mi kembeso.
Roti enemaaru faka fingerec, ngeni imoc negensibisia.
Ngic mong ye kekeha segereudeac ua mekecde, ye kekeha ukuu sufumiude nga mong ye kekeha ukuu sufuude, ye kekeha fingecmiude.
Tofocnac imohaingoc yohockang yeri fefe mocguac witiau femaec Kebuac areng yeneng yerearunac mong mema mong ine wagec feude.
Nga ngac yohockang yerahafoc imohaingoc namma flawa medzamema kecmaec Kebuac areng yeneng yerearunac mong mema mong ine wagec nanude.
Nga ngic yohockang yeri semeng uau kecmaec Kebuac areng yeneng yerearunac mong mema mong ine wagec uau kefude, imoc edengunuduae.”
Ifi deu medacfora yeneng kpesimigec, “Kebu, faka imoc dahai fingerude?” Kpesimigec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Koec koec neng yeni fareng fede, imohai eacgecde.”
Medac yeneng nasosoc modzotitia kpac nunumu ua megecdeac Yesungo yoac mong heima yofi edeyunuec.
“Yoac isic isingge ngic mong ye taong monnu kefec. Ye Anutuac kengec mi angkefec nga ngicngac yeneac eweheihei mong mi angkefec.
Nga taong imohaingoc ngac hodzec mong kefec, ye nasosoc yearu hama yofi dekefec, ‘Ngabafocna yeneng memanganenubeso amma kecdaeac neac yoac dindingac dema meficnubesena.’
Ngac ye ifi dekefu yoac isic isinggengo meficgeudeac mi negenec. Amma ngade ngac imocac modzea tiu yengenaocngoc ine yofi negenec, ‘Ni Anutuac kengec mi anduae nga ngic yeneac eweheihei mong mi negenduae.
Nga ngac hodzec yomoc ye nasosoc nearu hama hatahenengkecde, imocac amma yoara mengeremibesare. Ifi mi ambadeu ye nasosoc hakefu modzona tiyombonggeude.’”
Anu Kebungo yofi deec, “Ngeni yoac isic isinggengo faka dindingac mi modacande, yeng yoac deec, imoc negensibisia.
Anutungo ngicngacfora meisingngunuec, ngeneac amma modzea mi tiude. Ngeni hadzing toforec ye meficngunuudeac kiacnginango yearu kenu ye ngeneac amma faka dindingacfu meficngunuudenoc.
Nga nasongina mi mehereema faka dindingac fingecngemmeudeac ua bic meude, imoc edengunuduae. Nga Ngicac Medacngo haude, imohai ngicngac ye negensinggedae, ngicngac ifia negemba homac kecgecde.”
Ngic goa yeni yenanggac negenggec dindingac anu goa ngadeyunuma kecgec, yeneac negemma Yesungo yoac mong heima yofi deec,
“Ngic yohockang, farisaio mong nga takesimeme mong, yereng numuecdeac Anutuac womonnu enoc.
Emma farisaiongo yacma namma yengenaac negemma yofi dema numuec, ‘Anutu ni ngic goa, godzungic nga faka mangana me kaisero angandae, yeni isoc kpac. Nga takesimeme ngic edimoc, ni ifingoc ye isoc kpac, imocac ubangerec edeguduae.
Amma sondasoc uameme yohockang yakasege kecanduae nga wiac sasawa mekecduae, imoc 10nunac mocgu genganduae.’
Anu takesimeme ngic yeng farisaioac hereau namma kpehengaima kurumennu fiu enudeac negengebirima ine ngonducnema mokuhau kpema yofisac dema numuec, ‘Anutu, ni kopocsicmeme, ge neac ubaga manganeu.’
Nga takesimemengo ifi deecac Anutuac kicfu ngic dindingac amma amau kenec, imoc edengunuduae. Nga farisaio ye ine kpac. Ngic mong ye yengena sebi meende, yeni ye memagecde nga mong ye yengena sebi memaemeude, ye meenggecde.”
Ngicngac goa yeni Yesungo sabacfocngina mariango kpesereyunuudeac yearu meyunu hagec. Hagec medac yeneng yenemma ine kpetariyemmegec.
Kpetariyemmegec Yesungo ine kpacyunuma deec, “Nambaracbisic yeni nearu naric hagec, ngeni kpae mi heiyemmegec. Anutuac eucerereng imoc nambaracbisic yofia yeneac.
Foracngoc, mong ye nambarac kapia angkecdae, ifi isoc mi angkecde, ye Anutuac eucererennu naric mi enude, imoc edengunuduae.”
Ngic enara mongngo Yesu kpesimiec, “Kpoukpou gombunga, ni dafi amma kekecseri mebade?”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi meremmiec, “Ge nocac gombunga denendang? Anutu mocgungo gombunga kecde.
Ge dedeseriyoac yomoc bic negennec, ‘Ge kaisero mi ambesena, ngicngac mi yunuhomebesena, hamangec mi mebesena, enacfu faifai mi ambesena nga nonggo manghocga seseheyurubesena.’”
Ifi deu ngicngo merenec, “Ge denec, imoc sasawa sebigborinaungoc angereai.”
Ifi deu Yesungo imoc negemma edeec, “Ge wiac monggac engngoc kpedadanggenec, imoc yofi ambesena. Finacga sasawa fegende, imoc suena hiedzo kirecgeu imocngo ngicngac makpekpea medereyemmebesena. Ifi anna kurumenggac dzofinac fingecgenu hama modacnubesena.”
Ifi deu ngic ye yoac imoc negemma ubaebic kuneng meec, nocac ye dzofinactoa homac femiec.
Yesungo ngic henu ubaebic meu yofi deec, “Ngic dzofinactoagoc yeneng Anutuac eucerereng manau enggecdeac uatoa yombong ande.
Kamerengo bungic singau engeng imoc ua efea nga ngic dzofinactoagocngo Anutuac eucererennu engeng, imocngo ine uatoayagoc.”
Ifi deu ngicngac yeneng yoac imoc negemma kpesimigec, “Ifi anu merang naric komoc kpeude?”
Ifi degec Yesungo deec, “Ngic ngeni faka goa megecdeac obohodae, imoc Anutungo naric meude.”
Ifi deu Petorongo deec, “Negennec, neni ama nga iwainina wama ge modacguma kecdimbe.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ni foracngoc edengunuduae, ngic mong ye Anutuac eucererenggac amma amea me enema me nambaracfora nga dacmunafora amma nonggomama wayunuma kecde, yeac yofi fingerude, ye warac iwaiagoc kefec, imoc ferahema kekec nasoyau iwaia monggoc homac meficgeude. Amma wisickeu bangec siriha mong haude, imohai kekecseri ifingoc meficgeude.”
<range>
Anu Yesungo medacfora 12 ngadeau meyunuma yofi edeyunuec, “Negendae, nenang Yerusarennu ennide. Enni imohai profete yeneng warac Ngicac Medacac yoac kibinginau ohogecmoc, imocac fora fingecdarude.
Nga ngic yeni ye mema faigec bangec monnunac ngic Anutu mi negemmidae, yeneac mariu enu yeneng detenic nga meenti memati ammima desofoc ammigecde.
Amma dzikacngo ye kpekecma kpehomegecde. Nga ye uameme harebec ammanu ine monggoc gborima yarude.”
Ifi deu medac yeneng yoac imoc negemma mong mi negengireckegec. Yoac imocac hania imoc yenearu sufu sufuya feu Yesungo yoac deec, imoc mong mi negengireckegec.
Yesungo Yeriko taong mewegenemanu ngic kicpisic mongngo sing tegiau tacma iwaiac derecgekefec.
Amma negenu ngicngac habutoango ferahema kengha anggec kpesiec, “Imoc dafi andae?”
Kpesiu edegec, “Yesu Nadzaretenac, yeng ferecgema kende.”
Ifi degec yeng kunengngoc kpacma deec, “Yesu Dawidiac bangec, neacnec ubaga manganeu.”
Kparu ngicngac kiwau kenggec, yeneng kpetarimima waickema tarudeac edegec yeng ine monggoc arohoec, “Dawidiac bangec, neacnec ubaga manganeu.”
Kparu Yesungo namma kicpisic yearu mekenggecdeac edeyunuu yeni wegenac mekenggec Yesungo yofi kpesimiec,
“Ni noc wiac anggembadeac negennec?” deu merenec, “Kebu, kicfifi ambadeac negenduae.”
Ifi deu Yesungo edeec, “Negen negensinggango mengeregudeac, ge monggoc kicfifi anna.”
ifi deu ngic ye imohaingoc kicfifi amma Yesu modacma Anutu dengereu ngicngac sasawa yeneng imoc hemma Anutu dengeregec.
Yesungo Yeriko ferecge kemmanu
takesimeme ngic yeneac enara mong dzofinactoayagoc, kpara Sakaio, ye ihai kefec.
Yeng Yesu ye ngic dafia dema hembesonga negenec. Amma ye ngic wegena anu ngicngac homac yeneac botucfu nanecac Yesu naric mi henec.
Ifi anu Yesungo sing kenudeac kenec, ye ngicngac yeneac botucfunac ihai waraima nedzi kemma fig ic mong nanec, imocac witiau emma kic fima tarec.
Taru, Yesungo imohai kensikema kiwa fiu enu edeec, “Sakaio, ni yaguc amagau hama tacbade, ifi negenduaeac ge bic mana.”
Ifi deu Sakaiongo icfunac bicbic mama Yesu ubangerecgoc hoanggeu ameau kenoc.
Kenec ngicngac sasawa yeneng imoc hemma negenggec naric mi anu degec, “Yesungo manganamemengic yeac amau nocac kendac?”
Ifi degec Sakaiongo ine ihai namma Kebuac deec, “Kebu negenna, finacna mekecduae, imocac noboha ngicngac makpekpea yemmebade nga goa ikoc ayemmema wiac meai, yeneac turung atac fo meemma monggoc yemmebade.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi deec, “Anutungo yaguc ama mana yomocac mingina ebicfunac mesiyunuu komoc kpegecde. Ngic yomoc ye ifingoc Abrahanggac kisicfunac.
Imoc yofiac, Ngicac Medac ye ngicngac sufu sufuya hofocyunuude nga kpedzucyunuude amma ebicfunac meyunuudeac maec.”
Ye ifi dema kemma Yerusareng taong mewegeneec, imocac yeneng yofi negenggec, “Anutuac eucerereng imoc kicninau yombong bic fingectegerude.” Ifi negenggecac amma Yesungo yoac mong heima torokpema yofi edeyunuec,
“Ngic mongngo ngickunenggac arennunac fingec fingera, yeng yofi negenec, ‘Ni bangec hereau kemba yeneng ngictau kpac nenggec dzigenema bangec yomocac ngictau ambade.’
Nga ye kembesonga dema wanacngicfora 10 kpacyunuma dzo mong kpara mina mocgu tembuc tembuc yemmema deec, ‘Ni kembareng ngeni dzo yomocngo emekeng emeha amma kpetea meyadibisia.’
Nga ngic yeac ama mocgufora, yeneng ine ye ubango ukugec. Ifi anu ye kenu ngic goa yofi dema edeyunuma sueyunugec kenggec, ‘Yeng neneac ngictau kefudeac songo mi negendimbe.’
Nga ye ihai kefu yeneng ngictau kpac migec kecma monggoc dzigenema bangehau haec. Hama wanacngicfora dzo yemmeec, imoc dafi meyadigec, imoc negenudeac kpacyunuec.
Kpacyunuu wanacngic warac warac yeng hama deec, ‘Kebu, ni dzo nennec, imoc meyadima dzo 10 monggoc meficgeai.’
Ifi deu ngictaungo yofi deec, ‘Ge wanacngic gombunga amma ua gombunga medang. Ge yoac dedena modackecma wiac kapia gombunga garenggedanggac taong 10 garengyununadeac uayoac nga kuc genduae.’
Nga wanacngic ngade, yeng hama deec, ‘Kebu, dzo nennec, imocngo dzo 5acsoc monggoc meyadiec.’
Ifi deu ngictaungo edeec, ‘Ge taong 5 imocac gareng faiguduae.’
Anu ua ngic mongngo hama deec, ‘Kebu, dzoga yomoc kporuc manau sufuba tarec, imoc henna.
Ge ngic gerea amma kpekpeturang uaac hiedzo mi faima sifu meannec. Nga uau heihomec mi amma sifu foraya kpedziannec, imocac geac kengecnuu ifi anai.’
Ifi deu ngictaungo deec, ‘Ge wanacngic mangac manganea, yoacga meremba imocngo giude. Ni ngic gerea amma kpekpeturang uaac hiedzo mi faima sifu meanduae. Nga uau heihomec mi amma sifu foraya kpedzianduae, imoc bic negennec.
Nga ge nocac dzona yomoc dzo tohonu mi fainec? Ifi ambannu dzigenema dzona imoc nobohagoc mebai.’
Ifi dema ngicngac goa ihai nanggec, yeneac deec, ‘Ngeni dzo imoc wangecma wanacngic minadzoya 10 femide, ye migec.’
Ifi deu yeneng degec, ‘Kebu, ye dzoya 10 bic fede.’
Ifi degec yofi merengyemmeec, ‘Ngic mong wiac goa femide, ye wiac monggoc migecde nga mong ye wiac mong mi femide, yearu wiac fedemoc, imoc ifingoc wangecgecde, imoc edengunuduae.
Anu ngabafocna yomoc yeni neng ngictaungina kecma garengyunubadeac wagec, ngeni ngic imoc yei meyunu hama kicnau yunuhomegec.’”
Yesungo yoac ifi deu wisickeu ye waraima Yerusarennu enec.
Emma tiki kpara Oriwa, imocac wegena hama Betefage nga Betania amabangec mewegenema medac yohockang, yofi dema sueyuruec.
“Ngeri dindingac kemma amabangec sing enarau tacde, imohai enec donggi medaha mong ngicngo witiau mi tatara, imoc witickegec nande. Nanu ngeri imoc meficgema witic yungecma mema haec.
‘Ngeri nocac donggi yungecdape?’ Ifi kpesigecdeu ngeri yofi debesera, ‘Kebungo imocgoc ua meudeac dede.’”
Yesungo ifi dema ngic sueyuruu kemma yeng deec, imoc sasawa meficgedaroc.
Meficgema donggi medaha yungerec minginango deec, “Ngeri nocac donggi medaha yungecdape?”
Ifi deu yereng deoc, “Kebungo imocgoc ua meudeac dede.”
Ifi dema yeri donggi medaha imoc Yesuaru mema kenoc. Amma Yesungo emma tarudeac yeri ngakpingira herea hesima donggi medahaac witiau kpesorohoma Yesu enudeac meficgeoc.
Meficgeec ye emma tacma kenec, imohai ngicngac yeneng ngakpiherecngina hesima sinnu tiamegec.
Nga Yerusareng wegenac Oriwa tikiac sing keme nande, imohai yeac arengfora habu kuneng yeneng kucfaka hengkecgecac amma ubangerec negemma udumengyadango Anutu dengerema yofi degec,
“Ngictau Kebuac kpacfu hade, ye kenehagoc. Kurumennu ruae feu sawau wi dedengerec febeso.”
Ifi kpacma dengeregec farisaio goa habu yeneac botucfu nanggec, yeneng Yesuac degec, “Kpoukpou, ge arengfocga dena waickebisia.”
Ifi degec Yesungo merengyemmeec, “Yeni waickegecdeu hoc yeneng arohogecde, imoc edengunuduae.”
Yesungo Yerusareng mewegenema taong imoc hemma kiacma
yofi deec, “Geng yofinenggac ruaegoc kecnadeac sing hentegecna ngereebac. Nga sing imoc ine yaguc sufu sufu fema kicgau mi fingectegecde.
Geac nasoga haude, imohai ngabafocga yeneng noboc noboc orongguma bangec usuma heiemma igocgugecde.
Igocguma yeneng memanganeguma nambaracfocga geac botucfu kecdae, yeni yunuhomedacgec bangecfu fegecde. Amma geac manau hoc mong wagec mongngo monggac witiu mi tarude, nocac Kebugango hadac, ge imoc mi hentegecdang.”
Amma Yesungo Anutuac womonggac oda manau emma ngicngac yeneng wiac emekeng emeha amma nanggec, yeni kporacyunuma
yofi edeyunuec, “Yoac oho ohoya yofi fede, ‘Ni womonna yomocngo nunumuac ama ambeso.’ Nga ngeneng ine imoc merenggec hamangecmeme yeneac sufu sufuama ande.”
Anu Yesungo wenacsoc womonnu kpoukpou ua meu womong gareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic amma habu yeneac enarafocngina yeneng ye kpegecdeac nasoyombonga hofocma kecgec.
Nga ngicngac yeni yeac yoac negengyombonggema kecgec nga yoara mong wagecdeac mi negenggec. Imocac amma ngaba yeneng ye meickegecdeac sing mong mi meficgegec.
Yesungo naso monnu Anutuac womonnu ngicngac edekpou ayemmema siduc gombung edeyunuu womong gareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic amma yudangic enarafocngina yeni yenahafoc hama kicnginau namma
kpesimigec, “Ge noc kucfu ua yomoc menec nga merang uayoac imoc genec? Imoc edenununa.”
Ifi degec yeng yofi merengyemmeec, “Ni ifingoc kpesingemmeba wiac mong edenugec,
Yohanengo dokunadzic ua mekefec, imoc kurumennunac me ngicfunac?”
Ifi deu yeni yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, “‘Imoc kurumennunac.’ Ifi denideu yeng yofi kpesinemmeude, ‘Anu ngeni nocac ye mi negensinggegec?’
Amma ‘ngicfunac’ ifi denideu ngicngac sasawa yeneng hocngo neneregecde nocac yeni Yohane ye profete, imoc ubaherenginango negensidae.”
Ifi dema meremmigec, “Dahacnac haec, imoc mi negendimbe.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merenec, “Ifi degec, ni merang uayoac nenu ua mekecduae, imoc ifingoc mi edengunubade.”
Ifi dema Yesungo yoac mong heima ngicngac yofi edeyunuec, “Ngic mongngo waing uayau waing homerec. Homeru wisickeu waing ua garenggegecdeac ngic meficyunuma yenigoc uayoac dedzege anggec nga yengena ine naso herea bangec monnu kefudeac kenec.
Kemma kecmanu fora kpememe naso hau wanacngiha mong sueu waing uaac gareng yenearu kenu yeneng waing fora imohacnac yeac noboha migecdeac kenec. Kenu waing uaac gareng yeneng wanacngic imoc dzoboya kpema entegeng suegec kenec.
Kenu minginango ifi hemma ngic mong sueec. Sueu kenu waing uaac gareng yeneng ye ifingoc kpema faka mangana yombong ammima entegeng suegec kenec.
Kenu wanacngiha atac harebec sueu kenu yeneng ye ifingoc kpegec sawa mau kporacgec kenec.
Ifi anu ua minginango yofi deec, ‘Dafi ambade? Ni medacyombonna songo negemmianduaemoc, ye sueba kenu ye sifu eweheimigecde.’
Dema medacyombonga sueu waing uaac gareng yeneng ye hemma yenaocngoc denegeng amma degec, ‘Yeng kecma ua yomoc tiu enude. Nenang ye kpehomeni yeac bangec nga maridzoming imoc nenang anude.’
Ifi dema medac imoc kporacgec oda ngadeau kemeu kpehomegec.” Ifi dema Yesungo kpesiyemmeec, “Ua mingina imocngo waing uaac gareng yeni dafi ayemmeude?
Yeng hama waing uaac gareng yunuhomema waing ua imoc uagareng goa yeneac mariu faiude.” Ifi deu yeneng imoc negemma yofi degec, “Ifi naric mi fingecbeso.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yenemma yofi deec, “Yoac yofi oho ohoya nande, imoc titiha negensibisia, ‘Amameme ngic yeneng hoc mong mangana dema ukugec. Nga hoc imocngo amaac hoc wotung amma seria nanude.’
Ngicngac sasawa hoc imocac witiau mayunude, yeni sebingina tegerude. Nga hoc imocngo yeneac witiu makpema hedzameyunuu kapuc kpegecde.”
Mitiac negen negengngic nga womong gareng enara yeni imohaingoc ye mebeso anggec. Yesungo yeneac yoac heima deec, imoc bic negenggec amma ngicngac yeneac kengecyunuu ine wagec.
Anu yeni Yesu hembima ngicfocngina sueyunugec, yeneng yoara negendimbe siric yearu kenggec. Kemma noc yoac dafi deu negemma ine prowinsiac desi desingic yeac mariu faigecdeac negenggec.
Nga ngic imoc yeneng Yesuac degec, “Kpoukpou, ge yoac denec nga wiac kpounemmenec, imoc fora sasawa. Amma ge Anutuac sing ngicngac edekpou ayemmema yoac monde monde mi angkecnec, geac ifi negendimbe.
Imocac edenununa, neni takesi ngictau Sisa naric minide me kpac?”
Ifi degec Yesungo ikocngina hentegecma yofi edeyunuec,
“Ngeni dzo mong edzacnugec hemba. Onga nga kibi yoc, imoc meracac?” deu degec, “Imoc Sisaac.”
Ifi degec Yesungo deec, “Imocac ngeni Sisaac wiac, imoc Sisa mibisia nga Anutuac wiac, imoc Anutu mibisia.”
Ifi deu yeni ngicngac yeneac kicfu enacfu faifai ammima meme, imoc obohogec. Amma yoacngina turunga merenec, imocac kerectegec amma yoac mong mi degec.
Anu Sadukaio yeneng homecfunac yacyac mong mi fede, ifi deandae. Amma yenearunac goa Yesuaru hama kpesimigec,
“Kpoukpou, Mosengo dedeseriyoac yofi ohonemmeec, ‘Ngic mong ye ngac mema gboriha kpac kecma homeu ngic imocac muneango daraac hodzec mema gboric kpeficgema daraac kpac miacma kecbeso.’
Naso monnu dacmunac seweng kecgec nga waracdacnginango ngac mema gboriha kpac kecma homeec.
Homeu muneango daraac hodzec mema
eng kecma homeec. Anu munangirango hodzec imoc mema ifingoc sabaha kpac kecma homeu dacmuna seweng yeni ngac imocngoc mema gboricfocngina kpac kecma homedacgec
amma ngac ye wisickeu ifingoc homeec.
Amma yeng ngic seweng yeneac enengngina amma kecma yacyac nasou ye dacmunac seweng yenearunac meracac enema anude?”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi merengyemmeec, “Bangec yomocac kekec nasoac medacfora yeneng ngac meandae nga manggac yeneng yofi deandae, ‘Ni naroanna ngic mibade.’
Nga ngicngac homecfunac gborima yacyac nga kekeseri megecdeacsoc andae, yeni ihai eweeneng mi anggecde.
Yeni homecfunac yacyac, imocac kisic anggecde. Amma yeni Anutuac nambaracfora kecma angero isoc anggecdeac yeni monggoc naric mi homegecde.
Homecfunac yacyac fede, imoc Mosengo ifingoc ohoma dekperagiec. Imoc yofi, icfu gerec dzeu ye hemmanu Kebuac dede yoacfu yofi fingerec, ‘Ni Abrahang nga Isaka amma Yakobo yeneac Anutu.’
Yeac hehennu yeni sasawango kekecnginagoc. Ye gbori kecdimbe, neneac Anutu, homemea yeneac Anutu kpahac.”
Ifi deu mitiac negen negengngic goa yeneng yofi degec, “Kpoukpou, ge yoac gombunga yombong denec.”
Anu imocac ngadeau yeni kengecyunuu mongngo kpesi kpesi monggoc mi kpesimigec.
Ifi anu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni yoac yofi negembisia, yoac mong yofi fede, ‘Messia ye Dawidiac arennunac fingerude.’
Nga Dawidi ye yengenaoc Mitiyegecfu yofi deec fede, ‘KEBUNGO neac Kebuna yofi edeec, “Ge foinaugeng tacmana
ngabafocga hanigaac bageau faiyunuba yeni hanititiga anggecde.” ’
Imocac Dawidi ye ‘Neac Kebu’ kparecngo dafiu yeac arennunac ande?”
Yesungo ngicngac sasawa yeneac kicfu medacfora yofi edeyunuec,
“Ngeni mitiac negen negengngic yeneac henghomema kecbisia. Yeni ngakpi herec gombunga faima amayuguc anggecdeac songo negengandae nga suenecfu kemma ngicngac yeneng yeneac wenacngerec deyemmegecdeac songongina kuneng fede. Amma yeni kpekpeturang amau nga yakatoa nasou warac warac tatacfu tacbesonga songongina angkecde.
Amma yeni ngac hodzec yeneac amangina wangecyunuandae. Amma yeneac negengngeree fingerudeac nunumu hereangoc numuandae. Yeni ikocfaka ifia angandaeac turunga ebiriangoc megecde.”
Anu Yesungo kic fima henu ngicngac dzofinacgoc yeni sesengina Anutuac womonggac sesekatapau faigec kemeu
ngac hodzec makpekpea mongngo peni sacsac yohockang, ifisac faiu kemeu hemma
yofi deec, “Foracngoc, ngac hodzec yomoc ye hiedzoya kpac kecma dzo faima ngic sasawa sese faidau, imoc feracyunuma faidarec, imoc edengunuduae.
Imoc yofiac, yeni finactoangina wakema fede, imohacnac tosea mema sesengina faidau. Ngac ye ine noc wiac femidac imocnoc hafoangoc faidacma entegeng kecde.”
Anu ngic goa yeneng Anutuac womong hoc kibia gombungango memea amma sese nga ubangerec hania haniango Anutu mikecgec, imocngo womong kibiagoc anudeac memengere anggec, imoc hemma siduc degec Yesungo yofi edeyunuec,
“Ama yomoc hensongo homac andae, imoc naso herea mi tarude. Naso mong haude, imohai ngic yeneng imoc sasawa hembarackegecde. Hembarackegec hoc mongngo monggac witiau wagec mi tarude.”
Ifi deu yeneng kpesimigec, “Kpoukpou, ge faka denec, imoc noc nasoac fingerude nga naso imohai noc soi fingeru hemma naso wegenede negennide, imoc edenununa.”
Ifi degec Yesungo deec, “Ngic yeneng ikocfu wangecngunubauac ngeni henghomema kecbisia. Ngic homac yeneng hama neac kpac kpacma yofi degecde, ‘Ni Messia.’ nga ‘Naso bic hadac.’ ifi degec ngeni mi modacyunubisia, kpac.
Nga ewekpekpetoa amma ubakpekpe udumengtoagoc fingeru ngeni imoc negemma kengec mi ambisia. Wiac ifia hanahema fingecbeso nga naso ine imohaingoc yombong mi kpac anude.”
Amma monggoc torokpema yofi deec, “Bangec goa yeneng ogofocngina yenigoc ewekpekpe anggecde nga ngictau monggac arengngo ngictau monggac areng yenigoc ngaba angemegecde.
Usoctoa meude nga bodinaso nga hafei kuneng bangec monnu nga monnu ifiangoc fingeckenude. Fingeckenu bangecfu nga sawau soi hania hania fingeru henggecde.”
“Faka ifia mi fingecmanungoc yeni kpacnaac amma ngeni ngunukporac angemmema mengunuma kpekpeturanggac amaareng yeneac mariu faingunugecde. Nga yeneng witicamau faingunugec ngeni ngictau nga gawana yenearu mengunuma kenggecde.
Nga naso imohainoc neac dedekperagi yoac edeyunugecdeac sing fingecngemmeude.
Ni negen negentegec ngemmema yoac enacnginau faibade. Ifi amba ngabafocngina yeneac botucfunac mongngo yoac ngemmebade, imoc naric mi memaude me kpeude. Imocac amma ngeni yeneac kicfu noc yoac deni dema mi arenggekecbisia.
<range>
Kecma nonggo mang nga dacmunafocngina amma sactoso nga ogofocngina yeneng kererengunuma ngaba yeneac mariu faingunugec ngenearunac goa yunuhomegecde.
Neac kpacnaac amma ngicngac sasawango ubango ukungunugecde.
Nga ngeneac orucnginaunac orucdzongina mongngo ine naric mi sufuude.
Ngeni seriangoc namma kekecngina onggonggegecde.
Wasaingic habu yeneng hama Yerusareng oronggegecde, naso imohai ngeni yofi bic negenggecde, taong manganeudeac naso bic hade.
Imohai ngicngac Yudia bangecfu kecdae, yeni worama tikiu embisia nga Yerusareng taong manau kecdae, yeni worama ngadeau kemebisia amma ngadeau kecdae, yeneng Yerusareng manau mi embisia.
Naso imoc turung kpoukpou naso anude. Imohai yoac sasawa oho ohoya fede, imocac fora fingerude.
Naso imohai ngac heregoc kecdae nga nenggac sabac namuu meyunukecdae, yeni ebicnginagoc anggecde. Bangec yomohai ebic kuneng fingerude nga bangecac ngicngac witinginau ngaba fingerude.
Nga ngaba yeneng dzikacac beangngo ngic noboha yunuhomema noboha witicyunuma bangeha bangeha meyunuma kemma faiyunugecde. Amma bangeha bangeha ngicngac areng Anutu mi negemmidae, yeneng hama Yerusareng haninginango tima kecmagec nasongina dedea, imoc wisickeu kenggecde.
Naso imohai wenac nga afo amma asomeng yenearu soi fingerude. Nga bangeha bangeha ngicngac yeni ubaebic mema kondunnu namma kondung tembonggac udumeng negemma negengyohoc amma dafi ambesonga obohogecde.
Ebic imocngo bangecfu fingerudeac ngicngac yeni imoc negemma negengyohoc nga kengec amma homecgboric anggecde. Sawau kuc sasawa yeni kockpac anggecde.
Anu naso imohai yeni Ngicac Medac henggec ye kuctoayagoc nga kibikperagitoayagocngo hoeng witiau haude.
Faka imoc fingecbeso ammanu ngeni kpehengaima yacma orucngina miacma nambisia. Naso imohai ebicfunac mesingunugec enggecdeac naso wegeneude.”
Anu Yesungo yoac mong heima yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni fig ic nga ic sasawa hemma negembisia.
Ic yeni maringina besaiudeu wenac naso wegenede, imoc ngenaoc bic negenggecde.
Ngeni wiac sasawa deduae, imoc fingeru hemma ifingoc yofi negembisia, Anutuac eucerereng bic mewegenengunude.
Foracngoc, ngicngac areng yomoc, yeni mi homemagec wiac yomoc fingecdarude, imoc edengunuduae.
Bangec nga kurumeng, yeri kpac anecde nga neac yoac imoc naric mi kpac anude.
Ubasufu nga dokunene amma bangecac negengyohoc imocngo meebiringunubauac ngeni garengngina meemebisia. Wenac imoc utac fingecngemmebacac.
Wenac imohai subango yang kpeande, ifi isoc bangectoa bangec imohai hama ngicngac sasawa yenearu fingecdarude.
Imocac ngeni nasosoc garengemema kecma nunumu ua mekecbisia. Mekecma wiac sasawa yomoc fingecbeso ande, imohacnac woragecdeac kuc mema Ngicac Medac, yeac kicfu serima nanggecde.”
Yesungo naso imohai wenacsoc Anutuac womonnu kpoukpou ua meec. Mema kecmanu ama marai anu tiki mong kpara Oriwa, imohai kenu toforeu takefec.
Wereckenu ngicngac sasawa yeneng Anutuac womonnu yeac yoac monggoc negenggecdeac kengkecgec.
Hombang mong, ic sogong yisya kpac nene, kpara mong makekeng deandae, imoc wegeneec.
Wegeneu womong gareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic yeni Yesu homecfu faigecdeac sing mong meficgegecdeac negensigec. Amma yeni obohogec nocac yeni ngicngac yeneac kengecyunuec.
Yuda kpara mong Karioto ye medacfora 12 yenearunac mong. Nga Satangngo yeac ubahereau kemeu
yeng kemma womong gareng enara nga womonggac keracnatang garengngina, yenigoc tacma Yesu sing dafiu mema yeneac mariu faiudeac yoac denegeng anggec.
Nga yeni ubangerec negemma dzo kpetea mong dema migecdeac yoac dedzege anggec.
Yudango yenigoc uba mocgu amma sing dafiu meficgema habu yegoc mi kecmagec Yesu sufu sufuu yeneac mariu faiudeac kicfifi kefec.
Kecma ic sogong yisya kpac nene, imocac hombannu ramamedaha kpeandae, uameme imoc hau
Yesungo Petoro nga Yohane yofi dema sueyuruec, “Nenang makekenggac ramamedaha nenideac ngeri kemma wiac mengereec.”
Ifi deu kpesimioc, “Dahai mengerededeac negensinec?”
Deec merengyecmema yofi deec, “Ngeri kemma taonnu enecde, imohai ngic mong dokuenanga tofohoma hau ngeri yegoc ewacma modacma kemma ye ama monnu enu ngeri yegoc emma
ama mingina yofi edebesera, ‘Kpoukpoungo yofi kpesigende, amamana damohai medacfocnagoc makekenggac ramamedaha nenide?’
Ifi deec yeng ama witiau amamana mong kuneng edzacnguruude. Nga ihai wiac bic faifaia tacdacde, ngeri imohai iwai mengerebesera.”
Ifi deu yeri kemma Yesungo edeyuruec, imocac sirihau wiac meficgema makekenggac ramamedaha ohomengere anoc.
Anu yakanene naso hau Yesungo medacfora yenigoc yaka nebeso tacma
yofi edeyunuec, “Ni makekenggac ramamedaha yomoc ngenigoc nebesonga homac yombong anende. Amma imoc nemaguc kpendzennu embade.
Imoc yofiac, ni yaka yomoc monggoc mi nene kecbarengoc Anutuac eucererennu foraya fingerude.”
Ifi dema kpakenec mong mema Anutu dengerema yofi deec, “Ngeni yomoc mema ngenaoc emema negec.
Ni waing gbomeaac dokuya monggoc mi nene kecbarengoc Anutuac eucerereng haude.”
Ifi dema ic sogong mong mema Anutu dangge edema mendzicma yemmema yofi deec, “Yomoc fusina, imoc ngeneac amma faifaia. Ngeni neac negensima imoc negec.”
Yaka negec wisickeu ye kpakenec ifingoc mema deec, “Kpakenec yomoc sacnaac dzadzahac gboria, imoc ngeneac amma kpetic kpetinggea.
Ngicac Medac ye Anutungo sing demiecfu kenudenoc nga ngic docfu fainuude, ye maria neac marinagoc yakatebou tacdape, ngic imoc ye ine sowehagoc.”
<range>
Ifi deu medacfora yeni merang yeneac botucfunac faka imoc anude, ifi dema yenaocngoc kpesiemegec.
Anu medac yeni yenang botucfunac merang engena kecde, imocac yoacngina engemmama anu
Yesungo edeyunuec, “Bangec monnunac ngicngac Anutu mi negensinggeandae, yeni ngictaufocnginango ngicngac garengyunuma enac tofoc tofohofocngina meyunuandae. Ifi meyunuma ine yofi deandae, ‘Neni memeficngina kecdimbe.’”
Ngeneng ine ifi mi ambisia. Mong ye engena ande, ye ngadea ambeso nga enarangina kecde, yeng tosofora yeneac kingangkpekpengina siricfu kecbeso.
Imocac yofi kpesiduae, ngic merang engena ande? Ngic yaka eng tacma neude me yakau kingangkpekpe ua mema kecde? Yaka eng tacma neude, ngeni yeac negenggecde. Nga neng ine sifu ngeneac botucfu kingangkpekpe siricfu kecduae.
Amma ni faitobang manau kecbareng ngeni mi wanuma nigoc kecgec.
Mannango eucererenggac kuc neac mariu faiec, ifi isocngoc neng eucererenggac kuc ngeneac mariu faibade.
Faiba ngeni imocgoc kecma eucererennau yaka nga doku nema tacgecde. Amma ngeni ifingoc ngictautatac mema Israe kisic 12 yeneac fakangina isinggema desigecde.
“Simong, Simong, negenna, Satang ye ngic yeneng wit seuha kpegec maudeac kpemindzaheandae, ifi isoc gombungaunac merengngunuu manganegecdeac bic arenggema derecgenendac.
Nga Simong ge ine negen negensingga ukuna mi maudeac, neng geac amma nunumu ua bic medua. Amma ubaga meremma nearu monggoc dzigenema dacmunafocga meseriyunubesena.”
Ifi deu Petorongo merenec, “Kebu, ni gegoc witicamau kembade amma homebadeac bic efaidua.”
Ifi deu Yesungo edeec, “Petoro, ni edeguba yaguc tofocnac yomohaingoc kokorec mi arohomanu geng neac sebiheina atac harebec anude.”
Anu Yesungo yofi edeyunuec, “Ni warac suengunuba kenggec, imohai dzobirang me hie me hanitabe mi mekecgec ngeni wiac monggac kpedadanggegec me?” Ifi deu yeneng degec, “Kpac.”
Ifi degec Yesungo yofi deec, “Nga yaguc ine yofi deduae, Ngic mong ye dzobirangagoc me hieagoc kecde, yeng imoc mebeso. Amma wasaibeanga kpac kecde, ye ngakpitoaya sueu hiedzo kirecgeu imocngo wasaibeang bummebeso.
Mitikibiu yoac oho ohoya fede, imocngo nearu fora fingecbeso, imoc edengunuduae. Yofi, ‘Yeni yeac godzungic degec.’ Neac negemma yoac degec fede, imoc yaguc fora fingecdarude.”
Ifi deu medac yeneng degec, “Kebu henna, neni wasaibeang yohockang mekecdimbe.” degec Yesungo deec, “Imoc soha.”
Dema Yesungo faka angkefec isoc amma taong wama Oriwa tikiu kenu medacfora modacma kenggec.
Kensikema yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni faitobannu embauac numugec.”
Ifi dema medacfora wayunuma kapianec kpesima kemma fafoc heima
yofi dema numuec, “Manggac, ge negenna naric anu kpakenec yomoc nearunac meickena. Amma neac songo mi fingecbeso, kpac. Geac songo nga negen negeng imocngo seribeso.”
Ifi numumanu angero mongngo kurumennunac fingecmima mama meseriu
Yesungo ine negengebirima seriangoc numuu sengerangango sac isoc amma bangecfu maec.
Numuu wisickeu yacma medacfora yenearu dzigene kemma yenenu yeni ubahodung negemma gau fegec
yofi edeyunuec, “Ngeni nocac gau fedae? Ngeni faitobannu embauac yacma numugec.”
Yesungo yoac denammanungoc habutoa mong yearu hagec. Hama medac 12 yenearunac mong kpara Yuda, yeng waraiyemmema Yesu muduckeudeac yearu mewegeneu
Yesungo deec, “Yuda, ge Ngicac Medac muduckema doc menec, ec.”
Ifi deu ngic Yesu oronggema nanggec, yeneng faka mangana imoc fingecbesonga anu hemma kpesima degec, “Kebu, neni wasaibeango yununide me?”
Nga yenearunac mongngo womong garengtoa yeac wanacngic kpema kedzaha foiugeng herecgeec.
Herecgeu Yesungo yofi deec, “Ngeni faka imoc wagec.” Ifi dema wanacngicac kedzaha kpeserema mengereec.
Anu ngic Yesu mebesonga hagec, imoc womong gareng enara nga womonggac keracnatang enaramemengina amma yudangic enarafocngina yeneac yofi deec, “Ngeni godzungic meandae, ifi isoc wasaibeang nga gbarucnginagoc hadae.
Ni Anutuac womonnu wenacsoc ngenigoc kecbareng ngeni sifu imohai mi menugec. Nga yaguc ine ngeneac naso anu kundunggac kucngo garenggac tatac mekecde.”
Ifi anu yeni Yesu mema womong garengtoaac amau mekenggec Petoro ye ngadenginau hereaungoc modacyunuma kenec.
Kenu ngic goa yeni amaac oda manau sobeng dzongiau gerec figec dzeu dzeunegemma tacgec Petorongo yeneac botucfu mataru
wanac naroang mongngo Petoro gerecfu taru kic fima hemma deec, “Ngic yomocngo yegoc kecande.”
Ifi deu Petorongo ine sebi heima deec, “Ngac, ge denec, ni ye mi negemmiduae.”
Ifi deu naso mi hereemanu ngic mongngo Petoro hensima deec, “Ge ifingoc yenearunac mong.” Ifi deu Petorongo deec, “Ngic, ge negennec ni kpac.”
Nga aua mocgu isoc nammanu ngic mongngo monggoc serima deec, “Fora yombong, ngic yomoc ye gariraiangic, ye ifingoc yeac arennunoc kecande.”
Ifi deu Petorongo ine merenec, “Ngic negenna, ge denecmoc, imoc mi negentegecduae.” Dema yoac imoc mi desimanungoc kokorecngo arohoec.
Arohou Kebungo dzigenema Petoro henu Petoro ye Kebungo yeac yoac deec, imoc negensiec, “Kokorecngo tofocnac yomohaingoc mi arohomanu geng neac sebiheina atac harebec anude.”
Imoc negemma Petorongo ngadeau kemema ubahodung kuneng mema kiac hodung kiarec.
Ngic Yesuac gareng kecgec, yeneng Yesu dedzomoc ammima kpema
kiwa kporucngo biranggema degec, “Merang gudac, geng imocac kpefingyoac dena.”
Ifi dema yeni faka hania hania ammima desusuic ammigec.
Ama wereckenu yudangic enarafocngina, imoc womong gareng enara amma mitiac negen negengngic yenahafoc kpeturanggemagec Yesu yudangic yeneac tutumangtoau mekemma
yofi degec, “Edenununa, ge Messia me?” Ifi degec yeng yofi merengyemmeec, “Edengunuba naric mi negensinggegecde.
Nga kpesi kpesi kpesingemmebadeu turunga naric mi merenggecde.
Nga yofinenggac nga namma enude Ngicac Medacngo Anutu Kuctoa minginaac foiaugeng tarude.”
Ifi deu yeneng degec, “Ifi anu ge Anutuac Medac me?” Ifi degec, yeng merengyemmeec, “Ni imocnoc, ngeneng ine imoc dedae.”
Ifi deu yeneng degec, “Yoacninaac boingicac monggoc mi obohodimbe. Ye imoc yengena enarango deu bic negending.”
Dema kpeturanggema tacdacgec, yeni sasawa yacma Yesu mema Piratoaru mekemma
imohai yoacfu namma haniaya yofi degec, “Ngic yoc ye ngicngacfocnina yenearu singngina mesufuma takesi Sisa minideac kpetarinemmema yengenaac ifi dekecde, ‘Ni Messia, ngictau mong.’”
Ifi degec Piratongo kpesimiec, “Ge yudangic yeneac ngictau me?” Ifi deu meremmiec, “Imocnoc geanggaoc denec.”
Anu Piratongo womong gareng enara nga habu yeneac deec, “Ngic yomocngo singyoac mong mi kpeec, ni kopocsiha hofocduae.”
Ifi deu yeneng ine serima degec, “Ye ngicngac kpouyemmema here miac miac Gariraianac hanahema ayemme hakecma Yudaia bangecfu sokoma ihai wisickede.”
Ifi degec Piratongo imoc negemma kpesiyemmeec, “Ngic yomoc Gariraia ngic me?”
Amma ye Yesuac hania negemma Herodengo bangec garenggede, ye ihacnac, ifi negenec. Negemma Herodengo naso imohai Yerusarennu ifingoc kefecac Yesu sueu yearu kenec.
Kenu Herodengo Yesuac siduc bic negenec. Ye Yesungo faka kuhagoc goa meu henudeac negengkefec. Ifi negemma naso herea Yesu hofockefecac amma Yesu yearu mekenggec ubangerec yombong negenec.
Negemma Yesu kpesi kpesi homac kpesimiu yeng ine imocac turunga mong mi merenec.
Nga womong gareng enara nga mitiac negen negengngic yeneng hama namma yeac hania seriangoc yombong degec.
Nga Herode nga wasai arengfora yeneng ye ngadehema dedzomoc ammima ngakpi mong kibiagoc heimigec kemeu Piratoaru monggoc suegec mekenggec.
Herode nga Pirato yeri warac ngaba ngaba kefoc nga wenac imohaingoc ogo ogo anoc.
Anu Piratongo womong gareng enara nga enarameme amma ngicngac kpacyunuu hadacgec
yofi dema edeyunuec, “Ngic imoc ye ngicngacfocnina herengina miacande, ifi dema mehadau. Nga neng ngeneac kicfu kpesimiba wiac negemma yoacfu faidae, imoc kpac anu kopocsiha hofocduae.
Nga Herodengo ifingoc negemma eng merenu mema hadau. Ifi anu ngic yomocngo mangana mong mi memanu neng homecfu faibadeacsoc mi ande, ngeni imoc negentegecbisia.
Ifi anu ye memeting goa mima waba kenudeac negenduae.”
Anu hombang nasou gawanango ngic mocgu witicamaunac yungecbeso, faka imoc feec.
Imocac habutoa sasawa yeneng arohogec, “Ye meickema Baraba yungecnemmena.”
Baraba ye warac taonnu ngicngac yeneac here miac miac faka amma ngic kpehomeec, imocac amma witicamau faigec.
Nga Piratongo ine ngicngac yenearu monggoc serima deec nocac ye Yesu yungeru kenudeac negenec.
Ifi deu yeni arohogec, “Ge mariponnu kpena homeu, mariponnu kpena homeu.”
Arohogec naso harebec anu Piratongo deec, “Ngic yomoc ye noc kopocsic yombong meficgeec? Ni kopocsiha mong mi meficgema homecfu faibadeacsoc mi anduae. Ifi anu memeting mima waba kenudeac negenduae.”
Ifi deu yeni mariponnu homeudeac serima seriangoc arohoma Piratoac yoac ferahema udumengtoa meficgema yeneng firang anggec.
Ifi anggec Piratongo yeneac yoac negemma negengyemmema Yesu desiyemmeec.
Amma ngic ye here miac miac faka angkecma ngic kpehomeu witicamau faigec tarec, ye yungecgecdeac degec, imoc yungecyemmema Yesu ine maringinau faiu songongina modacgecdeac wayemmeec.
Wayemmeu wasaingic yeneng Yesu mekemma henggec ngic mong Kirene taonnunac, kpara Simong, ye semeng uaunac hau sinnu meficgema yeng Yesuac maripong tofohoudeac ngombonggegec tofohoma Yesu modarec.
Nga ngicngac habu kunengngo modacgec, yeneac botucfu ngac homac yeneng yeac dekiac amma ubamangang kuneng anggec.
Ifi anggec Yesungo dzigenema edeyunuec, “Yerusarennac ngacnaroang, ngeni neac mi kiacgec. Ngeni ngenang nga nambaracfocngina, yeneac amma ine kiacbisia.
Naso mong haude, imohai ngicngac yeneng yofi degecde, ‘Ngac kufing nga sabac mi megec amma namu mi gumecyunugec, yeni kenecnginagoc.’
Naso imohai ngicngac yeneng tikiac degecde, ‘Tiki ge witininau mama ferandzinununa.’ Nga faganggac yofi degecde, ‘Fagang ge tohoma kperacnununa.’
Yeni ic sabayagoc nande, imohai faka ifia andaeu ic bic ururuedacfu, imoc memanganeyombonggegecde.”
Anu yarengic yohockang yeri Yesugoc yurugecdeac ifingoc meyuru kemma
bangec buma mong kpara Hatasic degec, imohai kensikema Yesu mariponnu kpegec amma yarengic mong foiugeng nga mong kanaugeng, ifi yurugec.
Yunugec Yesungo deec, “Manggac, yeni ua medae, imoc mi negentegecma andaeac kopocsicngina wana.” Nga yeneng wambaya kpeing kpema mederegec.
Ngicngac yeni wiac fingerec, imoc ifi hennammagec yudangic enarafocnginagoc yeneng ifingoc desusuic ammigec, “Ye Messia, Anutuac meisingmedaha andeu yeng ngicngac goa onggongyunuec, ifi isoc yengena ifingoc onggongemeu.”
Nga wasaingic yeneng ifingoc defagoc ammima yeac wegenacfu hama waing aengagoc yearu sinemima
degec, “Ge yudangic yeneac ngictau kecnecfu geangga onggongemena.”
Nga oruha witiau yoac yofi oho ohoya nanec, “Yomoc yudangic yeneac ngictau.”
Anu yarengic yohockang yerearunac mong nanec, yeng Yesu desusuic ammima deec, “Ge Messia annecfu geangga onggongemema neri ifingoc onggonnuruna.”
Ifi deu ogeango kpetarimima deec, “Ge ifingoc yoacfu firang mi andang amma Anutuac kengecguu ngereebac.
Nerang kopocsicniraac turunga faka dindingacfu ifi anecmedae nga ngic yomoc ye ine kopocsic mong mi meficgeec.”
Ifi dema Yesuac deec, “Yesu, ge eucererenggau kensikema ngictau tatac mema ni negensinubesena.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeec, “Foracngoc, yagucngoc nigoc eucererennu kecdede, imoc edeguduae.”
Anu wenac dzongiau 12 kiroc ammanu imohai ama kundung kpema kundungngo bangec sokoma fekemmanu 3 kiroc marai anec.
Nga wenackiwa kundung kpeec, naso imohaingoc Anutuac womonnu kpoructoa womongmana kpetiac yombong naguyau nanec, imoc tohou yohockang anec.
Nga Yesungo ubaudumeng kunengngoc kpacma deec, “Manggac, ongaasuna marigau faiduae.” Ifi deu asuya ereec.
Anu wasai garengngo imoc hemma Anutu eweheimima deec, “Ngic yomoc ye kopocsiha kpac, imoc fora.”
Nga ngicngac sasawa yeni faka fingerec, imoc hennegeng ambesonga hagec, yeneng faka imoc fingeru hemma mokucnginau kpema kiacma amanginau kenggec.
Nga Yesuac arengfora sasawa nga ngac goa Yesu modacma Gariraianac hagec, yeni ine hama hereau namma faka fingerec, imoc henggec.
Ngic mong kefec kpara Yosefe, ye Yudaia bangecfu Arimataia taonnunac. Amma ye yudangic yeneac tutumangtoaac memba kefec. Ye ngic yumea nga fakaya dindingac amma Anutuac eucererenggac tomai kefec. Nga yeac ogoforango yoac degec nga faka anggec, yeng imocac negenu mi ngereec.
<range>
Ifi anu yeng Piratoaru kemma Yesuac fareng meudeac kpesimiec.
Kpesiu negemmiu ye Yesuac fareng mesima linengkporuc imocngo tembonggema mekemma kicsere mong gboria, imohai faiec. Kicsere imoc gboria amma hoc sirango mengec mengerea nga ngic mong imohai mi tonggo tonggoya.
Anu wenac imoc sabataac efac kpefac naso anu sabata naso hanahebeso anec.
Nga Gariraia bangecfunac ngac goa Yesu modacgec, yeneng Yosefe modacma kicsereu kemma Yesuac fareng faigec, imoc hennegeng amma
monggoc dzigenema amanginau kemma fareng imocac kerecdoku homuna gombunga memengere amma sabatanasoac singyoac fede, imoc modacma tomai kecma tacnegenggec.
Sonda gboria hanahema asoac ama negemma ngac yeni kerecdoku homuna gombunga memengere anggec, imoc mema kicsereu kenggec.
Kemma henggec hoctoa kicsere sing hedzic hedzickeamoc, imoc bic kpedic kpedidinggea feu kicsere naguya eng nanec.
Nanu ngac yeni kicsere manau emma Kebu Yesuac farenga ine mi meficgegec.
Amma yeni noc wiac fingecdac dema obohoma nammagec imohaingoc ngic yohockang ngakpingira kongac koporarac yombong, yereng hama kicnginau fingecma nanoc.
Nanec ngac yeni kengec amma ngonducnema nammagec ngic yohockang yereng yofi edeyunuoc, “Ngeni ngic gboridac kecde, ye nocac kicsereu hofocdae?
Yenoc Anutungo homecfunac bic megboriu yacma yei mi kecde. Amma yeng Gariraia kecmangoc yoac edengunuec, imoc negensibisia.
‘Ngicac Medac ye kopocsicmeme yeneac mariu faigec, yeneng mema mariponnu kpegec homeude.’ imoc fingerudeac deec, ‘Nga uameme harebec ammanu monggoc gborima yarude.’”
Ifi deu ngac yeni yeng yoac bic deec, imoc negensigec.
Negensima kicsereunac monggoc dzigene kemma medac 11 nga tosofocngina faka sasawa fingerec, imoc edeyunudacgec.
Ngac kenggec, yeneac kpacngina Maria Madara nga Yohana amma Maria Yakobo nonggea nga ngac goa yenahafoc kenggec, yeneng siduc imocngoc aposoro edeyunugec.
Nga ngac yeneng yoac imoc edeyunugec, imocac medac yeneng negenggec sicsauc anu yoacngina mi negensinggegec.
Nga Petorongo ine yacma nedzima kicsereu kenec. Kemma kicsereu okarima henu kporucsusu tembonggegec imocngosac tarec. Ye imoc hemma negenu wiac engena anu monggoc dzigene kenec.
Anu wenacnaso imohaingoc ngic yohockang Yesu modacandape, yereng ama mong kpara Emausi, imohai kembesonga kenoc. Bangec imoc Yerusarenggac hereau 11 kiromita, imocfi tarec.
Nga yeri faka sasawa fingerec, imocac denegeng amma kenoc.
Yeri yoac imocac denegeng amma negen negeng ua mema kemmaec Yesu yengenaoc ngadengirau kemma meficyuruu yerigoc kenggec.
Amma yeri kic mesufuu ayecmeu mi hensioc.
Ifi anu Yesungo yofi kpesiyemerec, “Ngeri sinnu noc wiacac ngeraocngoc denegeng andape?” Ifi deu yeri ubahodung siric amma waickema nanoc.
Namma mong kpara Kereopa, yeng kpesimiec, “Ge kuricngic mocgungosac Yerusarennu kecmina sonda yomocac manau ihai faka fingecdac, imoc mi negendang me?”
Ifi deu yeng deec, “Noc faka fingecdac?” Ifi deu yereng edeoc, “Yesu Nadzaretenac yearu faka fingerec. Ye profete mong amma Anutu nga ngic yeneac kicfu yoac deec nga faka sasawa meec, imoc kuhagoc yombong anec.
Nga womong gareng enara nga israengic enarafocnina, yeneng ye homeudeac dema gamang yeneac mariu faigec yeneng mariponnu kpegec homeec.
Nga neni yofi negensinggeing, yennoc israengicngac mesinunuude. Faka fingerec, imocac uameme yaguc harebec ande.
Anu ngac goa neneac habuunac, yeni yaguc asoac yombong kicsereu kemma farenga hofocdau. Hofocma dzigenema hama yofi edenunudau, ‘Angero yereng ongau fingecnemmema yofi deec, “Yesu ye bic gboridac kecde.” ifi dedau.’ Ifi degec kpidohoding.
<range>
Amma nenearunac ngic goango kicsereu kemma ngac yeneng dedau, ifi isoc yombong meficgedau nga yengena ine mi hendau.”
Ifi deu Yesungo yofi edeyuruec, “Ngeni negen negengngina kpac nga wosongina nomana yombong. Profete yeneng bicngoc yoac sasawa degec, imoc bic mi negensinggedae.
Imoc yofi fingerudeac degec, ‘Messia ye kpendzeng kpekefu wisickeuguc kibikperagiatoaac ameau naric enude.’”
Yengena siduc imoc mitikibiu oho ohoya fedacde, imoc Moseac kibiunac hanahema kengkecma profete sasawa yeneng yeac siduc ohogec, ye imocac hania deireckeyemerec.
Anu yeri ama kembesonga kenoc, imoc mewegenema Yesungo ferecgema kembeso siric isoc anu
yereng kpetarimima deoc, “Ama marai anu kundung kpebeso andeac ge nerigoc kenni.” Ifi deec yerigoc amau emma tacgec.
Yesungo yerigoc tacma yaka nebesonga ic sogong mema kenecyoac dema mendzicma yemerec.
Yemeru kicngira tegeru Yesu hensimaec yeng imohaingoc aockeu
yeraocngoc denegeng amma deoc, “Yeng sinnu mitikibiac hania edekpou anecmema deireckenemeru herenirango yacyombonggedac, imoc fora yombong.”
Nga yeri imohaingoc yacma dzigenema monggoc Yerusarennu kemma medacfora 11 ogofocnginagoc kpeturanggema tacmagec meficyunuoc.
Meficyunuec yeneng edeyuruma yofi degec, “Kebungo fora homecfunac gborima yacdac, ye Simong bic fingecmidac.”
Ifi degec yereng sinnu yerearu faka fingerec nga Yesungo ic sogong mendziru hensioc, imocac siduc andaroc.
Siduc ifi andarec yeni yoac imoc negemma tacmagec Yesu yengenaoc botucnginau namma deec, “Ruae ngenearu febeso.”
Ifi deu yeni kpidohoma kengec amma negensigec, “Wosonga hendimbe.”
Ifi negensigec yeng yofi deec, “Ngeni nocac kpidohoma negengyohoc andae?
Imoc ni neanaoc, ngeni hanimarina henggec. Wosonga yeni sicfusingina kpac. Ngeni imocac hama kpeserenuma nenggec.”
Ifi dema hanimaria edzacyunuu
yeni kerectegec amma ubangerectoa negemma sifu mi negensinggegec yeng yofi kpesiyemmeec, “Ngeni yaka mong faigec tacde me?”
Ifi deu yeni kondungyang dzedzea noboha migec mema kicnginau neec.
<range>
Nema yofi edeyunuec, “Ni ngenigoc kefai, imohai yofi bic edengunuai, wiac sasawa neac negemma Moseac dedeseriyoacfu nga profete yeneac kibiu amma Mitiyegecfu oho ohoya fede, imoc sasawa fora fingecbeso.”
Ifi dema ye imohaingoc negen negengngina meireckeyemmeu yeni mitikibiac yoac negentegecgec
yofi torokpema deec, “Imocac amma yofinoc oho ohoya fede, Messiango kpendzeng kpema homema uameme harebecfu monggoc gborima yarude.
